JOB SKILLS, EXPERIENCE, AND KNOWLEDGE REQUIREMENTS Highly motivated person who loves selling and hunting new business growth. Mature person with good business sense and more than 3 years solid working experience in key account management. Have strong people sense and solid understanding and experience of value selling approach. Experience or knowledge in tape, graphic industry is preferred. Bachelor’s degree or above, major in chemical or Mechanical engineering is preferred. Understand working culture of western company. Good interpersonal and communication skills. Good command of spoken and written English.  PRIMARY JOB DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES Take care of the business in selected multinational customers, to develop key account strategy and sales plan for these customers, implement and follow those plans. Develop intimate customer multi-layer relationship with customers to understand customers’ key initiatives, pain points and identify sales opportunities.  Follow the customer initiatives and selling opportunities to develop and grow the business within these accounts. Report all the sales calls, customer issues and follow up those action items leveraging Loparex internal resources. To issue & monitor customer demand forecast based on the Loparex process, principles, formats and follow those accordingly. Lead and solve customers’ technical and commercial issues with the support from Loparex internal resources. To finish whole sales cycle from initiating sales opportunities and settling receivables and overdue payments as dictated in Loparex sales procedures. Attend the meetings, exhibitions, seminars and courses of Loparex Group or functions organized by third party either in China or abroad. Follow all company procedures and policies and help to develop those.
industries: Consumer Goods and Paper & Forest Products

description: Job Summary  DESCRIPTION  Amazon strives to be Earth's most customer-centric company where people can find and discover virtually anything they want to buy online. By giving customers more of what they want - low prices, vast selection, and convenience - Amazon continues to grow and evolve as a world-class e-commerce platform. The team acts as the primary interface between Amazon and our business partners. We obsess over providing world class support to Merchants selling on the Amazon platform. We strive to predict the Seller's needs before they recognize they may have a problem, create innovative self-help tools, and provide solutions to help our partners better serve their customers.  Summary Of Responsibilities Manage a team of Seller Compliance Account Managers and possess the ability to influence senior internal and external stakeholders, have strong sales skills, a track record of using data and tools to drive business growth and be comfortable operating in an ambiguous environment. Take on planning and strategic projects to scale and diversify the program over the longer term. Develops and guides team to provide prompt and efficient support service to third-party Amazon Sellers. Actively seeks solutions through logical reasoning and data interpretation skills and owns reporting and accountability of dynamic solutions. Distill key challenges faced by team and drive resolution through coordination with external subject matter experts. Demonstrates excellent time-management skills and has the ability to coach and motivate team working with portfolio of independent third-party Amazon Sellers. Actively monitors, tracks and drives performance metrics across the team including productivity, issue resolution and customer delight. Liaises with other departments such as Seller Supports, Finance, Merchant Investigations and European business teams as required to respond to Seller’s issues and questions  Basic Qualifications  Knowledge and Skills Experience successfully leading and developing teams of direct and indirect reports. Proven track-record as individual contributor in fostering key client relationships and hitting quotas/targets. Self-motivated, results-driven and autonomous taking responsibility for achieving targets. Strong analytic and project management skills. Proven ability to work with global and cross-functional teams across business-development, marketing, operations, product development, legal teams, etc. Good balance between strategic/analytical skills and operational execution. Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to persuade, convince and explain complex concepts up to Director/VP level. Ability to juggle multiple priorities and make things happen in a fast-paced, dynamic environment; bias for action. Adherence to high-standards and backbone in support of customers.  Basic Qualifications Language: Chinese and English 10+ years of relevant experience in retail or account management, with a proven track record of managing high performing teams and projects. 3+ years in hiring and developing people/team. University Degree required. Experience in business development/sales/consulting (top-tier firm), preferably in the technology, internet and e-commerce sectors Success managing dynamic account portfolios. Preferred Qualifications Experience with cross border e-commerce compliance on product compliance, trade compliance or global tax/European Value Added Tax (VAT).  Company - Amazon(Shanghai) Intl Trade Co  Job ID: A1749631
industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services, and Internet

description: The candidate for this position will excel at creating and closing new opportunities. By using a consultative approach to selling, this person will use their expertise to identify and qualify leads, leading to sales opportunities with both new and existing customers.   Responsibilities Meet and exceed sales targetsreate new business opportunities by identifying prospects and evaluating their position within the industry; researching and analyzing sales options Establish contact and develop relationships with prospects; recommending solutions Maintain relationships with clients by providing support, information and guidance; researching and recommending new opportunities; recommending profit and service improvements Assist with developing, organising and implementing sales and marketing activities Track and meet sales targets Plan, manage and attend meetings, tastings and events across Mainland China Essential Requirements: Proven track record of experience as a sales representative for a minimum of 3 years Proficiency in MS Office Numerically literate, comfortable working with numbers, making sense of metrics and processing figures with spreadsheets Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills Excellent time management skills and ability to multi-task and prioritize work Existing network in wine and spirit beverage industry in Mainland China essential A self-starter, able to be left to own devices, make decisions and achieve results Attention to detail and problem-solving skills Excellent written and verbal communication skills Strong organizational and planning skills in a fast-paced environment A creative mind with an ability to suggest improvements Analytical skills  Qualifications 2-5 years' quota carrying sales experience Experience and working knowledge of CRM systems Demonstrable track record of over-achieving quota Strong written and verbal communication skills Ability to communicate effectively in Mandarin & English

jobTitle: Account Rep II, Key Account sales
description: Job Summary  DESCRIPTION  Amazon provides international transportation solutions to Sellers leveraging Amazon's fulfillment program. As a Sales Representative, you will have the exciting opportunity to help drive the growth and shape the future of our Sellers business. Your responsibilities will include working on key accounts and future opportunities.  The ideal candidate will possess both a sales and business background that enables them to successfully identify and onboard opportunities with a high degree of customer obsession. The successful candidate should also be a self-starter that has the ability to problem solve. The successful candidate must be prepared to work in a high-volume and fast-paced environment and with cross functional teams, globally.  Roles & Responsibilities Ensure high customer service for all Amazon export volume and related sellers Respond and qualify incoming enquiries Achieve monthly quota of qualified opportunities Cooperate in the development and execution of a territory plan including outbound calling against established target lists Work closely with other team to grow revenue in assigned territory Manage numerous requests concurrently & strategically Maintain a robust sales pipeline and related territory target lists Work with partners to extend reach & drive adoption Ensure customer satisfaction  Basic Qualifications Over 5 years of sales, business development or proven experience in project management in sales / marketing environment of logistics ( preferred in import/export freight forwarding field) Experience in a business-to-business (B2B) environment Superior oral and written communication skills in Mandarin and in English with an innate attention to detail Spoken language from the region would be a plus Analytical skills using Excel would be a plus A proven track record of managing multiple projects while meeting tight deadlines and budgets Experience working in a fast-paced and highly cross-functional organization Preferred Qualifications Demonstrated ability to formulate data driven decisions that lead to results Experience working in a fast-paced environment with multiple priorities and tight deadlines Native Mandarin speaker Bachelor Degree required, MBA preferred  Company - ICP-Shenzhen branch  Job ID: A1749512
industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services, and Internet

description: Langham Hospitality Group (LHG) is a global hotel company with properties located in major cities and four continents under The Langham Hotels and Resorts and Cordis Hotels and Resorts brands. It is the hospitality arm of Great Eagle Holdings, a leading property development company in Hong Kong.  Located in the heart of Shanghai' s entertainment hub, The Langham, Shanghai, Xintiandi is adjacent to the retail utopia of Huai Hai Road, known as the Champs Elysees of the East, blending traditional Chinese elements with chic contemporary style, 357 guest rooms and suites that envelop travelers in spacious comfort.  Key Responsibilities:  · Assisting director of sales to plans and develops marketing strategies and promotion plans for Corporate segment.  · Assisting director of sales to plans and develops marketing strategies and promotion plans for MICE & Leisure segment.  · Identifies and handles sales leads effectively and efficiently.  · To assist the DOS to manage people to bring them to their full potential through training, counseling, guidance and discipline and maintain a work environment which fosters loyalty, pride and a sense of belonging.  · Assist and supervises execution of sales and marketing plan.  · To increase occupancy, average rate and profits of the hotel through assist DOS is planning, guidance, and training of hotel sales personnel.   Qualifications:  · Presentable, cheerful & professional manner, outgoing in nature, team player · Strong selling skills and techniques. · Minimum 5 years experience and background in an International luxury hotel chain · Knowledge of MS office software · Familiar with Delphi Sales & Catering and Opera PMS is preferred. · Independent & ability to work under pressure. · Legally authorized to work in China  For more information about the property, please visit: http://www.langhamhotels.com/en/the-langham/shanghai/
industries: Hospitality, Consumer Services, and Commercial Real Estate

description: 职责描述： Oracle Consulting为我们的客户提供快速解决方案来帮助客户成功完成Oracle应用、技术产品的实施。这个岗位将会负责华南区域的咨询顾问业务，了解客户对Oracle技术产品进行迁移、实施和集成等需求，成功达成咨询项目的业务合作。   任职要求： 理想的候选人需要具有6年以上IT相关销售经验，有过IT咨询、IT服务的销售经验，优秀的沟通能力，良好的英语能力； 熟悉金融行业客户尤佳； 有外企背景优先。
jobFunction: Sales, Information Technology, and Business Development

jobTitle: The Market Sales Representative - Food Analysis Solutions
description: The Market Sales Representative - Food Analysis Solutions – (FAS) is responsible for lead execution of the FAS Market Sales strategy in China (The Territory), with the key objective to deliver on defined sales targets (Quarterly) and to drive growth in the FAS Market. They are accountable for defining a Business/Sales Plan to successfully grow BBIO business in stated markets and achieve the business goals defined as per the BBIO strategic Business Plan (5Y).  They will work in close collaboration with the Market Representative FAS, as well as with the Regional Sales group, to define and execute customized Go to Market approaches and to support Key Account sales strategy in the FAS Market, thus enabling BBIO to leverage its full existing Solution Portfolio across customers value chains.  They will deliver the annual and quarterly growth in NOBs and revenue, in a profitable way, and in accordance with BBIO’s annual and quarterly financial objective for the FAS Market in The Territory.  They are responsible for the sales of BBIO total solutions in the FAS market, and potentially specific selected Key Accounts (either in a Global KA sales role or in a regional support capacity). This role will generate sustainable growth by broadening value, with existing and novel solutions (for the customer end-to-end value chain), while strengthening the business and partnerships with established customers.  They have advanced specialized knowledge and understanding of the FAS market and should become a trusted partner for our customers in that segment. They will also develop our business by pro-actively targeting new customers in full alignment within the Commercial Organization.  Responsibility： • Grow BBIO‘s sales through New Order Booking and Revenue Recognition in The Territory (FAS Markets) by leveraging the full BBIO portfolio relevant to Food Analysis Solution customers.  • Through building sustainable business partnerships with major corporations in all FAS Subsegments, position BBIO as an End-to-End partner for the complete value chain in the segment and an endorsed supplier in the FAS marketplace. • Sell BBIO’s complete solution portfolio, ranging from Food Screeners, software, and services, to Benchtop based Application solutions in all subsegments of the FAS market.  • Identify a balanced mix of target customers, qualify & maximize BBIO’s business potential for “Designed-In” solutions, and establish sustainable business co-operations with their Decision & Buyer Center in order to deliver business performance (NOB, Revenue, GM) according to the annual and quarterly plan.  • Act as Key Account Sales Manager for specific FAS Accounts in The Territory that have been assigned. Drive all necessary communication, demo activity, legal requirements, quoting and follow up activities required to close sales in designated opportunities. • Focus on penetration strategies for assigned qualified Key Accounts with the goal to achieve “Design-In” projects when possible.  • For assigned qualified Key Accounts, maintain strong account knowledge and management, ensure that all required resources are utilized in an effective and timely manner to meet the defined customer issue resolution needs (SLS, Back Office) where required. Protect and enhance BBIO’s customer facing reputation. Lead regular interdisciplinary key account task force meetings to resolve pending topics quickly and efficiently. • Work in accordance with Miller Heiman Strategic and Key Account Selling Methodologies. • Accountable for business results, including annual and quarterly NOB and revenue/market share targets in the FAS Market in The Territory. Own, measure and report sales progress and accurate forecasting within a timely manner through a set of relevant KPI’s within CRM (Salesforce.com). • Responsible for implementing the BBIO sales expansion strategies for FAS markets in The Territory.  • Closely work with Market Manager - FAS and BBIO Marcom to create and execute impactful market lead generation and awareness campaigns in stated region, with the aim of maximising sales growth. Attend specialized events to promote BBIO’s solutions, and assist with the proactive follow up of leads generated  • Closely work with local Field Application Experts to minimize Sales cycle and time to money for opportunities (time to convert Lead2NOB).  Keep abreast of key priorities and changes in FAS Market trends, including changes in regulatory requirements which may pertain to the business, and providing feedback to Global Sales Director - Market Sales – FAS and Market Management, as well as R&D team on a regular basis  Qualification： • High level of autonomy, Self-disciplined and reliable, strong time management skills • Strong sales-oriented attitude combined with Performance culture  • High productivity, high quality work • Strong drive and enthusiasm combined with can-do attitude  • Excellent interpersonal skills and teamwork spirit • Ability to adapt to change rapidly if needed • Strong analytical and organizational skills • Problem-solving positive attitude • Accessible and open personality • Excellent communication (both written and oral) skills  • Impeccable personal presentation • A proven team player with a strong work ethic who will enhance the performance of the BBIO Market Sales team and will complement the capabilities already in place.  • Must have the ability to react quickly to market requirements with excellent account evaluation and qualification skills. • A driven and highly motivated, self-starting sales professional with successful track record in selling high value capital equipment • 5+ years’ work experience including minimum 3 years’ sales experience driving and managing a portfolio of technical life science FAS product sales with associated market knowledge of FAS markets • Able to demonstrate proven, successful sales experience in increasingly responsible roles across multiple vertical and market segments  • Successful track record of key account sales management and business growth in FAS/ Academia or an adjacent industry sector.  • Strong experience of usage and understanding of Complex & Strategic Selling strategies for business development and account share growth. • Expertise in value chain management with proven analytical and problem-solving abilities required to diagnosis customer needs and propose technical solutions that address business requirements. • Previous exposure to NMR / associated analytical technologies is required. • Deep understanding of FAS customer value chains. Has expertise with Value Chain Management and the provision of technical solutions to address a business requirement within in the value chain.  • Possess and further develop strong network of contacts in stated Market segments • Demonstrated experience with cost analysis and justifications required and the ability to present developed business case analysis to executive management.  • Can demonstrate and convey theoretical and practical understanding of NMR/TD/EPR technology as well as competing analytical tools (MS, IR)  • Good level of English verbal, written, computer, technical, and proposal communication and presentation skills, including proficiency with MS Office Suite - inc MS Teams  • Experience daily use and maintenance of Salesforce.com / SAP or similar CRM tool

销售运营分析师专注于理解和制定销售团队的KPI指标。需要支持销售运营经理，提供清晰的问题挑战分析和业务目标。运用各种工具例如Excel和Tableau来提供详细的至关重要的分析数据对于销售运营分析师的成功是至关重要的。向团队清楚地传达销售管理目标，同时收集日常业务问题反馈。销售运营分析师还需要确保销售团队学会使用各项销售工具来提高工作效率。最后，分析师还要能为销售经理和销售运营团队提供专业性建议，应对日常工作中的挑战，采取措施克服困难。  主要职责 为销售管理团队提供详细精确的每周、每月、每季度的报告来支持业务目标 在相关报告、客户关系管理系统、销售运营流程等方面，给现场销售组织团队提供支持 和每个层级的销售管理团队交流调研结果 确保及时递交准确可靠的标准报告 根据销售团队的需求，完成临时报告请求 开发高效的销售工具，整合运营流程 为了完善新品推出的流程，提供IT销售工具的培训 简明，清晰的与区域销售经理沟通，评估销售可提升的潜力 创建和维护用于销售组织管理的详细Excel模型 其他职责：根据业务发展需要，完成管理层指定的其他工作 岗位要求： 本科及以上学历； 对数据敏感，优秀的数据分析能力和逻辑分析能力，能独立解决跨部门和跨组织的问题； 有较强的抗压力，能在快节奏、充满活力、结果导向的环境中工作；

Responsibilities:  The position holder is responsible for the management and coordination of sales activities within a designated sales territory by applying knowledge of the KJLC organization, products and services.  Totally understand company’s policies and instructions; always stand on the side of company to manage the Inside sales team.  To successfully lead and manage the Asia Countries sales team to reach the sales goal, develop and facilitate the penetration of strategic accounts within the territory, leading to increased business and profitability.  Manage Asia Reps to reach the Asia Sales Goal.  Effectively communicate “market” and competitor information to the Asian General Manager.  Provide daily work reports, sales reports and any other reports required by Asia General Manager on time.  This position is a proactive and results orientated sales role and will be measured accordingly.  Fully accept and follow KJLC’s Mission, Value and also leading your team to accept and follow company’s cultures and policies.  Key Job Elements: Be fully responsible for regional sales and business’ development. Totally understand company’s requirements and instructions. Qualify all incoming leads and requests under US,UK Government Bureau of Export Administration’s published information, follow up on all required compliance. Fully support and in conjunction with KLTC Sales Manager and Asia General Manager (AGM) on sales development. Work as a manager, always be positive and set up a good example for team and other department Daily contact with territory sales team, management and other departments, to coordinate and review activities within the territory. Manage and develop Asia Reps to contribute the sales business in the Territory. Lead Asia Countries Inside Sales team work with Asia Reps closely. Organize regular meetings with Asia Reps. Support team members on daily work, issues and others. Support and coordinate other departments on business. Support and grow a profitable sales territory by building and maintaining strong customer relations. Drive the business forward by providing customers with “high level” assistance through advanced selling skills, commercial, value added engineering and supply chain management knowledge. Daily contact with internal sales team and management, to coordinate and review activities within the territory. Respond to customer requests for quotation, technical support, customer service etc. by effectively utilising resources available. Ongoing review，management and development of territory team’s performance through company’s policies, work instructions and employees ‘handbook. Utilise company’s policies to provide proactive direction / actions to manage the sales territory. When required provide and present data and statistical analysis through high level use of Dynamics AX and Saturn reports. To actively identify areas of new business and potential customers within the territory by cold calling and researching fresh business and market opportunities. To maintain accurate records and information on customer accounts using the company’s preferred Customer Record Management (CRM) within Dynamics Ax. To be fully conversant with products within the company catalogue and keep up to date with new technological developments. Full training will be provided on an ongoing basis. To liaise closely with colleagues and recognise opportunities to “cross pollinate” sales initiatives and strategies. Get trainings to improve yourselves and also provide the trainings to the Sales Team. Work closely with HQ, UK Management on sales activities and business development. To provide daily, weekly, quarterly and annually statistical information and reports as requested by AGM to include but not limited to visit plan, call analysis, customer feedback surveys and territory performance reports. Regular overnight travel is a requirement for this role. This will include customer visits, exhibitions, training requirements etc.  Qualifications:  Required Position requires a Bachelor’s degree from an accredited college or university. 3 Years’ Supervisor or Manager experience Good Chinese and English reading, writing, listening and speaking levels are required. Good communication skills Demonstrable positive mental attitude Job related sales and management experience SAP/ERP system experience Non-normal work schedule required International travelling are required(Above 95%).  Preferred Above 10 years’ Sales experience Above 5 years’ Supervisor experience Language skills above Chinese and English Management experience Standards of performance: Be polite, informative and have a professional attitude towards customers, Co-workers and personnel of KJLC Perform duties in a timely, logical and organized manner Be adaptable to change Accept training where needed Safeguard company information and observe company policies at all times Work consistently towards achieving departmental and corporate KPIs Actively take part in the company continuous improvement program (P2) Conduct yourself at all times in line with KJLC Policies Conducts themselves in line with our Mission, Vision, and SPIRIT Values Demonstrate knowledge of and works within KJLC's Quality Management System, including the Quality Policy and Quality Objectives Working Environment: Normal office environment Domestic and international travelling are required Equipment: Standard office equipment. Computer and MS Office Software Package Competencies Make It Happen Level 2 Brand Ambassador Level 2 Innovative Thinking Level 2 Team Player Level 2 Communicator Level 2 Powered by JazzHR  M7CKShubfg
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Machinery, and Mechanical or Industrial Engineering

description: OneBev – www.onebev.net - is a wine & spirits & beverages consultancy, specialized in headhunting best candidates (full-time and part-time agents) in China / Asia. More than 30 wine / spirits / beverages companies from different countries have trusted us to find them more than 40 professionals  One of our clients, an important winery is looking for a China Sales Manager - Wines  Qualifications / Experience  Successful and proven experience selling wine containers to wine importers in China last years. Please write in your CV wine selling numbers in 2021, 2020 and 2019. Selling numbers will be checked by documents and references during the job process  Big network of wine importers – with key purchasers in those wine importers – in China  Wine knowledge WSET or similar  Excellent interpersonal skills, respectful and teamwork oriented with a win-win mindset and can-do attitude  Multi-tasking capabilities  Fluent in Chinese and English languages, spoken and written.  Candidate must be now based in China. Location Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, other cities in China open to be considered  This is a full-time job, if you are working successfully for other wineries as agent / part-time in China is also possible.  Salary package is negotiable regarding the experience of the candidate.

From developing brand new accounts to driving expansion across existing accounts, our Direct Sales team transforms opportunity into action every day. Whether focusing on a geographical area, product line, industry, channel or market segment, their goal is the same: to develop relationships with the end-users of the organization and generate meaningful sales. They are the direct line between our ground-breaking portfolio of product solutions and the desks of satisfied customers. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Account Executive, Direct Sales on our Outside Sales team in shanghai. What you’ll achieve   Key Responsibilities: As a Account executive, you will be responsible for building strong customer relationships in the field and ensuring a great customer experience with existing and potential customers .   You will:  -Develop an understanding of customers’ business and solution requirements -Gain share of wallet/spend across Dell Technologies portfolio of technology solutions: server, storage, networking, software, security and managed services -Manage territory/accounts, including account planning, sales forecasting, engaging cross-functional resources and working with the virtual teams to ensure alignment across the organizations -Regularly engage with decision makers at client facilities in performing primary duties -Provide sales leadership and experience on large, complex sales opportunities -Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements:  -Extensive experience selling technology solutions and expertise of market trends that impact on Dell Technologies customers -World-class customer management and strategic selling skills to enhance the success of our customers’ business and the growth of Dell Technologies -Strong communication, collaboration, negotiation and executive presentation skills and ability to provide insight and thought leadership to senior/CIO/CXO leadership and next two levels down -Ability to work in a fast-paced entrepreneurial environment -Bachelor’s degree (BSc/BA) or equivalent experience   Desirable Requirements: -Data center sales experience is plus -5 years or more relevant work experience   Here’s our story; now tell us yours Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress. What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more. We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today. You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here. Application closing date: 30th Jan 2021 Dell is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Dell are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV Status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Dell will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. Dell encourages applicants of all ages. Read the full Equal Employment Opportunity Policy here.

jobTitle: Associate Sales Director Out Of Home Channel, Beverage Fund
description: ZX Ventures is a global incubator, operator, and venture capital team backed by Anheuser-Busch InBev. We are a small army of futurists, dreamers, doers, designers, engineers, scientists, marketers, brewers, builders, and data geeks. From operating leading craft breweries, eCommerce sites, technology products and retail operations to investing in innovative third-party companies, ZX Ventures is accelerating the future. description: 职位介绍：  销售运营分析师，需要专注于根据销售市场数据（包含但不限于traffic、订单、TSS、TD等）对市场变化、门店销售数据做出正确判断，在保证产品特性的讲解和客户体验效果前提下，通过优化资源配置，覆盖足够客流且保证完善每一个客户的产品体验，促进销售提升；同时也会根据对业务的理解在市场活动设计、实施、改进环节如实追踪并提出改善建议，化繁为简。从而达成“营造更好的品牌和产品口碑“的业务目标；最后，基于对交付数据统计，销售运营分析师需要对各种销售数据（包含但不限于客诉案例、Goodwill统计和分析、CS/IS/Delivery 各个端口收集到的客户反馈）进行整合和运营设计实施，并以业务结果进行短、中、长期验证，且对方案持续改善。  主要职责： 数据分析及洞察，提升管理可视化； l 以订单预估、Pipeline转化、订单质量三大业务管理模块为核心，搭建数据分析工具。并依据数据给予相应的洞察及分析；及时发现异常并预警；  l 通过工具的设计及追踪，推动各层级管理者数据化管理的思路；  l 根据业务需要，可以设立并带领区域项目（以数据撬动业务改变） 推动组织效率提升 通过与跨部门的合作及业务重点，推动区域资源最大 l 与BD/CRM协同管理区域预算，及市场活动计划（预算提报、活动频率、活动对象等），最大化开口扩大，提升销售线索数量与质量；  l 与HRBP/Training 协同管理门店HC及展厅运营标准，基于市场Traffic的变化，通过门店运营资源，提升和优化门店运营水平；  l 与超充/家充，置换/金融，交付协同提升区域订单质量；  l 与MKT/PR/GR/垂媒合作，推动线上传播及转化；  l 与交付团队协同优化流程，搭建以简化客户时间成本、提升体验的交付流程； 其他 l 组织并参加跨部门会议，深入到部门的核心问题讨论中；  l 与中央BA紧密合作，帮助全国政策和系统更新在区域的落地与推动；  l 销售系统更新推动落地与问题反馈；  岗位要求：  本科及以上学历，五年以上工作经验，有团队管理经验优先；  熟练的英文、办公软件技能；  优秀的数据敏感度，能从海量数据提炼核心结果，有丰富的数据分析经验；  良好的沟通能力与影响力；具备大数据处理能力，熟练掌握运用Excel，SQL，Tableau，Power BI等工具；  熟悉销售交付业务逻辑、系统逻辑及产品知识;熟悉销售逻辑及业务全流程并有独立见解；

The person will be responsible for development of Chinese restaurants, night Life and traditional off trade channel.  In order to deliver commercial objectives, he/she will work closely with local/HQ sales 职责描述： - Trade Toolkit Development: Develop & own trade program toolkits aligned with brand & sales insights, different channel solutions as well as highend strategy for Highend Brands (Corona, Hoegaarden, Blue Girl) in full channels, includes off-trade (KA/KBKC/CVS/TT) and on-trade (Western, Chinese Restaurants and Night Life)  - HQ-Led Trade activations: develop impactful and premium trade activation campaign according to brand calendar and make sure high quality and on time launch. - POCM Management: Develop and manage POCMs, and Giftpacks  - Sales package management: FY sales package budgeting and Tracking. About ForwardX:  ForwardX Robotics is a leading developer of AI-empowered mobile robotics for the manufacturing, logistics, and retail industries. Offering a wide range of vision-first Autonomous Mobile Robots (AMRs) and intelligent fleet management software, ForwardX’s solutions help supply chain operations automate material handling tasks in their facilities, from warehouses to production floors. Developer of the most intelligent AMRs on the market, ForwardX’s core competencies include computer vision, machine learning, and advanced robotics. With a huge need in the market for our solutions and massive market potential, ForwardX is looking for a go-getter to join our team as International Sales & Business Development Manager.  About the Job:  Responsibilities: •     Perform competitive and SWOT analyses to gain a deeper understanding of the market and target industries •     Define, execute and effectively communicate ForwardX’s sales and business development strategy and operational plans. •     Initiate and develop relationships with key sales & business development prospects to identify and meet their business needs •     Draft and review contracts for prospective customers and partners •     Analyze and evaluate potential partnership deals and opportunities •     Manage sales and business development pipelines and set targets •     Manage key partner accounts and serve as their main point of contact to deliver project success •     Create and deliver tailored business proposals and presentations •     Identify new commercial opportunities to increase revenues on a global market •     Provide outstanding customer service through prompt and accurate support and advice •     Track, trace, and communicate regular updates on key performance indicators to business-wide stakeholders •     Cultivate an in-depth knowledge of our business products and value propositions within the context of the European & North American markets  About You:  Qualifications required: •     Bachelor’s degree required; MBA preferred •     Fluent written & spoken English & Chinese •     5+ years of sales or business development experience within industrial robotics, logistics, or manufacturing industries in Japan •     Demonstrated track record overseeing sales & business development as evidenced by contributions to organization revenue and growth  Values required: •     Entrepreneurial - You are always looking for ways to solve problems and appreciate that it is up to us to go out and make things happen. •     Analytical - You are adept at conducting research to better understand and evaluate the business, its position in the market, and the viability of potential opportunities. •     Adaptable - You are able to adapt your communication style and express your thoughts in a way that is easily understood by those around you. •     Organized & Accountable - You take responsibility for your work and identify and manage stakeholders internally and externally •     Positive - You understand that a deal can always be made and that it is up to you to find a way to make that happen. •     Strategic - You have experience developing and implementing successful expansion strategies and understand the various areas of business development •     Relationship-focused - You understand how to build, manage, and leverage relationships inside and outside of your immediate network. •     Motivated - You are able to self-motivate and motivate those around you to meet the high expectations you set for yourself and others. •     Composed - You are experienced in and excel when working to time-bound targets and actively seek to meet and exceed the targets set.

jobTitle: KERING EYEWEAR Sales Development Manager (GO TO MKT)
description: About us  Kering Eyewear is the world leader in Luxury and Hi-End Eyewear (Frames & Sunglasses), developing a unique ‘ensemble’ of powerful brands. We design, develop, manufacture and market to customers and consumers, the most desirable frames and sunglasses in two fast growing segments: Luxury and Sport & Lifestyle. Through our industry expertise, we empower our brands to go beyond their limits in this high potential business category, supporting their capacity to lead and innovate in Eyewear, to realize their artistic and financial potential, in the most imaginative and sustainable manner.  We are currently seeking a Sales Development Manager who will report to National Sales Development Manager in Kering Eyewear China  Your opportunity  The potential candidate will need to be customer-oriented and autonomous, who will solve issues proactively and seek for improvements continuously.  How you will contribute     Develop optical channel and brand strategy to in line with corporate strategy including but not limited to sales policy and go to market activity plan. Initiate and manage annual trading term frame by channel and customer level to in line with business development strategy. Strategic budget allocation (including marketing and trade resource) to tie with business priority and fulfill business growth. Develop integrated instore VM solution for upgrading retail experience under local initiative and global guideline. Define trade activities like POP UP/CRM/Brand Month on brand strategy and business plan. Analyze results and provide fully comprehensive reports of trade activities in local market. Work closely with cross function team to ensure that campaign/plan is aligned across all channel or customer. Cooperate with field sales team on top client/top store management. Lead and facilitate key project like Mystery Shopper and play critical role in project working team.  Who you are    Fluent in Mandarin and English (both written and oral) - French or Italian knowledge is a plus Self-motivated and being proactive in a start-up environment Analytical and logical thinking In-depth knowledge of Office Pack (Outlook, Power Point, Word) Ambitious and flexible and a team player by heart  work with us?[LYRC2]                            is a fabulous opportunity to join the Kering Eyewear adventure and and to actively contribute to the development of the business by becoming part of a thriving Company in a global Luxury Group that offers endless possibilities to learn and grow. Talent development is a managerial principle at Kering and we are committed to fostering internal mobility. Our common vision promotes leadership skills and helps every employee to reach their full potential in a stimulating and fulfilling workplace environment.  Kering is committed to building a diverse workforce. We believe diversity in all its forms – gender, age, nationality, culture, religious beliefs and sexual orientation – enriches the workplace. It opens up opportunities for people to express their talent, both individually and collectively and it helps foster our ability to adapt to a changing world. As an Equal Opportunity Employer we welcome and consider applications from all qualified candidates, regardless of their background.  [LYRC1]This paragraph remains the same for all JDs

What does dLocal do?  dLocal is the #1 payments leader focused on emerging markets and helps some of the best companies in the world expand in emerging countries. Global brands such as Amazon and Google rely on us to increase conversion by eliminating complexity and managing their payments expansion effortlessly. As both a payments processor and a merchant of record where we operate, we make it simple and risk-free for our client partners to make inroads into the world’s fastest-growing, emerging markets.  What’s the opportunity?  dLocal is looking for a full-time, results driven talent for our growing sales team. The ideal candidate is merchant-focused and able to take smart risks based on solid strategy and deep customer understanding. Experience in payments and other financial systems is definitely a plus.  What will I be doing? Sell dLocal's payment solutions to e-commerce cross-border merchants and PSPs generating new business. Structure, implement, and manage growth-related operational strategies and processes. Identify opportunities to secure new business by establishing relationships with clients and prospects Build and develop long-term strategic partnerships with Global merchants. Close new business deals by coordinating requirements, developing and negotiating contracts Identify new sales opportunities within existing accounts to broaden the scope of services offered to existing clients. Maintain personal networks, participate in and attend professional conferences and industry events, and develop other means of generating interest from potential clients Help our sales team as a regional expert.  What skills do I need? Chinese resident who is passionate about emerging markets, open to constant change in an ambiguous, fast paced environment. A self-starter, open to work across time zones with teams from all over the world 5+ years of sales experience, preferably at a technology company, with a track record of top performance Experience in payments or other financial systems and thorough knowledge of the market Proven success partnering and working cross-functionally to make things happen Established business network Exceptional communication skills and ability to solve tough problems Team player who can effectively lead a project or participate as an effective team member as well as work cross-functionally with other organizations Proven deal closer and strong negotiator Fluent English is a must. Other languages are a plus! Able to travel domestically ~25% of the time  What happens when I apply?  First, apply so we can review your CV. We will then reach out to you by email if we find that your profile is a fit for our role and schedule a virtual interview via Google Meets with HR. You will be updated regarding the specific steps along the process. If you don’t hear from us this time, don’t worry! We’re constantly updating our careers page with new positions, make sure to come back and apply for a different one!  Check out our or our instagram @dlocalteam for more about dLocal!  Powered by JazzHR  J0UwIZ3u7l

OATLY is a leading global oat-based company (NASDAQ:OTLY). For over 25 years, we have exclusively focused on developing expertise around oats, and been developing the inherent properties of this cultivated crops to promote human health and sustainability. Our commitment to oats has resulted in core technical advancements that enabled us to unlock the breadth of the dairy portfolio, including alternatives to milks, ice cream, yogurt, cooking creams, and spreads. Headquartered in Malmö, Sweden, the Oatly brand is available in more than 20 countries globally.  Main Responsibility:  -       To set up sales forecast procedure and optimize sales forecast tools to improve sales forecast accuracy -         -       To gather rolling sales forecast by SKU by customer from all channels and regions on monthly basis and analyze the forecast data based on target, sell-in & sell-out history, sales plan and marketing activities  -       To align with region & channel heads to finalize and release final forecast  -       To coordinate between sales team and supply chain team to ensure getting enough inventory to meet the sales requirement to avoid OOS situation  -       To monitor daily sales and analyze reasons of forecast deviation. To alert and take correction and improvement actions in case of oversales or short sales to avoid overstock or OOS  -       To update regular analysis report for FC deviation  -       Support SOP team to monitor slow moving items  -       To consolidate 18 months sales forecast to make 18 months rolling demanding planning to get more production capacity for Asia market  -       To cooperate with PPT to include new SKUs to sales forecast to ensure launch of new SKUs to market   Capability:  -       Good communication skills  -       Business oriented, paying to details and result driven  -       With ownership and initiatives  -       good level of written English and fluent in oral English  -       Strong analytical skills and good at excel   Education background:  -       Bachelor degree or above  Working experiences:  more than 8 years working experience in foreign invested company in FMCG, especially food and beverage

description: We are currently working with an internationally oriented and a leader in the Maritime & Offshore industry. This company is a manufacturer of Ballast Water Treatment Systems and is a market leader within the global Maritime market selling their BWTS to the Shipyards and ShipOwners. We specialise in a unique technology of BWT which has increase demand within the market.  We are currently recruiting a Country Sales Manager to performs a leading role within the business who has previous experience selling some form of marine equipment/technology to either the Shipowner, Ship Management, Cruise, Offshore or the shipyards. This person will have sales objectives for assigned target markets, products and services in the relation to the Ballast Water Treatment Systems reaching the established agreed upon targets and goals set by the VP of Sales. We are looking for someone who has experience building relations with shipyards and shipowners within Hong Kong. They must establish, maintain and expand their customer base while servicing the needs of existing customers and increasing business opportunities through various routes to market.  Responsibilities Oversee the development of business plans and strategies for a specific product, target market or geographical area Conduct sales forecast to determine company financial objectives and target markets for a product/service Establishing and maintaining relationships with suppliers, agents and other partners if appropriate Visit existing and potential clients to offer products/services and to elaborate on product features Contact current and potential customers via cold calls, emails, and arranged meetings to secure sales deals and contract  Qualifications Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience Sales experience; Work within the Maritime & Offshore markets. Experience in sales with a successful track record selling into shipowners. Excellent communication skills in general with excellent presentation skills. Ability to read and interpret contracts, to identify potential risks and liabilities. Strong numerical and analytical abilities. Proficiency in Microsoft Office programs, such as Word, Excel and PowerPoint. First class consultative sales skills.

MAIN PURPOSE  The purpose of the position is to play a key role between Supply Demand team, Retail and Logistics Teams to guarantee that Retail stock is in the right quantities, at the right boutique at the right time.  Working in close relationship with the boutiques of respective region, the Stock Executive analyses cities and boutiques strengths, collect qualitative feedback in order to maximize sales potential.  In addition, the Stock Executive is responsible to monitor & control Btq stock movements and inventory accuracy, manage and implement Btq operations process to meet all compliance requirements.  ………………………………………………………………………………………………………………..  Key Responsibilities  Key responsibility 1 – Evaluate BTQ Stock Needs and execute stock arrangements Analyze BTQ sales performance, potential, stock needs to arrange stock rebalancing & allocation to help maximize sales. Review BTQ/shopping mall event, competitors’ stock/activities with Retail Team, photo-shooting needs, Staff Sales/Purchase… to identify specific stock needs. Actively prepare sales peak seasons with appropriate stock plan and anticipated schedule to guarantee smooth operations at boutique side. Execute allocation / rebalancing plan / return to DC. Liaise with Logistics for transportation arrangements. ………………………………………………………………………………………………………… Key responsibility 2 – Plan BTQ opening/closure/renovation Liaise and align with Retail team the whole schedule for stock management and update/communicate whenever appropriate to concerned parties. Coordinate with Supply Demand team for stock reservation quantities and MDS (de)activation. ………………………………………………………………………………………………………….. Key responsibility 3 – Manage communication, boutiques’ inquiries, requests and firm orders Proactively communicate stock situation and information to BTQs Provide training to Stock Controller whenever necessary Timely record all BTQ product inquiries & firm orders for all categories and make sure to provide answers within an acceptable timeframe. ………………………………………………………………………………………………………….. Key responsibility 4 – Monitor Compliance execution, stock quality and Certificates/Packaging management, stock accuracy, supervise internal Audit& Stock take Following the guidelines defined by BD Team, monitor product compliance execution at Btq level, incl. labels updates, certificate checking (CMA, GIA), price updates, watch sticker expiry date, CITES, hallmarks engraving and other related compliance issues. Follow up with CS for some compliance requirements. Collaborate with Btq Stock Controllers to closely manage certificates and packaging (including component kit). Timely inform boutiques of any change in cross-packaging. Handle and supervise the workflow for different nature of repair and defective claims. Follow up with Logistic team to complete within reasonable time frame. Regularly review Btq issues & process and propose solution or new workflow. Support auditing and stock take by actively helping boutiques to prepare (check-list, labels reprinting if needed…). Follow up on stock take results and take timely action if there is any discrepancy. ………………………………………………………………………………………………………………..  Experience  QUALIFICATIONS  5years experience in retail/FMCG industry Allocation, distribution experience preferred SAP knowledge is needed Strong logical thinking, analytical ability and sensitive to data Able to handle multiple tasks simultaneously, business oriented, self-motivated, flexible and adaptable in changing environment Strong coordination and communication skill with internal / external dept Collaborative and respectful team player ………………………………………………………………………………………………………………..  Dimension Headcount supervised : 0 Internal contacts: Strong functional line of reporting with: Assistant Sales Operation Manager Work closely with Supply Demand team, Regional Retail team, BTQs, Business Development Regular communication with Finance team, Logistics team, External BTQs, Compliance

Job Description Summary  渠道销售支持和渠道开发职责。向合作伙伴和分销商销售或通过其进行销售。GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  角色与职责  向合作伙伴和分销商销售或通过其进行销售。可能包括渠道销售支持和渠道开发职责。 利用自身和他人的销售领域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群的深入知识，并运用分析思维和商业经验来执行政策/策略。 具有最佳实践知识以及了解自己的领域如何与他人融合；了解竞争以及在市场上与众不同的因素 运用判断力，并具有在设定参数之外提出不同解决方案的能力，以解决项目、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户的更复杂的日常问题。为决策制定信息优先级的能力。利用技术经验和分析思维。使用多种内部资源和自身团队之外有限的外部资源来帮助做出决定。 这些销售职位将主要由个人贡献者担任。此级别的职位需要强大的人际交往能力。充当经验较少的同事的资源。可能会领导具有低风险和资源需求的小型项目。说明信息；培养使团队成员就领域的话题达成共识的技能。传达绩效期望，并可以处理敏感问题。  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有较丰富的工作经验。学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够影响他人并领导小型团队。领导中等范围和影响的计划。能够同时协调多个项目。有效的问题识别和解决技能。可靠的分析和组织能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.  Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. description: HENKEL IS FOR THOSE WHO STEP UP. DO YOU?  At Henkel, you can make a difference and craft your career. That’s why you own your projects and take full responsibility from an early stage. Our unique brands in markets around the world open up countless opportunities to follow your convictions and explore new paths. If you have an entrepreneurial mindset that allows you to always think out of the box - take the chance and shape the digital future together with us.  At Henkel, we promote a holistic Diversity & Inclusion approach. The diversity of our employees, their backgrounds, experiences, talents, knowledge, creativity, and the appreciation of all their individual differences are the foundation for our competitive advantage. As a multinational corporation, Henkel employs people from 120 nations in almost 80 countries. About 85 percent of our employees work outside of Germany, with more than half of them in emerging markets. Role Profile  Mission of the role  (Why does the position exists, within what limits and according to what objectives)     Consumer Healthcare Business is a priority growth area for Danone China, and the team is hiring an Online Sales Manager to launch and grow new Consumer Healthcare business across online platforms across Ali / JD and social ecommerce platforms. This role offers a rare opportunity to be an intrapreneur in a priority growth area at Danone China.The role takes the responsibility of developing online business for the new portfolio, also need to develop new capabilities for the startup approach of building consumer oriented business model and identifying key bets for future     •        Develop and acceleration business growth in eCommerce customers.  •        Achieve yearly sales target and gain share  •        Establish good collaboration and relationship with customers.  •        Good communication with customer and cross function teams to ensure good cooperation        Areas of Responsibility  Key Responsibility  Description(tasks)  Develop and acceleration business growth in eCommerce customers.     •        Lead annual business plan with relatively accurate demand forecast  •        Lead innovation development  •        Collaborate with trade marketing on pricing strategy            Achieve yearly sales target and gain share     •        Make solid sales plan monthly, quarterly and yearly，update sales process timely to ensure sales process is on track  •        Ensure good resources in customer to ensure sales process is on track  •        Follow sales plan and timely analyze results, adjust sales plan according to root cause  Establish good collaboration and relationship with customers  •        Get insights from timely review and market changing  •        Co work or lead customers to explore business engine  Good Communication in internal and external cooperation  •        Be good at listening and asking to find key business issue and opportunity  •        Good communication skill to increase customer emotional relationship  KPIs  1.       Yearly sales target achievement rate  2.       Market share achievement  3.       Accuracy and timely data sharing

description: The candidate for this position will excel at creating and closing new opportunities. By using a consultative approach to selling, this person will use their expertise to identify and qualify leads, leading to sales opportunities with both new and existing customers.   Responsibilities Meet and exceed sales targetsreate new business opportunities by identifying prospects and evaluating their position within the industry; researching and analyzing sales options Establish contact and develop relationships with prospects; recommending solutions Maintain relationships with clients by providing support, information and guidance; researching and recommending new opportunities; recommending profit and service improvements Assist with developing, organising and implementing sales and marketing activities Track and meet sales targets Plan, manage and attend meetings, tastings and events across Mainland China Essential Requirements: Proven track record of experience as a sales representative for a minimum of 3 years Proficiency in MS Office Numerically literate, comfortable working with numbers, making sense of metrics and processing figures with spreadsheets Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills Excellent time management skills and ability to multi-task and prioritize work Existing network in wine and spirit beverage industry in Mainland China essential A self-starter, able to be left to own devices, make decisions and achieve results Attention to detail and problem-solving skills Excellent written and verbal communication skills Strong organizational and planning skills in a fast-paced environment A creative mind with an ability to suggest improvements Analytical skills  Qualifications 2-5 years' quota carrying sales experience Experience and working knowledge of CRM systems Demonstrable track record of over-achieving quota Strong written and verbal communication skills Ability to communicate effectively in Mandarin & English

Who is Glorious?  Glorious is a lifestyle gaming hardware company that was built by passionate enthusiasts on a mission. We develop pro-grade, high-quality gear that gives every gamer the chance to play at an ascended level.  Candidates from all over are welcome to apply and possibly become part of an amazing line-up of team members dedicated to pushing the boundaries of possibility and shifting the PC gaming industry's status quo! We offer attractive salary and benefits packages along with the chance to work within an environment where you will have the freedom and flexibility to take the reins on your career. So, if you're someone who wants to see real career growth while testing your skills in a fast-paced environment free of micromanagement, then this is the place for you!  The Role:  As a Sales Manager, you will be responsible for multiple countries within your territory and the key accounts which are within each country of your territory. You will lead, create and execute effective sales strategies toward the achievement of the sales targets while company-wide objectives and key responsibilities are taken care of. This position has a strong emphasis on ensuring products are made available in every country via key e-tailers, retailers, and depending on a country/territory size distributors.  You will be expected to perform sales forecasts, secure the right accounts and build a healthy supply chain with them and provide daily managerial support to the company’s sales leadership. You will be expected to form relationships with existing authorized distributors and retailers but also form new ones as your territory and countries require. Internally you have to be prepared to distribute sales reporting to the sales leaders on a weekly and monthly basis. The position requires strong mathematical skills as well as verbal and written communication competencies.  As you grow with our company, this position has the opportunity to grow the sales team further by onboarding specific country sales representatives into our sales team within your territory and thus managing a team. You will be part of expanding the sales network of potentially one of the fastest expanding pc gaming input and output device brands in the world. The number one priority for this role will be establishing outstanding relationships with e-tail, retail, and distribution partners in multiple countries within your territory. This position reports to the VP of Sales at Glorious and works collaboratively with members of our Sales, Logistics, and Operational teams.  Primary Responsibilities:  Some of the duties that will be expected of this position include, but are not limited to the following: Serve as the main point of contact and owner of all engagements with all accounts - responsible for driving revenue, share, and customer satisfaction within your territory and the countries within. Managing all sales development aspects with a primary focus on product availability, sales revenue growth, ideal brand, and product positioning, and a healthy sellout pipeline. Providing exceptional customer relationships by educating customers on products, monitoring and reviewing customer performance for sales optimization, ensuring smooth communication, and managing operational excellence. Representation of the brand, building on our brand reputation to deepen existing relationships while building new ones Understanding competitors including marketing activities, pricing strategies, promotions, market share of key accounts, channel, inventory/supply details Working with the Marketing team to drive programs/events to increase brand exposure, and to improve digital displays in retail stores and displays in retail stores. Managing channel margin structure and pricing. Product planning and Inventory control: managing distributor and key accounts' inventory, in-store SKU selection, order planning of fast-moving products, new SKU availability, and development of a reasonable stock-reach within the supply chain. Providing weekly and monthly reporting of sales forecasts and sellout and taking proactive action to ensure channel inventory is maintained healthy.  Requirements  Requirements/Skills:  These must be met to be considered for this role: 5+ years in sales management or business development in either of the three following categories is required: Consumer Electronics - gaming related is a plus. PC Components - gaming-related is a plus. Gaming peripheral categories mainly gaming mice and mechanical keyboards headsets/headphones. Ability to work cross-functionally, influencing others to achieve results. Proven success prospecting, building a pipeline, moving opportunities through the sales cycle; proposing, presenting, and discussing solutions. Proficiency in working with CRMs, ERPs, ASANA, CONFLUENCE, or similar. Proven track record in customer relationship building in serving targeted distribution and channel customers. Experience working with NetSuite, Asana, Slack, Confluence, or alike is a big plus. Capability to prioritize and organize effectively with moderate supervision. High proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Word, and or Google equivalents.

Responsibilities 1. Drive the sales strategy for the team 2. Drive Consultancy Sales and proactively create demand within the account. 3. Coordinate the sales process within the sales team. 4. Manage business development efficiency related to deals in the account. 5. Shape and close deals, working collaboratively with the Client Service Lead and LOBs’ Lead. 6. Provide oversight for the account’s most critical and/or complex opportunities: - Lead negotiations. - Contribute to management of client expectations by setting the initial expectations effectively. 7. Drive cross-LOBs services sales within the account, defining sales strategies, capabilities and references to support the expansion of application maintenance and managed services of EDMS. 8. Close the loop by providing feedback to service and/or product offering teams around competitive intelligence and product/service innovation.  Qualifications 1. Bachelor or master degree on Technology related. 2. Familiar with international financial institution working style and culture, ability to engage these stakeholders effectively 3. 10 years or more sales experience in IT or ICT services industry with 2-3 years or more sales experience focusing on key account. Sales team management experience with solid sales performance. 4. Excellent professional business discipline 5. Key account/client domain knowledge 6. Ability to strategies sales strategy 7. Good sales acumen 8. Good Communication skills 9. Understand and ability to apply social styles technique to manage stakeholders

We are looking for a Territory Sales Manager to join our excellent China Intelligent Mobility Solutions China team.  Our ideal candidate has a significant automotive technical background,customer-facing experience, and project management skills. This is an exciting opportunity to take part in the Automated Driving revolution.  What will your job look like? You will be ME’s local representative for mobility innovation in China. Key role of the formulation of the company's long-term marketing strategy, formulate the company's annual sales plan, and ensure the achievement of the company's annual target, new market / customer development. Working independently and be fully authorized to develop multiple sales tools, sales channel establishment and channel system management in own territory. Managing the solution part of ADAS integrated solution tender processes. Approach and managing communication with customers like PTO, NTC, Logistic Fleet, System integrators, mobility start-ups, etc., asking for ADAS integrated solutions. Leading the process of tailoring solutions according to customer’s requirements based on Mobileye's products portfolio. Organize the project team, responsible for the promotion and implementation of the project. Establish intermediary technical communication between the customers and Mobileye internal China and HQ. This requires managing expectations between ME and the customers. Conduct research and writing Business Intelligence technical reports on topics related to Mobileye roadmap. Manage advanced development projects. All you need is:  Around 10 years experiences as sales at automotive and mobility industry  Familiar with domestic intelligent networking and automatic driving industry Familiar with Regulation, Legislation, Government Planning, Policy, etc.  Familiar with the approaching and communication with Local Authority, like MOT, MIIT, etc.  Familiar with Mobileye ADAS relative Product and technology  Independent, proactive, Strong motivation, Best communication  Fluent English (written and spoken)  Fluent Chinese (written and spoken)  Mobileye changes the way we drive, from preventing accidents to semi and fully autonomous vehicles. If you are an excellent, bright, hands-on person with a passion to make a difference come to lead the revolution!

HCL Software is the Software Business Unit of HCL Technologies. We have 20+ products in our Software Suite including - BigFix, Workload Automation, AppScan, DevOps, Domino, Notes, Connections, Same Time, Unica, Verse, Digital Experience, Commerce, Mainframe Solutions. We are building a Sales Development Team in India & Malaysia and we are looking for Sales Development Rep.  • Have a strong passion to be in an enterprise selling role. • Understanding of SaaS You will be responsible for lead generation and qualification driving new business, in close cooperation with the Inside Sales Account Manager in your territory. • We are looking for a dynamic Lead Generation & Business Development Reps for business development activities with prior experience in software product sales • Follow-up on inbound marketing leads and identify qualified opportunities providing appropriate levels of information at the right time for interested prospects Cold call into prospects generated by variety of outside sources Nurture new marketing leads by educating and developing prospects until they are ready to speak with a field sales rep. Ensure successful follow through of sales cycle by maintaining accurate activity and lead qualification information in CRM application  Key Responsibilities: Be a strategic thinker, always thinking a couple steps ahead. Comfortable in high-stress situations and passionate about identifying solutions. Strong verbal and written communication skills Excellent organisational, time and self-management skills. description: Oversee OTB, shipment sales forecast, store sales forecast, commercial policy and special sales project are all aligned with company financial strategy and merchandizing strategy.  -Responsibilities 1.    Cooperate with franchise operation team to manage seasonal financial targets (OTB) for dealers, to ensure top-down targets align with bottom-up plans and category strategy. 2.    Oversee franchise store sales performance, consumer trends and product insights. 3.    Present analysis to franchise sales operation team on consumer trends and sales performance, to help them identify risks and opportunities and take appropriate actions in achieving financial targets (OTB). 4. 职位概述 该岗位作为大客户销售经理(Key Account Sales Manager)，负责建材事业部全国范围内大客户业务的开拓和维护工作，直接汇报给事业部总经理。工作地点在上海。   工作职责 承担相应销售任务，负责市场的大客户开拓及维护; 跟进大客户资源，运用项目营销方式推进销售进程，向目标客户提供有针对性的整体招聘解决方案，确保完成既定销售任务。 不断挖掘客户的潜在价值，以达成客户与公司间最大价值的合作方式; 开发、维护、巩固、提升与客户的关系; 与客户保持良好沟通，及时收集和反馈客户信息，积极协调和统筹公司内外资源，不断提升客户满意度; 与客户及公司各支持部门保持良好沟通。   岗位要求 本科及以上学历; 5年以上大客户销售经验，有建筑相关销售经验优先考虑； 有良好的独立工作和处理问题的能力，适应经常出差； 思维敏捷，沟通表达能力强，有较好的亲和力和团队协作能力； 有良好的职业素养，具有拼搏精神，愿与公司一起成长。

The position of Sales Manager is responsible for contributing to corporate sales efforts by building, training, cultivating and managing highly effective territorial sales coverage through a team of direct sales people and network of representatives. The Sales Manager is responsible for sales of all KJLC products and services for various research and production applications, including but not limited to: semiconductor manufacturing, automotive coatings, advanced optical technologies, aerospace, medical devices and solar cells. The Sales Manager will effectively communicate with Global Headquarters in the USA to develop sales strategies as well as implement and monitor the annual sales budget. The sales manager shall directly report to the Asia General Manager (AGM) and fully support the AGM on sales development.  Key Job Elements: Manage and work with regional sales managers to reach their sales goals and contribute to the growth of corporate profits. Daily communication with territory sales teams, management and other departments, to coordinate and review activities within the territories. Train, develop and manage inside and outside sales personnel. This includes establishing sales incentive programs and training plans including on-boarding and management training. Responsible for ensuring that all relevant documented processes are followed by sales personnel. Responsible for providing market feedback, sales territory analysis and participating in corporate marketing efforts. Lead Generation – manage sales team to develop new customers, participate in marketing campaigns, tradeshows and seminars. Solution Selling – develops sales team to consult with customers to understand their needs and works to provide multi-product/service solutions. Relationship Management – develops and manages relationships with current customers to develop additional business while ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction. Information Tracking and Reporting – ensures sales teams are inputting customer related activity in CRM to assure accurate revenue and product forecasting, captures activity information on a timely basis as customer interactions occur. Provide daily work reports, sales reports and any other reports required by Asia General Manager. Contract Review – leads in the negotiation and review of customer contracts per KJLC’s contract review process. Work with product management, finance, technical support, service teams and other related KJLC personnel to successfully complete the order cycle. Ensure sales personnel are prepared for sales calls. To be fully conversant with products within the company catalogue and keep up to date with new technological developments. Communicate with KJLC Headquarters regularly. Other duties as assigned.  Qualifications Required:  Previous training and experience: Should possess either formal education in engineering/ science or business training with commensurate degree and/or appropriate prior experience. Advanced selling skills, market knowledge (industry knowledge relevant to geographic areas) and technical knowledge are necessary. Must possess ability to analyze client business requirements and develop creative solutions, also utilizes technical resources to complete and to technically assure all sales orders’ accuracy.  Physical Requirements Basic physical requirements encountered in a typical office environment are required. Only light lifting is required. Must be physically mobile and have the ability to travel freely to customer sites typically encountered in university, laboratory, and industrial settings. Excellent Chinese and English reading, writing, listening and speaking levels are required.  Preferred Bachelor’s Degree, Minimum of 5 years of experience in sales management  Standards of performance: Meet and/or exceeding the annual sales targets Thoroughly understand the importance of budgeting. Be able to effectively formulate and monitor the implementation of sales budgets versus revenues/gross profits. Maintain a high level of professionalism and ethics at work. Must possess excellent written and verbal communication skills Must serve as a positive example for other employees. Must provide timely and accurate correspondence both internally and to external customers. Be adaptable to changes in equipment, assignments, procedures, and methods. Safeguard company information by observing company security regulations Work must be performed in a safe manner, safety rules observed, and a high standard of housekeeping maintained. Maintain a positive relationship with assigned existing and potential customers. It is imperative that the individual fully understand the competitive landscapes and market dynamics to maximize total sales and GPs Gross Profits. Demonstrate knowledge of and work within KJLC’s management system, including the Quality Management System. Take initiative to learn new products as they become available. Be able to apply new product knowledge in business development efforts. Responsible for achieving and maintaining a high level of technical competence.  Working Conditions: As a rule, the job will be performed at Asian Headquarters Shanghai Sales Office and remote customer facilities. Working hours are typically 8 hours during normal business hours with an appropriate 1-hour lunch break, but are required as job duties dictate. Moderate to frequent overnight and/or local travel is required, and additional work after hours may be necessary.  Equipment: Must be capable of operating and, to a minor degree, maintaining all typical office equipment (copier, telephone, fax machine, computer, etc). Must be able to operate standard company computer software which is part of the main operating system. Must be able to adapt to new software programs of the company or sales personnel and become proficient in their operations. Must be able to demonstrate for customers any new and/or existing products of the Company. Must be able to demonstrate for customers about company and for any new and/or existing products of the company. Powered by JazzHR  fd3rZvYMof
