Job Description  Develop winning sales strategies and tactics for selling corrugated software/hardware solutions and services to the largest corrugated companies as well as mid-sized independent companies. * Be responsible for all direct sales efforts from lead generation to close. Also responsible for recruiting, training and supporting new and possibly existing referral agents and re-seller partners. * Manage all sales activities within some existing and new enterprise companies within the Corrugated industry as well as some packaging opportunities where management feel like we have a good fit in sales coverage and solution fit. * Build a 1, 3 and 5 year strategic market development and expansion plan that is based on growing from the top tier companies in the region * Develop and nurture existing accounts to maximize reference potential. * Achieve desired "product sales mix" and "buying account mix" with both new and existing accounts through strategic action plans and measured account engagements. * Be expected to present monthly and quarterly reviews detailing progress against targets and milestones * Establish effective communication with appropriate sales and technical managers to ensure proper sensitivity to all sales needs. * Manage all full-cycle sales activities within assigned territory including client development, sales of emerging product and multi-product sales, onsite customer presentations, and sales campaigns. * Provide timely and accurate territory reporting, forecasting to sales management utilizing SalesForce.com. * Follow a 9 step sales process that includes performing discoveries, gaining executive mindshare and buy-in, validating opportunity impact, presenting cash flow and ROI financials relative to budgets, orchestrate and moderate through technical reviews and demonstrations using peer resources as appropriate, configuring final solution offerings, negotiating contractual terms and conditions including all commercial aspects of the sale and properly handing off the new, closed opportunity to the Customer Success team to implement. * Provide regular feedback to marketing, sales and product management regarding products * Utilize all resources during sales process including team sale efforts with product management, professional services, general management and senior leadership when appropriate. * Communicate regularly through personal visits, telephone calls, etc. with key contacts; field traveling is a must (66%). * Attend all assigned tradeshows, open houses, association and other company events. * Achieve booking targets within operating budgets.  The Successful Applicant  Demonstrated history of selling relationships at the C-level with corrugated companies across China and surrounding region. * Demonstrated track record of meeting/exceeding quota in a Sales role with complex sales cycles selling intangible solutions and/or services. Corrugator equipment sales experience also considered. * Experience with enterprise software sales is an advantage * Experience with packaging markets would be an advantage * A "solution selling" sales style and can follow a sales process that is designed to create the need then monetize a solution that returns a positive cash flow and healthy return on investment in a relatively short period of 19-24 months * Passion about opening new accounts, starting new relationships, prospecting and opening new opportunities to do impact business's efficiencies, revenues and profits. * Proven success at starting a selling relationship with something small like a pilot program or 1 location then expanding that into a large enterprise relationship selling multiple locations across multiple products, solutions or services. * Demonstrated proven success in complex sales, ideally of software products. * A good understanding of software technology and can demonstrate the value it brings to the corrugated industry. Packaging experience and market knowledge a plus. * A demonstrated ability to build and execute against a strategic sales plan * A Self-starter ability and can work independently with minimal supervision. * A friendly, hard-working and respectful interpersonal skills, are team oriented and work with a sense of urgency to get things done quickly but precisely. * A solid 5 to 10 years of experience in Corrugated and or associated systems sales * A good understanding of the lifecycle of an order or business processes in the corrugated or packaging business. * Possess the ability to target, acquire and manage new accounts at a high level within the assigned region. * Excellent presentation and negotiation skills. Excellent English verbal and written communication skills.  What's On Offer  Comprehensive training Attractive salary package  Contact: William Zhao  Quote job ref: 4220889

description: Job Summary  DESCRIPTION  Amazon Business Marketplace Account Manager  Amazon is now reinventing on behalf of the business customer and focused on building the largest and most innovative Business-to-Business (B2B) marketplace in the world, and we are recruiting to make this vision a reality. Amazon Business is Amazon’s response to tackle this incredible opportunity to address a vast new market segment and customer base. We are focused on building solutions that enables the B2B customer to find, research, and buy products and services from a vast selection, across multiple devices, marketplaces and regions. Our customers include individual professionals, small businesses to large institutions (and everything in between). Our B2B customers have different needs than the traditional Amazon customer so we are reinventing everything from how we display our selection, price our products, and provide the right customer experience.  Responsibilities  Amazon is seeking a result-driven, self- motivated, passionate and dedicated Account Manager based in Shanghai. Your responsibility is to help CN-based Amazon Marketplace sellers catch the Brand-New Amazon Business(B2B) opportunity, utilize Amazon's suite of products/services to deliver new business growth and maximize revenue generation for them. Meanwhile, you should take initiative to find out business blockers or improvement area, as well as work with Amazon internal teams to move them so as to continually improve sellers’ experience on Amazon. You will prospect, present, and close high potential merchants to our various services and programs.  You should have a track record delivering on unreasonable sales goals. You should also have a-demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges, along with the ability to come up with original approaches and operational improvements. Candidates should be comfortable both in a self-sufficient role, as well as one of team support and interaction. Ownership is extremely important.  Your superior communication, organizational and inside sales skills, will enable you to operate in a fast-moving and sometimes ambiguous environment, where you will have the responsibility for achieving our business objectives. This role provides ample opportunity to develop original ideas, approaches, and solutions in a competitive and fast-moving environment.  Core Responsibility Identify, qualify, and engage with Amazon existing sellers for the Amazon Business- Marketplace while creating a clear value proposition of selling to business customers on Amazon, along with the features and functionality. Meet or exceed quotas, revenue targets, and operational metrics. Analyze the business and conduct deep dive analysis; provide routine executive-level reporting on the Seller’s current business and future opportunities. Publish recommendations and action plans based on data. Assist internal partners to drive change, remove roadblocks, and close business. Advocate on behalf of Sellers and other external stakeholders to influence product roadmap  Basic Qualifications  BASIC QUALIFICATIONS 3+ Year working experience; Highly organized and results oriented; Demonstrated track record of success in client communication or product/service sales roles Strong oral and written communication skills in Mandarin and English; Ability to prioritize work in a complex, fast-paced environment; Data-driven and results focused;  Preferred Qualifications  PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS Ideally experience of working within e-commerce/B2B. Graduate BA or BS degree required, MBA preferred. Cross border eCommerce experience.  Company - Amz(Shanghai)Trade[Shenzhen]  Job ID: A1749702
industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services, and Internet

description: Job Summary:  As a Senior Manager, Travel Trade Sales, you will be responsible for a specific market(s) in formulating and driving the execution of sales strategy, and account optimization for vacation and leisure business. Reporting directly to Director, Travel Trade Sales, and this role is vital to the sustainable business growth from Eastern China including Shanghai, Zhejiang and Jiangsu core markets.  The position and team primarily manage a portfolio of contracted partners in the region, facilitated by the jobholder’s deep understanding of the travel trade industry from a sales and distribution standpoint. You will also manage contracted in-market partners and other non-contracted distributors.  These contracted partners include major traditional and online travel agencies. The position and team have to drive all business development efforts to facilitate sales conversions from travel trade partners, and bring in guests from the responsible source markets into Shanghai Disney Resort.  Moreover, these partners have different business models and focuses, and the candidate is required to work closely with Director, Travel Trade Sales to adapt constantly the ever-evolving business environment in different markets by formulating appropriate strategies and tactics to mobilize travel trade partners, in order to meet revenue goals. Apart from managing core product availability and itinerary inclusion issues with the travel trade partners, you need to lead the team to be the primary owner of all clients and markets-related activities. These include channel marketing promotions (e.g. point-of-sales materials, co-op advertising, business to consumer sales events), product education efforts for all levels within these partners, regular collection and evaluation of market intelligence, identify synergy opportunity with integrated platform etc. With the limited resources, this position needs to constantly lead and optimize resource allocation, and review the distribution effectiveness of each account.    Key Responsibilities:  Achieve revenue target of admission and hotel room by formulating sales and promotion plans for Shanghai Disney Resort products and events to the travel trade in the assigned sales regions; Deepen penetration and market presence in different trade channels; formulate sales and promotion initiatives with trade partners that contribute to the bottom-line and review timely on the distribution efficiency of existing account portfolio; Develop plans and identify online & offline synergy opportunities; Develop, plan, and drive tactical promotions execution, travel fair tactics or advertising campaigns with key partners, to maximize revenue and exposure from the responsible sales regions; Identify the appropriate segment and timing for promotion to maximize effectiveness in reaching sales targets; Critically assess and allocate resources (i.e. co-op marketing budget) for each individual account under own trade portfolio with an objective to assure cost effectiveness to yield the best return (quantified in attendance, room-nights, and promotion exposure) from responsible sales regions; Develop and execute to conduct regular trade education with travel trade partners; Coach and guide team to updated account information, trade and competitors’ intelligence via company dedicated Sales Management System; Responsible for reporting to sales leader in time to understanding the market dynamics; Ensure efficient internal and external communication; maintain a close relationship with all accounts and sales performance and provide constructive guidance on maximizing sales opportunity of each account; Actively participate and provide insights into the preparation of Annual Operating Budget and Quarterly Business planning; Provide status updates and periodical sales reports to senior management and internal partners. This will include weekly, monthly, yearly and ad hoc reports; Collaborate with Marketing, RMA and Sales Strategy & Planning to develop channel sales short and long-term sales strategies, products, and promotions for peak and gap periods; Act as a role model and coaching the sales team to manage accounts effectively and efficiently; ensuring the sales team adheres to the standard sales process and account management framework.   Desired Qualifications:  Request to have solid experience of travel trade experience, plus strong business acumen to identify potential area for business growth and hence prioritization on his/her job focuses. Possess a strong trade network in the responsible sales regions to add value to both the team and company. The candidate needs to possess a high degree of sales savvy and strong negotiation skills, in order to facilitate and deliver complex business deals that maximize marketing exposure and commercial value gains for Shanghai Disney Resort; Strong leadership skills and be able to exhibit a highly innovative business development mindset, to fuel continuous drive in securing new sales opportunities; Require strong negotiation skills to manage a portfolio of trade accounts across multiple sales regions. It involves relatively high complexity in dealing with scarce resource allocation - balancing cost and benefit between the company and travel agents, motivating the trade in a sustainable manner with the ultimate goal of delivering results that in-line with the expectations. This position is highly results-oriented and should be able to work under enormous pressure; Externally, the position has frequent interaction with key management of travel trade partners. Interpersonal skills of negotiation, relating and building rapport are of utmost importance; Internally, the candidate has to work frequently with other cross functions including Distribution Marketing on trade promotional projects, Sales Planning & Business integration on new product initiatives, Sales Services and Finance team on routine operational issues; Proven ability to lead multi-functional projects but with prioritization to gain the efficiency; At least 15+ years’ working experience in relevant industry with five or more years in key account management and sales and marketing is preferred, with minimum 10+ people management experience; Strong communication and negotiation skills with internal teams and external clients; Proven ability to translate plan to action in provided time with experience in strategic planning and problem solving, with the ability to lead multi-functional projects; Bachelor’s degree or above; Computer literacy (Word, Excel,PowerPoint, [RG1] Outlook).
industries: Entertainment, Leisure, Travel & Tourism, and Hospitality

BS degree in Engineering, or related field 大学学士学历, 工程等相关专业. Excellent communication skills with domestic and foreign customers 娴熟的沟通技巧应对中外客户. Previous motion control or mechatronics product knowledge, have existing customer base is preferred 运动控制相关产品的基本知识.  EXPERIENCE: 经验要求 2~3 years working experience, ideally in sales or sales support related to direct machine OEM. 2~3年工作经验 Experienced in motion control（Encoder、Motor、Drive）or mechatronic systems is required. 运动控制相关产品（编码器，电机，驱动）销售经验 Knowledge in Semiconductor/Microelectronics ,  Robotics、Surgical robotics 、Sat-COM、AGV is a plus. 熟悉测试测量,半导体制造, 工业机器人，手术机器人，卫星通讯，AGV等市场  PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES:个人要求 Self motivation and eager to learn Well organized 诚实诚恳 Team oriented 富有团队合作精神 Proactive and responsive interpersonal skills and demonstrated performance in dealing with internal and external customers 处理内外部事务时,具备主动且负责的沟通技巧.

jobTitle: Associate Manager, Sales Planning & Channel Optimization
description: Associate Manager, Sales Planning & Channel Optimization  Job Summary: As an Associate Manager, Sales Planning and Channel Optimization, you are a product support sub-team of Sales Planning and Business Integration. You and the sub-team are responsible for formulating sales product strategy and rendering fulfillment and logistics support to all channels that the Sales organization manage, including Travel Trade Sales, Integrated Platforms (China E-Commerce platforms such as Fliggy, etc.), Business Solution and Events (corporate and social), Youth (school programs), and In-Market.  You need to have a thorough understanding of Shanghai Disney Resort (SHDR) business from sales, distribution, and fulfillment perspective, to facilitate business planning and support all above teams to achieve their sales goals year on year.  Collectively, different sales channels managed by SHDR Sales organization contribute to different admission and lodging revenue. To facilitate the achievement of this revenue goal, the job holder and team have to work closely with leaders of different channels to formulate high level sales products and promotions strategies, and develop the corresponding execution plans. You have to articulate the plan to sales leaders and key Lines of Business partners, plus render support to the fulfillment logistics, communications, measurement, evaluation of the sales products. In addition, you and your team have to frequently and proactively review and improve workflows and business rules together with different teams and Lines of Business regarding product sales and fulfillment, to achieve higher efficiency.  Areas of responsibility includes:  Formulate Execution Plans of Sales Products and Promotions: While a high portion of the business comes from the third party channels, the resort operates in a complex business landscape in the sense that we are driving business from different markets and types of partners. During the course of supporting channel leaders to formulate sales and product strategy in terms of offer design, pricing, booking path, execution feasibility, etc., you need to give all round consideration and advice based on different internal and external factors, including: You need to know our own sales and fulfillment capabilities and restrictions; understand the internal working time line; preferences and capabilities of the distribution partners; and know potential channel conflicts in terms of sales and fulfillment capabilities, timeline, etc. in order to ensure the strategy is sound.  Measurement and Evaluation: As the resort operates with multiple operational systems that basically do not talk to each other, it is often challenging to get a clear single view of the sales data needed to facilitate sales planning and strategy formulation. You need to have strong analytical sense and problem-solving capabilities to piece together the necessary information from different source data, draw valuable and actionable insights, and effectively communicate such insights within the sales team and other members of the leadership team.  You will be a frequent representative of the team for different cross Line of Business initiatives and projects, with the role of a sounding board for the need of sales organization and ensure the team’s interest is safeguarded.  Key Responsibilities: You will provide analysis of sales trends for different products, sales product and channel performance, guest research, market intelligence, etc., in order to better identify business gaps or new opportunities; You will oversee the team on the preparation of different regular reports and handle ad hoc requests from sales leaders on reporting, and drive other necessary measurement and evaluation on the tactical actions of different sales channels, with the objective of continuous refinement of commercial strategy; You need to accountable for travel partners’ compensation report, which includes pay-out recommendation and refinement, adjustment of hurdle target, and/or compensation integrity to the best interest of the company; Overall Sales Cast Members incentive program, reporting, adjustment, and recommendation, with a collective collaboration with Finance and HR partners; You need to take up other projects and initiatives related to the Sales team on Sales strategy; identify, assess and prioritize new business growth opportunities; You will support Senior Manager, Sales Planning and Business Integration to develop consistent strategic thinking & planning approach across different sales teams (including template, tool, etc.) and enable each sales team to do develop sales strategy;  Desired Qualifications: At least 5 years of sales or business development experience, consulting or strategic planning experience is plus University degree and above, MBA degree preferred Strong communication and language ability, strong numerical sense is also crucial in order to handle different price points of products on a daily basis Thorough understanding of the travel industry, with macroeconomic perspective in order to facilitate product planning and strategic analysis Strong business acumen to evaluate product proposal and identify gaps in current offerings. Given the emphasis on travel trade sales, experience in this area would be an advantage Strong logical and critical thinking, and the courage to challenge the status quo, in order to drive improvement on existing products, workflow, etc. An innovator on how to improve operational and distributional efficiency with strategic use of Information Technology Change management is also a constant issue that the job holder has to face, especially when rolling out new digital/technological solution internally and externally. Often, there will be resistance to change among the team or partners, and so the job holder needs to adopt different tactics to work with different stakeholders and achieve the change objectives. The ability to handle Sales strategy ideas and solving sales and fulfillment obstacles as stated above Capable to interact with a wide range of internal partners during the course of his/her daily work, such as different channel management teams within the sales organization, Revenue Management and Analytics, Finance, Food and Beverage, Merchandise, Park operations, Hotel operations, etc. and the interaction at different levels (managers and working levels) Excellent written communication is also required for putting together effective product descriptions, terms and conditions, etc. Result orientation and begin with end in mind Strong strategic thinker but also can be down to earth to ratify and refine strategy A driver with efficient and effective communication skills   About Shanghai Disney Resort: As one of the worldwide leaders in family entertainment, Shanghai Disney Resort delivers legendary service and a lifetime of memories for our guests. Joining us in a new world of fantasy, imagination, creativity and adventure involves creating happiness for the millions of guests who visit our Resort each year. Whether your career journey here is onstage or backstage, there are almost unlimited opportunities for growth and personal development at Shanghai Disney. * We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities and welcome applications from candidates with disabilities. * Specific benefits vary between different roles and may be adjusted according to company policy. * Shanghai Disney Resort does not charge a fee to submit job applications and has not authorized any individual or company to charge to do so. Please always check our official channels or platforms for the most relevant recruitment information.  助理经理，销售计划和渠道优化  职位介绍： 作为助理经理，销售计划和渠道优化，你是销售计划和业务整合的产品支持伙伴，你和团队将负责制定销售产品策略，并为销售组织管理的所有渠道提供执行和物流支持。 你和团队负责制定销售产品策略，并为销售组织管理的所有渠道提供执行和物流支持，包括旅游贸易销售、综合平台（中国电子商务平台，如飞猪等）、商业解决方案和活动（企业和社会）、青少年（学校项目）和目标市场。  你需要从销售、分销和执行的角度对上海迪士尼度假区（SHDR）的业务有深入的了解，以便于制定业务规划，并支持以上所有团队实现年度销售目标。  由上海迪士尼销售组织管理的不同销售渠道共同贡献了不同的门票和住宿收入。 为了促进这一收入目标的实现，你和团队必须与不同渠道的领导紧密合作，制定高水平的销售产品和促销策略，并制定相应的执行计划。 您需要向销售负责人和主要业务线合作伙伴阐述计划，并为销售产品的物流、沟通、测量和评估提供支持。 此外，您和您的团队必须经常主动地与不同的团队和业务线一起审查和改进有关产品销售和执行的工作流程和业务规则，以实现更高的效率。  职责范围包括：  制定销售产品和促销的执行计划。虽然很大一部分业务来自于第三方渠道，但度假区的经营环境很复杂，我们要从不同的市场和不同类型的合作伙伴那里获得业务。 在支持渠道负责人从报价设计、定价、预订路径、执行可行性等方面制定销售和产品策略的过程中，您需要根据不同的内外部因素，给予全方位的考虑和建议，包括：了解我们自身的销售和执行能力和限制，熟悉内部工作时间线；了解分销伙伴的偏好和能力，并在销售和执行能力、时间线等方面可能出现的渠道冲突，以确保策略的合理性。  测量和评估。由于度假区的运作有多个业务系统，基本上互不相干，因此，要对销售规划和战略制定所需的销售数据有一个清晰的认识，往往具有挑战性。 你需要有很强的分析意识和解决问题的能力，从不同的源头数据中拼凑出必要的信息，得出有价值的、可操作的见解，并将这些见解在销售团队和领导团队其他成员中进行有效沟通。  你将经常代表团队参加不同的跨业务线的活动和项目，对销售组织的需求起到传声筒的作用，确保团队的利益得到保障。  工作内容： 您将提供不同产品的销售趋势分析，销售产品和渠道绩效，客户研究，市场情报等，以便更好地识别业务差距或新机会； 您将监督团队准备不同的定期报告，并处理销售主管的临时报告要求，并针对不同销售渠道的战术行动进行其他必要的评估和评估，以期不断完善商业策略； 您负责销售AOP，并针对目标提供有关收支状况的建议和定期更新； 您需要对旅行伙伴的报酬报告负责，其中包括付款建议和完善，障碍目标的调整和/或报酬完整性，以达到公司的最佳利益； 通过与财务和人力资源合作伙伴的集体合作，总体销售演员激励计划，报告，调整和建议； 您将提供有关销售产品性能的适当报告，跟踪和见解； 您需要就销售策略承担与销售团队有关的其他项目和计划； 您将支持销售计划和业务集成高级经理在不同销售团队（包括模板，工具等）之间开发一致的战略思维和计划方法，并使每个销售团队能够制定销售策略； 您将确定，评估和优先考虑新的业务增长机会； 您将不断从短期和长期的不同团队，客户群和业务中优化人员，联合营销预算和其他投资方面的投资回报率。  我们希望您： 至少5年以上销售或业务开发经验，咨询或战略规划经验者优先； 大学以上学历，工商管理硕士MBA优先； 强大的沟通能力和语言表达能力，强大的数字意识对于每天处理产品的不同价位也至关重要； 从宏观经济角度全面了解旅游业，以促进产品规划和战略分析； 强大的业务敏锐度，可以评估产品建议并确定当前产品中的差距。考虑到旅游贸易销售的重点，这方面的经验将是一个优势； 强有力的逻辑和批判性思维，以及勇于挑战现状的勇气，以推动对现有产品，工作流程等的改进； 关于如何通过战略性使用信息技术来提高运营和分配效率的创新者； 变更管理也是工作人员必须面对的长期问题，尤其是在内部和外部推出新的数字/技术解决方案时。通常，团队或合作伙伴之间会存在抵制变革的阻力，因此工作负责人需要采用不同的策略与不同的利益相关者合作，并实现变革目标； 处理销售策略构想并解决上述销售和实现障碍的能力； 在日常工作中能够与广泛的内部合作伙伴进行互动，例如销售组织内的不同渠道管理团队，收益管理和分析，财务，餐饮，商品，公园运营，酒店运营等等，以及不同级别的经历的互动； 还需要出色的书面交流，以整理有效的产品说明，条款和条件等； 以结果为导向，始于最终目标； 具有较强的战略思维能力，但也能踏踏实实地批准和完善战略； 具有高效沟通技巧。  关于上海迪士尼度假区： 作为全球家庭娱乐业的领军企业之一，上海迪士尼度假区为我们的游客带来独具一格的服务和珍藏一生的记忆。加入我们，在这个充满奇幻、想像、创意和探险的全新世界里，为度假区游客创造欢乐。无论您的迪士尼旅程走向台前还是幕后，您都拥有无限机遇。 * 我们致力于提供平等的就业机会，欢迎残障人士申请职位。 * 具体的福利基于职位有所不同，可能根据公司政策进行调整。 * 上海迪士尼度假区不会委托任何人或第三方机构向求职者收取费用。候选人请务必通过度假区官方招聘渠道获取度假区招聘的相关资讯。

description: Primarily contact window and coordinator (internal & external) with the assigned key accounts. Ensuring that the overall business service meets customer needs and requirements. Understand customers existing supply chain and ultimately challenge it, with focus to become customer’s first choice of advisor. Understand and set up clear business plan based on given customer portfolios, which is in line with the company sales targets  Special Accountabilities  ·        Take responsibility for the business development strategy with Multi National Clients ·        Establish, grow and maintain customer relationships based on world class supply chain solutions to ensure above market growth ·        Maintain close communication and collaboration with the Regional Key Account team to leverage know how and customer relationships for Greater China ·        Provide information to business development activities from Global/AP key account team ·        Work closely with network partners to develop successful account strategies ·        Work in close collaboration with all operational functions to ensure highest quality service is delivered to all Key Account clients ·        Develop and implement the SOP (Standard Operational Procedure) when key account is set up and to update and maintain the SOP at any time according to the client’s demands. ·        Strictly follow and Implement company credit policy, monitor and collect the outstanding accounts of the clients.   Skills Required  ·        Proficiency in Mandarin and English. ·        Sound business acumen ·        Excellent knowledge of logistic services (Sea, Air, Land and Contract logistics) ·        Deep understanding of supply chain management and its strategic as well as financial implications ·        Distinct analytical and conceptual skills ·        Able to explain complex solutions in a simple and efficient manner ·        Strong presentation skills ·        Superior communication skills ·        Working experience in China ·        Bright, modest and winning personality   Experience and Qualifications  ·       University degree or equivalent, preferred in Logistics, International Trade ·       Minimum 5 years’ experience in a related position  Core Competences  ·       Target and results focused ·       Analytical ability ·       Building trust ·       Judgment / Problem solving ·       Relationship building

Job Description  准备好在 Mondelēz International 行动致成了吗？  与我们共同完成引领零食未来的使命。充满自豪。  您将与客户建立专业关系，优化客户群销售、NPD 及推广活动。您将确保零售商店拥有良好可见度，并充分利用销售能力您将推动实现店铺关键绩效指标，并完成自身的年度目标  岗位职责：专注于深圳本地间供CVS谈判 确保公司相关促销计划落地执行  您将： 通过采购技术，确保实现最大的视觉效果，及最佳的货架供货能力 实施并监督促销活动。 购买物资布置和实施点。 汇报活动。  任职要求 有相关客户管理，大客户管理，团队管理经验优先  不断前进、加速职业生涯的愿望，以及以下经验及知识技能： 良好的沟通交流技能 扎实的销售及谈判流程知识 强大的分析能力 要求销售经验，最好为 FMCG/CPG 有韧性且注重细节  其它职位信息  关于此职位，您需要了解：  您还将带来什么额外价值：  教育背景/资历证书：全日制大专以上学历  工作制定要求：  差旅要求：无  工作安排：  No Relocation support available Business Unit Summary We’ve been bringing our products to Greater China for over 35 years, making, marketing and selling our mouth-watering, well-loved local and global brands such as Oreo, LU and Chips Ahoy! biscuits, Pacific wafers, Stride gumand Milka chocolate. Headquartered in Shanghai, our 4,000 employees proudly work in sales offices and in our Research & Development Technical Centre in Suzhou. We are also proud to be awarded China’s 2020 Top Employer certification.  Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. jobTitle: Service Win Back Account Sales Manager
description: Job Description Summary Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Operates with some autonomy but are typically subject to standard sales practices and procedures. The role is subject to regular review of sales results. Some judgment may be required but this is typically with guidance. May be responsible for medium-sized sales territories.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  角色与职责  向合作伙伴和分销商销售或通过其进行销售。可能包括渠道销售支持和渠道开发职责。 对销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群有深入的了解。利用先前的经验和获得的商业专业知识来执行政策/策略。 深入理解关键业务驱动力；用这种理解来完成自己的工作。深入了解自己团队的工作如何与其他团队融合并为该领域做出贡献。 大多数决策都在规定的框架内，但是对于项目、产品线、市场、销售过程或客户的最终决策具有一定的自主权。利用先前的经验和在职培训来解决简单的任务。拥有解决问题所需的技术技能和分析思维。可以使用自己团队以外的多个内部资源来做出决定。 此级别的职位可能由个人贡献者担任，且其具有成熟的人际交往能力。向直接相关的同事和业务部门传达所提供的设计和协调服务。为新团队成员提供非正式指导。在简单的情况下向其他人解释复杂的信息。  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有较丰富的工作经验。 学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够影响他人并领导小型团队。领导中等范围和影响的计划。能够同时协调多个项目。有效的问题识别和解决技能。可靠的分析和组织能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  Total Rewards Statement  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: Job Description  Biogen is an inclusive company of choice that advances the power of difference to drive innovative, equitable solutions.  We are committed to building empathy, leveraging differences, and disrupting systems where bias may sit. Building an effective partnerships and expand business in the area. Ensure the supply of all terminals (target hospitals/ pharmacies) in the area and support the depth, breadth and sustainability of various businesses development. 建立有效的合作伙伴关系，拓展辖区的业务。保障辖区内所有终端（目标医院/药店）的供应，支持各类业务发展的渠道深度、广度以及可持续性 Strictly follow Biogen's commercial policies and compliance requirements, manage all levels of distributors in the area, including but not limited to new account opening, purchasing, sales and inventory, payment collection, order execution, logistics and transportation, channel compensation, return and exchange, etc. 严格遵循渤健的商业政策以及合规要求，对辖区内各层级商业进行管理，包括但不限于开户、进销存、回款、订单执行、物流运输、渠道补偿、退换货等 According to Biogen's project strategy and requirements, make the execution plan within the area and effective execute to support the business development. 根据渤健的项目战略和要求，制定区域内的执行计划并有效执行以支持业务发展 Good cross-functional communication. Build an effective collaboration mechanism. Support local/provincial/national reimbursement affairs and hospital listing. SHINE Program Highlights An intense 18 months SHINE Program requiring three challenging rotational assignments with a training curriculum to develop both leadership and commercial skills. This program is designed to attract, develop & retain commercial experts and future commercial leaders for SABIC. Program Design: A 18 months Program Three Job Rotation Assignments Leadership and functional trainings Coaching/Mentoring by business managers Regional exposures  JOB RESPONSIBILITIES  Sales Rotation: Understand the assigned market/industry/area and identify the value chains, build connections and maintain relationships with customers handle daily affairs and manage the business. Cooperate supporting functions to provide good service to customers. Find opportunities to develop new customers and new business, understand our products and study the relevant applications, translate the voice of customer into material requirements, and convert the opportunities to orders. Well utilize relevant systems and tools to conduct business routine and data management, facilitate sales promotion activities for business development, and handle customers' demand in all business aspects to drive continuous improvement of customer experience. Marketing Development Rotation: Analyze assigned industry/area to screen opportunities and understand customers’ needs, specify Specialties' solution in new applications by selling value propositions, make effective communication with customer to build targets for new biz development and build pipelines for continuous growth. Leverage multiple internal & external resources and collaborate with them to follow up the targeted opportunities to make sure real sales result, know industry & technology development trend, and learn new product/application knowledge and emerging market to explore new development areas. Business Operations Rotation: Learn and utilize systems/tools to manage daily operations, such as pricing decision and price management, demand planning and supply management. description: We are seeking a dynamic, results oriented and experienced candidate who possesses the capability to drive the market for key product portfolios. Requirements: ·        5-8 years’ experience in academic publishing. ·        Fluent in English. ·        Capable of working independently to sell and product training presentation. ·        Strong analytical and problem solving skills at both strategic and operational level. ·        Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, including presentation skills. ·        Professional, organized, motivated, energetic and work well alone or as a member of a group. ·        Travel will be required.

Specific Duties and Responsibilities: ·  Manage and enhance the relationship with existing Key Accounts. ·  Responsible for sales growth and sales development efforts in strategy products in the segments of General Chemical industry. ·  Develop business and competitive intelligence in applications, market trends, potential customers and competition. ·  Implement business strategies to maximize profitable sales, develop and manage strategy business for effective value selling. ·  Responsible to strategic account planning efforts and management and take initiative to improve customer satisfaction. ·  Displays effective interpersonal & communication skills (internal/external) ·  Review monthly sales forecast, sales pipeline and focus sales activities on achievement of the forecast and the AOP. ·  Other tasks assigned by superior  Specialized Knowledge/Skills: ·  Bachelors Degree or above, majored in Chemistry, Fine Chemical is preferred. ·  5+ years with rich sales development experience and good market/products application knowledge in General Chemical industry. ·  Working experience in MNC and familiar with working processes, culture and global organization working environment is preferred. ·  Strong business acumen, action and results orientation. ·  Problem-solving and negotiation ·  Team player spirit and capability to deliver results under pressure.

岗位职责： 1.协助制定及执行东欧区内国家/区域渠道的发展规划与策略； 2.承接渠道组的关键任务，辅助和推动代理商执行，对特定国家/区域的业务目标达成负责； 3.核心产品的渠道销售策略制定和推动落地执行，对销售结果负责； 4.对代理商的销售组织架构进行优化，对销售队伍进行培训，负责渠道销售能力的培育和提升。  任职要求： 1.具备3-5年手机行业经验，有公开渠道和代理商管理经验； 2.对手机等消费电子终端行业及其发展趋势充满强烈兴趣； 3.英语能作为工作语言，接受派驻波兰。

About Snapmaker  Snapmaker is a team of passionate and talented people dedicated to empowering everyone with advanced digital fabrication technologies, from 3D printing to laser cutting and CNC carving. With our passion and perseverance, we believe that making will be as easy as taking photos in the coming decades.  Our journey began in August 2016. We launched our first crowdfunding project and raised over $2 million. In 2019, our second crowdfunding project for Snapmaker 2.0 3 in 1 3D Printer raised $7.8 million in 30 days and became the most funded Technology project in Kickstarter. In 2021, we raised millions of dollars from Series A funding. Currently, we are rapidly expanding our product range and global channel network, serving clients in consumer, education, and professional sectors.  Our Team Culture  We are makers ourselves, and hope to enable more people to make good use of the fabrication tools in their daily life. With this mission, we value the application of engineering; believe in positive outcomes brought by tinkering; never leave out details that determine user experience. maintain close and transparent communications with our users so that we can create what they need  What you will be doing  Establish channel framework and design channel strategy to meet the regional sales and strategic goals Lead the regional sales team by supporting individual members to meet their targets, providing them consultation, and enabling them to achieve their potential Develop an extensive regional sales channel by recruiting channel partners in consumer, education, and professional sectors. Manage channel network and cultivate a long-term trusted relationship with channel partners Support and enable channel partners to effectively market our products with high-quality service through training, consultation, and strategic planning Engage in channel marketing such as participating in trade shows, coordinating partners' marketing events, and allocating market development budget Research regional market and gather market intelligence for to optimize our marketing approach and strategic plan  What we are looking for  3+ years of experience in channel sales/channel development/partnership Proficient in English and Mandarin Great interpersonal, presentation, and negotiation skills Experienced in cross-culture communication and coordination, with strong cultural empathy Deep understanding of Latin American culture and consumer behavior, with global vision Good planning and decision-making skills. Able to lead a team and provide guidance Value integrity and team work Self-driven, passionate, responsible, adaptive and result-oriented Willing to travel between Latin America and China after the end of pandemic (4-5 times a year, mostly based in Shenzhen)  Even better if you have  Several years of study/work experience in America/Europe High proficiency in Spanish/Portuguese Worked in 3D printing/digital fabrication/STEAM/robotics industry Experienced in team management/mentorship/training Proven record in channel development in Latin America consumer electronics/education/professional sector  What we can offer  Dynamic, youthful, and friendly work environment Comprehensive onboarding program and mentorship Personal development and training fund Internal knowledge sharing and a study culture Loads of 3D printers to play with and life-long makers to guide you Fun time (dining, sports, party, travel, etc.) Competitive salary and stock options

Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world. description: About the role This role is responsible for licensing ARM China technology to key ARM China semiconductor partners and growing ARM China new business in both short term and long-term. Developing sound, professional, long-term relationships with management/technical/marketing personnel at the partner is a key role as well as creating, reporting and executing on account strategies. Working with the segment marketing managers, Licensing, FAEs, ARM China executives and business units, the New Business Sales Manager will address partner requirements, drive sales revenue, close license contracts and be responsible for the partner account strategy moving forward which will position ARM China to maximize revenue as well as position the partner for success with ARM China in the marketplace. The New Business Sales Manager is responsible for all business and account management aspects of the partner relationship and is expected to maintain a high level of knowledge of ARM China and its products, services and competitors.  What will I be accountable for?  ·      Develop business opportunities and negotiate and close contracts for ARM China technologies and services. ·      Define and maintain detailed account development plan for nominated key partners which covers financial sales goals, strategic target goals and plans to grow partner’s commitment to ARM China over time; report weekly on account progress. ·       Develop and own strategic and tactical relationships at management, engineering and marketing levels; gain understanding of informal decision making organization. ·       Represent partner to ARM China and provide feedback to ARM China business units, engineering, marketing and management regarding partner technical and business requirements. ·       Identify and capture competitive landscape, trends, unit and ASP projections, acquisition activities and other relevant partner information.  What skills, experience and qualifications do I need? Critical Success Factors: ·       Achievement of financial sales goals and licensing objectives. ·       Development of strong relationships with key personnel at partner accounts. ·       Successful relationship mapping between key customer personnel and identified ARM China personnel. ·       Solid knowledge of ARM products, services, schedules and key personnel. ·       Over 5 years experiences in sales and marketing. ·       Working knowledge of partner target markets and applications. ·       BS/BA required. ·       Knowledge of microprocessors (RISC) and systems, SoC designs helpful. ·       Knowledge of AI/Internet/Server/Auto market helpful. ·       Good presentation skills; able to present to different levels – management, engineering and executive. ·       Dynamic, self-starting individual who is driven to maintain regular contact with partners. ·       Team player with good interpersonal skills: communication (written and verbal), organized, personable, entrepreneurial, customer focused and customer sensitive, able to motivate team members and co-workers, able to influence, flexible and hard-working. ·       Able to credibly represent partner requirements to ARM China and to motivate ARM China to meet these requirements. ·       Willing to travel up to 50% of work.

description: About EKI - We are a pre-eminent brand in the realm of "climate change, carbon credit and sustainability solutions” across the globe. We aspire to render strategic solutions for helping businesses and organizations to achieve their climate ambition. Our objective is to rehabilitate the Earth to a low carbon and climate resilient global economy. EKI is World's largest Carbon Credits developer having 2000+ clients, 250+ vendors at 40+ nations, having team of 100+people. To know more about us, visit at www.enkingint.org   Duties and Responsibilities ●      Identification of sales leads from various sources ●      Development of identified leads into workable opportunities ●      Coordinate with the Sales Team for internal / external training. ●      Preparation and allocation of new captured opportunities to sales team through internal / external sources. ●      Assisting your manager in preparing sales reports. ●      Build and maintain client relations. ●      Work with internal departments such as the Marketing teams to engage. audiences and clients more deeply. ●      Meet and exceed KPIs and sales targets. ●      Possess deep knowledge of business offering and value proposition. ●      Follow organizational policies and regulations that affect the Sales department. ●      Proactively pursue new business and sales opportunities. ●      Solve problems for clients and customers by developing innovative and tailored. sales solutions ●      Be a brand ambassador and always reflect company values. ●      Represent EKI in conferences, meetings and industry events. ●      Work with stakeholders of local carbon markets (if exits).  Job qualifications Formal qualification in Business Adminsitration – with Specialization in Sales & Marketing. Experience in similar roles or industry (Carbon foot print, Renewable energy, Climate Change, Forestry, Waste Management) are considered of great value.

该职位来源于猎聘  About The Role  The Channel Sales Manager/Associate Director is responsible for building partnership network and delivering sales results through channels and agencies. You will work as the primary resource for developing commercial partners and growing relationships and be responsible for educating our channels and their sales team on what Airwallex has to offer and how to position our products to the partners’ clients.  Your focus will be sourcing, recruiting and managing new and existing channel partners in order to generate high quality leads and subsequent revenues. It includes the full life cycle of the channel partner sales from prospecting through to commercial and contractual negotiation and signing, followed by nurturing the relationship with those partners.  Job Description The Channel Sales Manager/Director will partner across industries in order to establish networks, develope and manage channels and drive revenue generating activities Recruit new partners, creating new and profitable channels in the market. Mentor and enable relevant partners to accomplish Airwallex’s channel goals Work in close collaboration and partnership with the Sales team and other departments (e.g. Legal, Finance, Marketing, Product). Provide sales enablement to the partner across all relevant disciplines. Requirements Bachelor’s degree from an established undergraduate institution 3+ year working experiences in channel/distributor/partnership management position with top internet companies (e.g, Alibaba ICBU), cross-border SaaS companies (e.g., ) or relevant finance firms Strong indirect channel management core skills, be able to deliver sales results through others Be able to communicate and work with multiple stakeholders across different teams and areas Be optimistic and good in self-emotion control, with hunger for achievement but humble personality Fluent in both Mandarin and English, capability of excellent data analysis will be a plus Airwallex does not accept unsolicited resumes from search firms/recruiters. Airwallex will not pay any fees to search firms/recruiters if a candidate is submitted by a search firm/recruiter unless an agreement has been entered into with respect to specific open position(s). Search firms/recruiters submitting resumes to Airwallex on an unsolicited basis shall be deemed to accept this condition, regardless of any other provision to the contrary.

Maintain the business relationships assigned including: contact, visit, send quotation and offer information regularly. Develop business turnover in assigned market areas. Communicate with relevant departments and sections to inform with the sales deals, follow after sale services including administrative execution of contracts, and inform direct boss with any work obstacles. Prepare market relevant periodic and special reports including supply and demand, trade activities volume, price trends analysis and monitoring competitors’ activities. Prepare shipment tables and any other requested reports. Participate in business missions and customers’ visits to decide customer satisfaction levels and review their requests. Take part in conferences and meeting with olefin exporters and consumers and engage in negotiations according to the direct bosses’ directions. Promote company images and develop end users market.  JOB REQUIREMENTS: * Experiences: At least 5 years of experience (Senior) or 3 years of experience (Junior) in polymers trading jobs, prefer experience in purchasing/selling PVC, PET, ABS, EVA PE, PP, resin. GENERAL SUMMARY OF POSITION As a Territory Sales Manager, you will focus on business development, prospecting, and execution of sales against the target. In addition, you will work closely with Ansell’s regional sales team to deliver Life-Sciences solutions to the Pharmaceutical and Life-Science market. Crucially you will also provide technical consultancy to our customers and advise on best practices concerning garment and accessory selection for the end-users on a country-wide basis.  RESPONSIBILITIES You will be responsible for the maintenance and growth of your territory for the complete line of Ansell™ and BioClean™ Life-Sciences portfolios. This includes but is not limited to Cleanroom gloves, Garments, Goggles, Wipes, and accessories. Using SFDC you will prospect for new customers and qualify leads, whilst supporting and cooperating with the key accounts (KA) and regional team (RST) on managing end-users and channels. You will provide technical customer support (e.g., SOP recommendation, Documentation prep, and training on all Life-Science products and their applications. You will work collaboratively with the China Industrial KA team, body protection (BP), and RST to facilitate, advise and close Life-Science account opportunities. You will analyze your territory/market potential and prepare sales reports on a routine basis including, but not limited to intelligence on customer projects, volume requirements, problems, areas of interest, competitor activity, and potential for new products. Keep abreast of best practices and industry trends Continuously improve through feedback from management Represent Ansell in a professional and ethical manner Travel up to 50-75% to support sales activities  KEY POSITION REQUIREMENTS  Job Experience Minimum 4-5 years of experience in a similar role within a B2B multinational product environment Proficiency in English BS, in Microbiology, Chemical engineering, Chemistry or any adjacent Life Science discipline Experience: 2-3 years of solution sales experience, technical support, or laboratory experience is preferred Detailed planning and organization skills. Familiarity with CRM practices Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently. A combination of expert troubleshooting and interpersonal skills are the keys to success in this position. Excellent written and verbal communication skills are required. Full, clean driving license  Desirable Job Competencies Analytical and focused on quality Service and Customer-oriented Focus on solution selling Business-minded Strong communication and interpersonal skills Very good organization skills, structured and able to prioritize Proactive, pragmatic, dynamic, and enthusiastic Flexible team player, but who likes to work autonomously

Description  Founded in 2007 and headquartered in Paris, Devialet is celebrated for its innovation in acoustics, industrial design and sound technologies. Our story began with ADH®, a revolutionary patented invention that would forever change high-end amplifiers. A mind-blowing feat, this hybrid technology seamlessly blends digital and analog to produce sound quality unlike anything previously experienced.  Every day, all our teams work tirelessly towards one goal: delivering emotion, exposing the purest sound to as many people as possible, with no distortion, saturation or background noise. Step by step, we have sparked a real technological revolution in the audio world that got in motion thanks to some radical innovations. Since our creation, we have registered 160+ patents.  From Hong Kong and New York to London and Munich, we’re constantly looking for talented women and men who want to support our projects and values.  Ready to join us?  SENIOR SALES MANAGER, CHINA (Shanghai based)  MISSIONS Report directly to General Manager APAC Lead and grow the China team to achieve sales targets set for the country Set and continuously adapt the short term sales strategy in China Monitor daily sales performance, orders and forecasting to ensure that inventory levels are optimized for sales Manage distribution partners and help to drive initiatives that will help boost sales achievement, and work with the marketing team to execute Maintain an integrated O2O sales strategy, working closely with the Ecomm team to implement special offers or other campaigns Assist in identifying potential new store locations and managing new store openings across China Develop growth strategies signed off by the Manager and execute merchandising plans that help the business to grow and meet sales targets Build and maintain long-lasting relationships with partners, including landlords and suppliers etc. Work closely with all departments: Customer Support, HR, Finance, Operations, and Marketing to ensure corporate guidelines and procedures are adhered to within the team Accomplish other tasks or achieve other KPIs as assigned by the company Assist in ad-hoc duties upon required PROFILE Bachelor’s Degree, preferably in Business Administration Minimum of 8 years relevant work experience with at least 5 years managing distribution with technology/lifestyle retail channels across China Experience working with premium international brands Direct retail experience is a plus Experience in managing E-commerce and APAC work scope would be a plus Possess a proven track record of sales over-achievement is a MUST An excellent and proactive communicator, with good command of English and Mandarin (both spoken and written) Leadership qualities with high ambitions Strong business acumen and ability to take initiatives A decision-maker with problem-solving abilities and entrepreneurial drive Good interpersonal skills and strong presentation skills Strong computer literacy, particularly Excel High energy to cope with a versatile and fast-paced environment Interest in Music and Audio Technology is a plus

Are you looking to join a dynamic, innovation-driven, international company, building a better future for us all? Our client leads the forest-based bioindustry into a sustainable, innovation-driven, and exciting future. They live by their values – trust and be trusted, achieve together, renew with courage.  This company is labelling a smarter future by developing innovative and sustainable labelling solutions complemented with world-class service. As one of the world’s leading producers of self-adhesive label materials, they supply high-quality paper and film label stock for consumer products and industrial labelling through a global network of factories, distribution terminals and sales offices.  The company is now looking for a professional Manager to take the role of Sales Manager China and the position will be located in Shanghai.  The ideal candidate for this position will be responsible for lead generation and building a pipeline of top quality prospects. As a manager, the candidate will also be responsible for overseeing personnel in the company's internal sales team. Moreover, the candidate will act as a strategic partner with an eye towards a long term sales strategy.   Lead the sales team to improve the customer reach and deliver the sales result. Take responsibility for managing profitable sales and relationships with customers as well as the acquisition of new customers. To implement the company sales strategy and work in alignment with the agreed best practice. Work together with the Sales Team complementing the country business and growth targets. Take responsibility for leading the account action planning and delivery with regular and new customers.  Qualification You have a college or above education background. You have 5+ years related working experience as Sales Manager / Team Leader, KAM, or related Managerial experience. Printing or packaging industry background will be a plus. You have native Chinese level and good English skills as your working language. Team leading experience will be essential for this role.  This Is What We Offer For You (from the employer) Meaningful job: We are proud of what we do. Our work highlights the expertise of our personnel, the high quality of our products and the company's values. Inspired and motivated teams: We have a highly-skilled workforce. We are a multifaceted, international organisation that works as a team to achieve our shared objectives. Development opportunities: With us, you can build up your expertise. We provide opportunities to support your development throughout every stage of your career. Responsibility for people and the environment: Our ethical principles embrace people as well as the environment. We are always striving to build a more sustainable future.  Mercuri Urval is the exclusive Recruitment Partner for this hiring. To apply for this position, please send your CV in English to career.cn@mercuriurval.com, mentioning "Sales Manager, China (CN-00937)". The responsible Consultant will contact you and arrange for a confidential talk regarding this position, and answer your possible questions.  We look forward to hearing from you!  Mercuri Urval is a leading global Executive Search, Professional Recruitment, and Talent Advisory firm. We make sure organizations always have the right people capabilities in place so they deliver the best possible results.  As pioneers in predicting the impact of people’s capabilities and personality on business results, we have always placed high importance on Executive Search and Professional Recruitment. description: Why you'll love Cisco We change the World, you will become passionate about your employer and the brand you represent. Everything is converging on the Internet, making networked connections more relevant than ever before in our lives. Our employees' groundbreaking ideas impact everything. Here, that means we take creative ideas from the drawing board to dynamic solutions that have real world impact. You'll collaborate with Cisco leaders, partner with mentors, and develop incredible relationships with colleagues who share your interest in connecting the unconnected.  You'll be part a team that sincerely cares about its customers, enjoys having fun, and you'll take part in changing the lives of those in our local communities. Come prepared to be supported and encouraged.  Is selling technology products and services your passion? Do you want to work for a company with an evolving solutions portfolio that provides sales and technical support to generate revenue? A company that has excellent benefits, strong employee programs, and an awesome PTO policy that begins on day one? If so, we hope you'll read further about this Account Manager role at Cisco! Do you want to consistently work with industry leaders and knowledgable guides that will help craft your future and career? Responsibilities: Cisco seeks a Senior Service Sales to join its sales organization. Working with Cisco product teams and customers, you will build on your understanding of customer needs, develop solutions for addressing those needs and delivering value, and execute on key opportunities to increase sales of Cisco services. This is a classic sales position focused on selling the value of Cisco people and the services they provide. You has account planning experience, is comfortable with executive level communication, and has an aptitude for translating intangibles into quantifiable business value. This is a great opportunity to apply your sales skills in a services business area that is quickly growing as a key component in Cisco's success as a leader in its industry by utilizing a strong understanding of networking product applications, network management techniques, and service strategies to develop high availability support solutions for large, high-demand networks. Qualifications: Abilities in operations start-up and expansion, strategic planning, customer relations and retention, contract development and negotiation, and support operations and business management. Ability to work with territory sales organization, systems engineers, quality, customer advocacy support groups and consulting engineering. Team player. -Practical experience in managing by influence. 10 - 12 years of field-based customer service and sales experience/exposure in a high technology environment (networking preferred). Excellent written and verbal communication, and presentation skills. Strong negotiation and closing skills are essential. Familiar with FSI /SP industry Why Cisco At Cisco, we bring our uncommon talents to work as a team and make a difference. We connect everything: people, processes, data, and things. We innovate everywhere, taking bold risks to shape the technologies that give us smart cities, connected cars, and handheld hospitals. And we do it in style with unique personalities who aren’t afraid to change the way the world works, lives, plays and learns. We are leaders with a point of view, tech geeks, pop culture aficionados, and we even have a few purple haired rock stars. We celebrate the creativity and diversity that fuels our innovation. We are dreamers and we are doers. Cisco is an equal opportunity employer.

Careers that Change Lives  A Day in the Life  Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned. Provides administrative support to the sales function such as preparing sales and/or expense forecasts, budgets and quotas; coordinating sales meetings; etc. Conducts statistical analysis on sales data and information to ensure optimal sales execution and attainment of growth objectives. Develops territorial sales quotas in accordance with the profit plan. Maintains on-line sales and marketing system, verifying the accuracy of the data and acting as liaison with information technology in identifying and resolving problems. Instructs sales, marketing managers, field area managers, and support staff in accessing sales and marketing information. Prepares and controls commission incentive budgets for a particular district or region. Performs sales calculations on sales incentives. May administer the field sales forecasting system, which provides management with current product sales potential. Must Have: Minimum Requirements Bachelors degree required Minimum of 7 years of relevant experience, or advanced degree with a minimum of 5 years relevant experience Nice to Have  About Medtronic  Together, we can change healthcare worldwide. At Medtronic, we push the limits of what technology, therapies and services can do to help alleviate pain, restore health and extend life. We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday. It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to be.  We want to accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations - but we will only succeed with the right people on our team. Let’s work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients’ lives. Help us shape the future.  Physical Job Requirements  The physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. For Office Roles: While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile. The employee is also required to interact with a computer, and communicate with peers and co-workers. Contact your manager or local HR to understand the Work Conditions and Physical requirements that may be specific to each role. (ADA-United States of America)  Additional Information Posting Date: May 26, 2021 Travel: Yes, < 50 % of the Time

description: Job Description: Regional Sales Manager – Flavors  O’Laughlin (Shanghai) Bio-Science and Technology Company Ltd.  Location: Shanghai, China  Overview: O’Laughlin is a global supplier of ingredients to the flavor and fragrance industry. Our Shanghai (Jiading) factory specifies in development and production of flavors and seasonings used in savory snacks, instant foods, soup bases, beverages, confectionary and pastry products etc.   The combination of international expertise in production of raw materials together with global technical expertise and local knowledge of consumer tastes gives us a strong advantage in the flavor and seasonings market.  We are seeking a motivated sales person to service our existing customers and grow our business in the Southeast Asian markets.  Responsibilities: Actively driving sales, new business and new customer acquisition Coordinate with production and technical team to develop new products Define and manage annual sales targets for each customer, market & product Regularly analyze market trends and opportunities for new products and countries to export to  Requirements: Bachelor’s Degree Good understanding of food ingredients and flavorings At least 3 of previous experience in flavor export sales or relevant industry sector Fluent Mandarin and English communication, along with any other regional language a distinctive plus A self-starter with excellent communication and organizational skills, who interacts well with other but is also able to work independently with minimal supervision Must be familiar with standard computer and data entry programs Ability to travel (eventually)  Package: Competitive base salary + commission 3-6 month probation period

GENERAL SUMMARY OF POSITION As a Territory Sales Manager, you will focus on business development, prospecting, and execution of sales against the target. In addition, you will work closely with Ansell’s regional sales team to deliver Life-Sciences solutions to the Pharmaceutical and Life-Science market. Crucially you will also provide technical consultancy to our customers and advise on best practices concerning garment and accessory selection for the end-users on a country-wide basis.  RESPONSIBILITIES You will be responsible for the maintenance and growth of your territory for the complete line of Ansell™ and BioClean™ Life-Sciences portfolios. This includes but is not limited to Cleanroom gloves, Garments, Goggles, Wipes, and accessories. Using SFDC you will prospect for new customers and qualify leads, whilst supporting and cooperating with the key accounts (KA) and regional team (RST) on managing end-users and channels. You will provide technical customer support (e.g., SOP recommendation, Documentation prep, and training on all Life-Science products and their applications. You will work collaboratively with the China Industrial KA team, body protection (BP), and RST to facilitate, advise and close Life-Science account opportunities. You will analyze your territory/market potential and prepare sales reports on a routine basis including, but not limited to intelligence on customer projects, volume requirements, problems, areas of interest, competitor activity, and potential for new products. Keep abreast of best practices and industry trends Continuously improve through feedback from management Represent Ansell in a professional and ethical manner Travel up to 50-75% to support sales activities  KEY POSITION REQUIREMENTS  Job Experience Minimum 4-5 years of experience in a similar role within a B2B multinational product environment Proficiency in English BS, in Microbiology, Chemical engineering, Chemistry or any adjacent Life Science discipline Experience: 2-3 years of solution sales experience, technical support, or laboratory experience is preferred Detailed planning and organization skills. Familiarity with CRM practices Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently. A combination of expert troubleshooting and interpersonal skills are the keys to success in this position. Excellent written and verbal communication skills are required. Full, clean driving license  Desirable Job Competencies Analytical and focused on quality Service and Customer-oriented Focus on solution selling Business-minded Strong communication and interpersonal skills Very good organization skills, structured and able to prioritize Proactive, pragmatic, dynamic, and enthusiastic Flexible team player, but who likes to work autonomously

Existing Sales a.    manages all existing customers including the distributors, to ensure that customers receive the right product at the right place on time and in the expected condition; b.    timely and accurate order entry and good collection of payments; c.     closely follow up customers’ need and forecast accuracy; d.    responsive to customers through prompt follow-up of order needs, inquiries, and issues; e.    engage necessary resources to resolve order fulfillment issues; 2. Proactively support new product development (NPD) process to find new sales opportunities in existing and new applications; c.     Keep close eyes in new emerging industry trend and applications, provide relevant knowledge & market information for new business development (NBD) and NPD opportunities. 3.    Where applicable, supports sales for global key accounts in cooperation with the global key account managers, keep good relationship and coordinate smooth communications with key decision makers in customer HQs. 4.    Work together with the regional team for trade shows; 5.    Collects and maintains competitive information to allow for effective business decisions; 6.    Performs other related duties and assignments as required;  Education, prior work experience and specialized skills and knowledge: 1.    Broad knowledge in the chemical materials and their applications related to Huber product lines. Strong technical background in alumina oxide or adjacent inorganic powder materials. Knowledge in calcined alumina and spray-dried alumina oxide is a big plus. 2.    Good sales experience with proven performance records; strong customer relationship management skills are required. 3.    Good communication skills with strong advocacy, openness and transparency; 4.    Bachelor’s degree with major in chemistry or material science, or ceramic engineering or related technology.  5.    At least 5 years’ experience in sales / business development; chemical industry preferred; 6.    Self-starter, self-driven and pro-active; able to work under pressure with positive attitude. An attention to detail and appreciation of deadlines is essential. 7.    Highly influential, open to changes, and where needed, willing to proactively drive things to lead desired changes 8.    Good business English; 9.    Must be proficient with Microsoft Office software (PowerPoint, Excel). Strong analytical, communication and presentation skills are required;

jobTitle: Cloud Platform Sales Rep(交通物流行业）
description: 这个职位主要负责上海交通物流行业客户  Responsibilities: Define strategies and act to generate long term and short term customer success and business results. To exceed quarterly sales targets by selling Oracle PaaS/IaaS and On-Premise Database into named accounts and/or within an assigned geographical or vertical market. Manage the entire sales process to ensure delivery against key performance metrics, with a strong emphasis on new business sales, while expanding existing accounts. Territory identification and research, to formalize a go to market territory strategy and create qualified target account list within 30 days. Pipeline development through a combination of cold calling, email campaigns and market sector knowledge/intelligence. Adequate pipeline to ensure over-achievement within the designated territory Engage with prospect organizations to position the Oracle solution through value based selling, business case definition, ROI analysis, references and analyst data. Manage the end to end sales process through engagement of appropriate resources such as Pre Sales Consultants, Business Development Consultants, Oracle Consulting, Executives and Partners etc., and through effective utilization of selling tools such as Engineered selling process (ESPs), Customer 360, etc. Daily update of the Oracle Sales Cloud system with accurate customer and pipeline data. Accurate monthly forecasting and revenue delivery. Continuous improvement in self-research, learning and readiness on the new product offerings Working closely with customer success managers ensuring the PaaS/IaaS customers are deriving value from their investments and ensure very high subscription renewal rates. Minimum of 6 years of relevant experience in selling enterprise software solutions or services. Successful history of net direct new business sales, with the ability to prove consistent over achievement against targets. Ability to build reciprocal relationships with different parts of the business, partners and customers and identifies synergies across LOBs and acts on opportunities to integrate business, with credibility at all levels, including Lines of Business and CxO. Solid understanding of the IT industry Cloud landscape and market Sales experience with a Cloud vendor would be beneficial Competencies in building value proposition and positioning strong proposals. Strong interpersonal skills with proven ability to communicate across all levels and effectively adapts to varied situations Be creative with strong problem solving skills and the ability to adapt and succeed in a fast paced and ambiguous environment. Proven ability to work well as part of an extended sales team.
