Description  Amazon Global Selling is a key initiative to achieve our vision to offer customers Earth’s largest selection. We provide businesses the opportunity to sell their goods on the Amazon platform worldwide. Each year, hundred thousands of CN businesses (manufacturers, resellers and brand owners) join our Marketplaces in 14 countries, adding billions of new products. More than 2 million sellers use this Marketplace, exceeding 60% of total Amazon unit sales. The China Global Selling New Seller Recruit (NSR) team aims to deliver on this vision by identifying massive China Sellers, bring their product selection to Amazon’s global marketplaces, and drive Seller success in WW platform.  The role we are hiring needs a data, process and result-oriented Seller Consultant who can learn quickly and build trust with various stakeholders in a dynamically changing environment. In this role, the candidate will be a key member of the China Global Selling New Seller Recruitment Team, reporting to NSR Post-launch Success Program Manager, and providing critical support to NSR team. The ideal candidate will have a high attention to detail, be able to work in a fast paced work environment, and have a track record of supporting process improvement. The position also requires strong data mining and analysis skill, strong communication skills and the ability to build and maintain strong working relationships with numerous stakeholders within the organization. S/he will also be able to think analytically, conducting deep dive analyzes to develop more efficient business and operational processes.  This role’s daily work includes but not limited to following scope: Own the on-time delivery of high quality work products that guides NSR teams to better focus on business priorities; Build trust, work closely with NSR teams and other stakeholders to drive key operational business processes, i.e., leads allocation, opportunity segmentation / prioritization, goal setting and performance management / reporting Seize cross-team project opportunities, segment Seller group which fit the criteria of project goal and develop action plan to drive feature adoption; Manage and allocate leads/feature opportunities for projects with defined workflows across NSR teams; Establish and unify the Seller promotion content together with marketing team and bridge the communications across NSR team; Leverage data tools such as Excel, SQL, Tableau and Salesforce.com in order to find out opportunities and initiatives with proposals on multiple Seller programs to drive NSR business  Basic Qualifications  BASIC QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Systems Technology or similar related fields 2+ years of professional experience in sales operations, business information systems management, program management, or other related field Strong Excel skills, SQL or other data tools experience Excellent communication in both English and Mandarin Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and build partnerships with a wide range of stakeholders Attention to detail and strong time management skills are a must Desire to work in a fast-paced, challenging environment Fun to work with!  Preferred Qualifications  PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS Experience working with Salesforce.com (administrator experience a big plus) Other business software systems operations experience  Company - Amazon(Shanghai) Intl Trade Co  Job ID: A1716963
industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services, and Internet

description: Company Overview  Smardt Chillers, established in 2000, and is the world’s largest manufacturer of ultra-energy efficient, oil-free chillers for air conditioning and refrigeration applications utilizing the magnetic-bearing Turbocor compressor technology. The company is at the forefront of innovation and rapidly growing. Smardt has manufacturing facilities in Australia, the United States, Canada, Germany, China, and Brazil providing truly global coverage. Our office manages and is responsible for developing our presence throughout China and the Asia Pacific, and serves as the Manufacturing, Sales, Support and Development base for the region.  Why Join us?  Smardt makes buildings better by leveraging innovative technologies to bring the antiquated HVAC market into the 21st century. Smardt's continued rapid growth globally and especially throughout China in the HVAC industry provides an amazing opportunity for accelerated career progression and growth. This position offers a unique opportunity to join a highly-motivated team of individuals who offer a supportive environment for personal and professional growth. It also provides an opportunity to positively impact the environment by expanding the reach of this technology, reducing excessive power consumption, and creating a more sustainable future.  Job Description  We are looking for a young and enthusiastic Sales Manager to join our China team. The Manager shall be responsible for hiring and managing his own team. He/she shall be in-charge of the South China territory but not limited to sales opportunities in other provinces. He/she will be reporting to the General Manager. This position requires deep knowledge in mechanical engineering, preferably with experience in HVAC. The role will be involved in all aspects of sales process. Your basic responsibilities are:  Lead the team to accomplish all orders, sales and strategic goals for the assigned territory, in line with the business and corporate objectives. Increase 'baseline' business by increasing market share of Smardt OFC. Increase predictive sales and identify ahead of customer need potential sales opportunities with effective use of market & sales data. Providing timely forecasts and reports for the assigned territory. Prepare and present comprehensive business reviews of assigned customers, identifying performance against goal/budget on regular basis, detailed forecast for the rest of the year with deep dive analysis. Stay abreast of data center market in the South China region. Maintain competitive knowledge on peer companies and competitors in order to perform competitive analysis and develop competitive positioning papers and matrices. Able to formulate responses to competitive threats and develop new initiatives to grow the business. Develop key customer relationships and continuously improve Smardt’s reputation within the market. Develop new customer base in vertical markets eg. data centers, process manufacturing etc. Provide frontline support to end-users within the region to promote the capabilities of Smardt’s products and systems with a deep understanding of competitors 'products and key differences in performance, reliability and total cost of ownership. Support credit control functions with aged debt. Develop the team's capabilities and skillset to adapt to changing trends and business conditions. Effective in a matrix management environment  The candidate shall have the following skills:  Strong Leadership skills – able to energize and motivate the team to excel in a complex environment, and to develop the long term collective skillsets within the team. Strong Business Acumen – must understand market and customer trends, customer needs and impact on future product development programs, new business case financials. Strong customer interface skills - capable of developing and managing relationships with appropriate personnel. Ability to uncover customer needs and translate into winning capture strategies and value propositions. Effective and persuasive negotiation skills. Ability to close deals is a must. Possess at least a Bachelor/Master’s Degree in the field of Mechanical and/or HVAC Engineering At least 8 years of marketing and sales experience preferably from a related industry An individual with Strong written and verbal communication skills (Must have at least a level 8 certificate in English) Independent, Initiative, and self-reliant Willingness to travel across China  Smardt offers room for growth and development of a long-term career. The candidate must be self-motivated, display good initiative, be prepared for future challenges, able to adapt easily to changes, and demonstrate a strong desire to lean and grow as part of our talented team.
industries: Renewables & Environment and Mechanical or Industrial Engineering

description: General Job Function: We (Westinghouse Electric Company – Asia) currently have an exciting opportunity for a Principle Parts Sales Representative.  In this position, the individual will serve as the Westinghouse Parts Operations primary customer contact for nuclear utilities by supporting sales while achieving high levels of customer satisfaction.  The principle Westinghouse Parts Sales Representative will work directly with the Deputy Director of Asia P&C to implement the global parts strategy and to grow the parts business in China. This position is responsible for all applicable product Lines within Westinghouse  and will support all spare parts activities, such as Orders Entered, Request for Quote response, PO execution and customer satisfaction. The Principle Parts Sales Rep is responsible for supporting the Customer Account Team in everyday activities associated with the account management.  Duties and Responsibilities: Work directly with the Asia P&C deputy director to grow parts business in China Develop and process customer request for quotations and purchase orders for standard parts/products. Proactively engage customer to issue the formal request for quotations and purchase orders. Interact with customers to understand expectations/needs to ensure department responsiveness and customer satisfaction. Review customer specifications, identify and assist in the resolution of any technical or commercial issues.   Interface with internal Westinghouse organizations to clarify customer’s questions and issue offers in a timely manner while meeting customers expected turnaround timeframe. Review all shipping documents to ensure all information is correct. Interface with internal Westinghouse shipping coordinators to resolve any issues that may have occurred during shipment. Ensure invoices are correct when issued, sent to the customer on time and ensure timely payment within contract requirements. Support all customer related receipt inspection questions and inquiries in a timely manner. Ensure international packaging requirements are met. Prepare, review, edit, and assist in compilation of various reports relevant to customer satisfaction and internal metrics. Prepare special reports as required with observations, trends, and recommendations to management.  Implement initiatives using identified growth opportunities based on customer interactions, product knowledge, and sales history Support customers by meeting deliverable dates and providing 24/7 emergency support. Prepare for, coordinate, and execute customer site visits in support of WEC products and services to strengthen customer relationships.    Education and Qualifications / Skills and Competencies:  Bachelor's Degree in Business Management or equivalent  Skills and Competencies: Works well within a team or on individual basis. Makes well informed decisions Business sense – having knowledge in Marketing and marketing strategy formulation, basic Finance Good at communication, particularly in negotiation Accountable for the duties assigned Proactive and can-do attitude

jobTitle: Senior Executive / Team Leader- Inside Sales, China
description: MINTEL GROUP LTD  www.mintel.com  We have a fantastic opportunity for a talented and ambitious individual, to join the Inside Sales Team at Mintel, as an Senior Executive / Team Leader. This team has always been a cornerstone of Mintel's sales success story, and a great starting point to developing a challenging and rewarding career in sales.  The Successful candidate will join a dynamic team of highly motivated and determined individuals who are enthusiastic in every aspect of their role. Team members are expected to develop and manage their own sales pipeline as well as contribute to a monthly team sales target.  The Ideal candidate will be upbeat, positive and friendly and most importantly at ease talking on the phone to senior decision-makers, asking questions to identify research needs, and advising clients on appropriate Mintel research solutions.  Main Responsibilities Achieve daily activity and monthly sales targets Selling to customers across Greater China, including Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan Developing, growing and supporting all aspects of the business sales cycle Manage and track a high volume of telephone prospects Conduct presentations over the phone with Directors and CEO’s Penetrate new markets and cultivate sales leads Deliver accurate pipeline and forecasts to sales management Effectively utilize Mintel’s CRM system and leverage Mintel’s internal resources Preferred Candidates Will Be Fluent in English Degree educated with a strong interest in Marketing and Sales Comfortable in a busy, outgoing environment Experienced in a telephone-based role Competitive and a team player Willing to take on board new ideas Energetic and naturally inquisitive

description: 工作职责:  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Executes standard sales tasks and typically subject to instructions and work routines. There is latitude to rearrange the sequence to complete task/duties based on changing work situations. May be responsible for targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small/medium sales territories.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Roles and Responsibilities selling to or through partners and distributors. May include channel sales support and channel development duties. Broadening knowledge of own sales territory, product lines, markets, sales processes or customer groups to execute policy/strategy. Still acquiring higher level knowledge and skills. Basic understanding of key business drivers; uses this understanding to accomplish own work. Good understanding of how work of own team integrates with other teams and contributes to the area. May have some autonomy to make decisions within a defined framework. Resolves issues in situations that require commercial knowledge and judgment within established procedures. Consults more senior team members for issues outside of defined instructions/parameters. A job at this level requires good interpersonal skills. Communication with direct colleagues and the business about design and coordination services rendered. For customer facing roles, develops strong customer relationships and serves as the interface between customer and GE. Explains technical information to others. 任职条件:  Required Qualifications Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college (or a high school diploma / GED with at least 6 years of experience in Job Family Group(s)/Function(s). Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

jobTitle: Sales & Business Development Manager, Energy -General Industrial
description: CORE RESPONSIBILITY  This position will mainly focus on mapping out and delivery the strategy in China relevant markets such as key customers, price, product portfolio etc. and penetrate into targeted customers to win business. This function needs to cooperate with sales, technical service, R&D to ensure the strategy be implemented well to meet company goals for market share growth and profitability by (1) Aggressively developing new customers by value sales business model (2) Building and extending relationship with targeted customers to make sure get business approval, win key project biddings and align with all customers’ specs. (3) Leading sales team in key applicators development marketing activities and innovation solution promotion. (4) Leading development and promotion of new product platform to leverage business value by coordinating R&D, sales and technical service team  a.    Deep understand of the assigned market segments by through research of the market and value selling b.    Provide leadership in developing market share growth by thoroughly exploiting all additional opportunities in assigned market segments for existing accounts with respect to adding new product lines and/or introducing new technologies(ensure that new business meets company's requirements for profitability and volume) and aggressively seeking the commercialization and incorporation of new businesses seamlessly into core account portfolio c.    Develop the strong pipeline in the targeted markets of with the goal of providing consistent, sustained, profitable growth to meet the requirements of commercialized new business d.    Maximize company’s profitability and increase commercialization rate by identifying/creating substantial product/value differentiation with customers e.    Demonstrate comprehensive understanding of the technical aspects and applications of company’s products platform and application. Keep up to date with the new approaches and technologies which can change or improve our differentiation. This should include working closely with industry contacts and sharing and gathering market information. Gather market intelligence from the field relative to competitive activity, business activity, Work with Segment Manager regarding margin improvement plans f.     Pro-actively monitor, and effectively communicate internally any changes in customer's requirements (e.g. product performance, quality control, billing, receiving, etc..) to meet / exceed customer's expectations g.    Manage sales team to achieve target sales goals by maintaining good relationship with existing customers and developing new business  EDUCATION BACKGROUND REQUIREMENTS: 教育背景要求：  Required/必需的：Good at English communication, including writing/speaking/listening  Preferred/优先考虑的：English certification/B2B industry with technical background   KNOWLEDGE & EXPERIENCE: 知识和经验：  Required/必需的：Have above 8 years B2B direct sales or technical experience  Preferred/优先考虑的：Have above 5 years coating sales and technical application experience Work for coating industry or mirror business under the culture of MNC   PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS  (Please list bellows if there is any): 身体要求（如有特殊需求请列举）:               No any abnormal in physical and mental  TECHNICAL/SKILL REQUIREMENTS: 技术/技能要求：  Required/必需的： Excellent communicator, a strong work ethic, the ability to work independently as well as in a team environment and a strong desire to succeed Strong leadership in managing a sales team Enthusiastic, ambitious and self-motivated Strong business knowledge, professional presentation skills and exceptional problem-solving abilities. Will need to be well organized, proficient at math, have a strong attention to details. Strong cross-function leadership and coordination capability Must be willing to travel 40% - 60% per month Ability to read, analyzes, and interpret general business periodicals, professional journals, technical procedures, or governmental regulations Ability to write reports, business correspondence, and procedure manuals Ability to effectively present information and respond to questions from groups of managers, clients, customers, and the general public Ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions. Ability to interpret concrete variables Computer experience in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint & Outlook Good in both written and oral English  Preferred/优先的： ·          Be familiar with different kinds of products and applications  TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS: (TIME SPENT AWAY FROM HOME OR OTHER TYPICAL OFFICE LOCATION) 出差要求（即离家或离开其他常驻办公地点的时间）   0%        10%        20%       30%        40%        50% or more/以上

Job Description Act as a General Sales Manager to lead the regional sales teams in HK & mainland China to achieve budgeted sales, GP and P&L. Work closely with the GM and JJ BU Leader to align on growth strategy of Food Ingredient and Nutrition & Health, and translate it into concrete actions plans to Area Business Managers across two teams. Lead sales teams (North, East and South China) in developing new customer and new supplier to achieve business growth. Identify and develop new suppliers, products, customers, geographical market segments and respective sales channels to grow the business and profitability. Establish strategic and long-term relationships with key business partners, both suppliers and customers, understand their needs and provide relevant solutions to retain them. Keep abreast to the development of market trends, customers and competitors as well as regulatory change. Ensure the sales teams also equip the relative knowledge. Work closely with principals to ensure sales team have relevant, up to date and accurate product knowledge. Prepare budgets, forecasts and business plans for Food Ingredient and Nutrition & Health. Set targets/KPIs for sales staff and regularly monitor the performance via C4C system and supporting tools. Manage and coach individual team members as well as build up team capability to achieve the sales targets. Plan, develop and implement sales strategies and tactics of both own brand products and principals' products and services. Support potential M&A strategy. Success Breeds Success.  With over 100 years of history, Jebsen’s success has been made possible through our commitment to our partners, to our communities, and to our most valuable asset — our people.  We offer dedicated and talented individuals the opportunity to engage with a family of premium global brands. Employees who pursue excellence are given a diverse platform that provides continuous development and career exposure.  At Jebsen, success breeds success.

description: Put the World on Vacation  At Wyndham Destinations our mission is simple: to put the world on vacation. With a spirit of caring, creativity and fun, our teams help families and friends create memories that last a lifetime. As the world’s largest vacation ownership company and part of Travel + Leisure Co., we’re shaping the future of the travel industry.  Company Culture  Wyndham Destinations strives to attract career-minded, diverse professionals that share our propensity to achieve realistic goals, while demonstrating a positive attitude within a high-energy environment.  Position Summary  This position is responsible for achieving defined sales targets, assists in personnel selection and development and is responsible for maintaining a high level of customer satisfaction.  PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES: (Include but not limited to:) Effectively administer and openly support all Company and sales policies and guidelines Deliver the required sales targets Represent the Company in an ethical, moral and professional manner Train, educate, and monitor the performance goals of all sales employees Monitor the performance of sales consultants and take corrective action where required Maintain a professional approach while participating in or conducting meetings Acknowledge the achievements of team members Share the role of presenter/trainer as required Lead by example in both professional and personal conduct Adhere to industry and Company best practices Support marketing programs and educate sales staff on the marketing strategies Establish a positive team attitude towards exceeding site generated lead objectives Actively participate in management duties, training sessions and sales meetings and provide on-site support to sales employees Ensure the sales team maintains a positive interface with all on-site and corporate departments and actively support Developer Representative recommendations Develop community relations between the Company and the neighbourhood Utilise sales, marketing and fiscal reports to assist in managing the site on a profitable basis Provide a safe and healthy work environment for all employees and guests Stays current with required government licenses Ensure all employees stay current with required government licenses, work permits, etc. Build, develop and manage an engaged team with a Count on Me! attitude and living our core values of Integrity, Leadership, Innovation and Growth Provide regular coaching, mentoring and feedback to the team to ensure continued development and identify training needs Establish service quality standards based on internal customer requirements Identify trends/root causes and take action to ensure desired results are achieved Develop and sponsor initiatives that foster open communication Consult with appropriate stakeholders to obtain agreement or remove barriers before implementing change Employees must ensure they comply with WD’s OH&S Policy, procedures and any reasonable instruction given by WD. Employees must not wilfully place at risk the health and safety of themselves or any other persons in the workplace and to not wilfully or recklessly interfere with or misuse anything provided for health and safety. Display Hospitality with Heart customer centric focused service to all internal and external parties Display innovation through inspiring, creating and improving processes and products. Show integrity in all aspects of the position by doing the right thing, taking responsibility and delivering on the promise. Display leadership values by ensuring effective communication and respecting your peers and managers. Support others within the team and empower each other wherever possible. Key Position Criteria Sound leadership ability, including motivating, coaching and performance management Ability to conduct effective meetings Knowledge and application of sales techniques such as building rapport, needs/values selling, negotiating, and closing the sale Sound problem solving and negotiating skills Positive and enthusiastic attitude Excellent communication skills, and active listening skills Works independently, as well as a team player Presents oneself as a professional role model Ability to works effectively with all levels employees and guests Ability to recognise financial trends and their application to the business Working knowledge of computer software and sales applications Excellent written and verbal communication skills including the ability to build relationships with key stakeholders across all levels of the business Demonstrated empathy and the ability to build upon other people’s ideas Proven ability to implement alternative methods to achieve goals in the face of obstacles Ability to meet tight reporting deadlines without compromising quality A Place for Everyone  Hospitality is at the heart of all we do at Travel + Leisure Co., including how we treat each member of our growing community. Here, you’ll find a team that’s inclusive, values diversity, and is built on a foundational respect for people from all over the world.  We are an equal opportunity employer, and all applicants will be considered for employment without attention to their membership in any protected class. If you require any reasonable accommodation to complete your application or any part of the recruiting process, please email your request to mycareer@wyn.com, including the title and the location of the position for which you are applying.

The ideal candidate is a motivated, well-organized individual who has a deep understanding of prospecting and developing strong relationships with customers.   Job Responsibilities  1. Make sales and work plan according to department sales plan and sales strategy; 2. Assist marketing department to carry out overseas exhibition activities and visit key customers abroad on a regular basis; 3. According to the completion of the sales plan, put forward the work improvement plan in time to improve the business level and work efficiency; 4. Have good professional ethics and personal integrity, excellent expression, communication, organization and coordination ability, team spirit;

Senior Sales Manager, West China  Location: Flexible (Chengdu Preferred)   AIOTECH represents Vantiq that is a hot Silicon Valley startup that delivers a software platform to quickly develop and deploy the next generation of applications, applications that manages an ecosystem that consists of real-time devices (IOT, smartphones, tablets,…), legacy applications (Oracle, SAP, Salesforce, etc..), real-time social media feeds, etc... These applications can handle hundreds of thousands of events per second, provides man-machine collaboration, are distributed to any combination of cloud, edge and on-premise and are highly scalable.  AIOTECH (Vantiq) is looking for an extraordinary sales executive who loves joining a hot early stage software startup company and build the business in the region. The ideal candidate has the vision and the track record in building a significant software business in the region, especially in the industries of Energy, State Owned Enterprise (SOE), Local State Subsidized Campus and other public sectors. This position will report to the VP of Sales of Greater China.      The ideal candidate should be comfortable in having relationships with customers and partners at all levels and very important, proven experience in successfully building a partner ecosystem of System Integrators, Resellers and OEMs in a major technology company throughout the region.  Some of the things you’ll be doing include…  Develop business strategy, grow sales and serve customers. Work closely with the VP of Sales of Greater China. Meet & exceed quarterly sales targets. Provide weekly reporting of pipeline and forecast. Define and manage the strategic plan for the growth in the region. You’ll strategize and execute on plans for channel programs, marketing programs and product feedback.  Establish strong channel partners in the region. o  Overview the recruitment and management of local, regional and global partners based in the region. o  Aggressively work to maximize partner total sales potential through best practices, training and support. o  Excellent communication with management, partners, customers and support staff. o  Be responsible for the management and development the partners, providing them with direction, motivation and leadership. o  Create strategic relationships with senior decision makers within our key partners. Provide feedback and coordination to HQ and local team from the region. Provide input, direction and guidance to other staff in the region including Pre-Sales and Marketing. Keep abreast of competition, competitive issues and products. Participate in sales meetings, product seminars and trade shows as appropriate. Conduct contract negotiations. Travel flexibility --- Travel to partner or customer locations to meet partners and support sales efforts.  Who you are…  Experienced.  Significant direct leadership and strategic partnership experience. You have a solid career history and a proven track record of driving success through partners. Leader. Exceptional management, interpersonal, communication and presentation skills. People want to work with you and for you. Entrepreneurial. You are a creative and strategic thinker. Management Experience. Extensive management skills in software sales including strategic selling. Startup attitude. You have a positive attitude and will “roll up your sleeve” and do what it takes. Energy and Enthusiasm.  You believe in what we’re doing and won’t stop at anything to deliver on your goals. Excellent Communication skills - whether that be to the receptionist or the CEO, your communication style is professional at all times - you know what to say, and how to say it. Problem Solver.  You love tackling the most difficult of challenges and know how to get to the best solution. Executive presence and credibility. Performer.  Proven track record of consistently meeting or exceeding assigned goals and targets. Go-Getter. You thrive in a fast-paced, high growth, rapidly changing environment. Conviction and Commitment. Able to work independently and remotely from other members of your team and corporate. Educated. Bachelor's degree in related field, or equivalent experience. Keep abreast of competition, competitive issues and products. Participate in team-building and company-growth activities including strategy setting, sales training, marketing efforts and customer care.  About AIOTECH:  AIOTECH’s goal is to provide the best technology platform for enterprises to digitize their business while keeping humans in charge.  The AIOTECH application platform-as-a-service enables users to develop, deploy and run real-time enterprise applications driven by data streams from IoT, connected products, social, enterprise systems of record and people. All applications created with AIOTECH are event-driven, allowing businesses to respond in real-time to any business event.

Job Summary  Horizon is a leading life science company that delivers science-driven research solutions advancing the understanding of the genetic basis of disease and the delivery of better healthcare outcomes for patients. We act as a discovery partner for leading pharma and biotech companies worldwide, providing research services and tools to support the development of personalized medicines.  To develop strategic relationships with biotherapeutic customers across China with the goal to deliver on the revenue plan. You will be responsible for prospecting new business and selling commercial licenses to our CHOSOURCE platform. Managing clients through technical evaluation of our platform, negotiating commercial licenses >$1M per contract deal, as well as managing existing clients.  Horizon’s proprietary GS knockout CHO line and protocols facilitate the development of stable cell lines for the expression of antibodies and other recombinant proteins. Horizon Discovery licenses the CHOSOURCE platform to pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and biosimilar companies, as well as contract manufacturing organizations. To enable companies to move from the DNA sequence of their potential biotherapeutic to clinical manufacturing as simply and rapidly as possible, the complete system includes the GS knockout CHO K1 cell line, a comprehensive package of supporting documentation, and an expression vector supplied under license from DNATwoPointO, Inc. To date, CHOSOURCE has been licensed to >80 organizations globally since the product launch in 2016. As well as, eleven biotherapeutics expressed in Horizon’s CHO K1 GS knockout cell line progressed to investigational new drug (IND) filings. For further information on Horizon’s CHOSOURCE expression system please visit: https://horizondiscovery.com/en/chosource  Key Responsibilities Full responsibility to deliver on the sales revenue and commercial activity for the Bioproduction Business Unit in your region, working together with your manager to establish/execute a strategic plan that supports the growth of the business. The successful applicant will be driving rigor and discipline for the integrity of the sales funnel within the CRM with the aim to own and drive accountability for the forecast Secure partnerships with President, VPs and Directors at new companies, to truly understand the customer’s needs for commercial CHO platform Work closely with Product Manager, and Business Unit Manager of Bioproduction to develop and customize value propositions and beat out competition Meet with key opinion leaders (KOLs), and work with Product Manager to capture voice of customer on biotherapeutic workflow from cell line development to clinical manufacturing and the benefits of implementing CHOSOURCE Present solutions to customers in conjunction with Field Application Scientist. Manage accounts performing evaluations of the CHOSOURCE platform Actively lead contract negotiation for commercial licensing terms, working closely with our legal team to close deals efficiently and creating a win/win for customer and Horizon Discovery. Be the lead representative at conferences to drive new business and establish CHOSOURCE as a recognizable brand name in this market sector. jobTitle: Manager, e-Commerce Tmall Commercial Campaign, Greater China
description: Title: Manager, e-Commerce Tmall Commercial Campaign, Greater China Location: Shanghai Date: Sept 2021 Reports to: Sr. Manager, e-Commerce Tmall Commercial, Greater China Coach was founded in 1941 as a family-run workshop, and today is a leading New York design house of modern luxury accessories and lifestyle collections. We attribute the prominence of the Coach brand to the unique combination of our original American attitude and design, our heritage of fine leather goods and custom fabrics, our superior product quality, and our commitment to the customer experience. At Coach, we bring together strong, collaborative people in a culture of mutual respect, support, accountability, and passion for the brand and product. Our goal is to offer an inspirational and modern workplace that allows for exceptional talent to thrive. Primary Purpose: • This e-Commerce Commercial Campaign Manager will be responsible for Coach e-Commerce growth in China, through Alibaba digital channels • The role will lead platform activity plan, Tmall promotion strategy, coordinate projects with Tmall luxury pavilion and oversee Ali new functional tools and new IP collaboration to improve both financial results and consumer/member experience. • This role will assist e-Commerce Senior Manager on business developing new sales opportunities in Alibaba to accelerate business size and enlarge business share • The role will work closely with TP (Taobao Partner) and multiple internal business functions including eCommerce team and Marketing, Merchandising, Supply Chain, Finance, IT and Legal team. Key Roles and Responsibilities will include: • Work with internal stakeholders (Merchandising, Retail, Finance, Brand Marketing team, Finance, IT and Legal) – as well as external partners (TP, Digital agencies etc.) to deliver best-in-class Tmall revenue and experience • Plan, design and implement yearly/quarterly/monthly stores’ campaign calendar based on Tmall campaign cadence. Take special care on Tmall campaign events and Tmall marketing events from Luxury Pavilion • Work with TP to improve Alimama performance marketing performance, ROI driven • Be able to analyze Tmall model such as AIPL, FAST, GROW, IRACE and know how to leverage and improve them [Partnership] • Visit and communicate with third-party business partners and agencies, and Tmall Luxury pavilion team • Work closely within eCommerce team with eCommerce Marketing Manager/eCommerce Product Manager/eCommerce Commercial Managers • Work closely with Digital, Supply Chain, Finance, IT and Legal team The accomplished individual will possess... • Minimum 5 years+ Tmall E-Commerce experience. Luxury or cosmetics industry is preferred. • Bachelor degree or above • Extensive experience with and deep understanding of Alibaba’s ecosystems, solutions and teams. Tmall background is a plus. • Leadership with goal oriented working mentality • Strong management skills especially experienced in managing vendors • Strong planning, analytical and organizational skills - with proven ability to manage multiple tasks • In-depth understanding of ecommerce game rules especially in marketplace environment • Strong interpersonal & communication skills • Passionate, responsive strong willingness to learn and grow • Traveling to Hangzhou may require

工作职责:  Data governance is the formal orchestration of people, process, and technology to enable the organization to leverage data as an enterprise asset. This role is responsible for harmonizing data standards and improving business processes to ensure we maintain ' one data source of truth' and robust data governance. It will ensure ownership lives within the functions, define the security, and data validation rules that enable the governance processes.  Roles and Responsibilities Facilitate MDM projects with business process owners to define/develop data standards, management processes, and data classification to support expected key business outcomes. Collaborate and consolidate the needs of the business, data, and analytics governance board members to receive and understand policy directives and develop/present policy guidelines. Lead & implement both local and global MDM projects and identify associated change impacts on the organization (i.e. Data profiling, data cleansing, data quality, and data governance process evaluation) Document key decisions made and develop/maintain process documentation that will be used in the MDM library and as reference for both internal/external auditing. Developing in-depth knowledge of sales territory, product lines, markets, sales processes, or customer groups. In-depth understanding of key business drivers; uses this understanding to accomplish own work. In-depth understanding of how work of own team integrates with other teams and contributes to the area. 任职条件:  Required Qualifications  For roles outside of the USA - This role requires advanced experience in the Sales & Sales Operations. Knowledge level is comparable to a Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college ( or a high school diploma with relevant experience).  For roles in USA - Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college (or a high school diploma / GED with at least 6 years of experience in Job Family Group(s)/Function(s)).  Desired Characteristics  Strong oral and written communication skills. Demonstrated ability to analyze and resolve problems. Ability to document, plan, market, and execute programs. Established project management skills.

description: 工作职责:  Job Description Summary  负责管理和开展公司指定区域指定产品线的分销商关系，完善渠道和区域管理，同时达到市场占有份额目标，以完成规定的区域和客户的销售指标和利润目标。  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Essential Responsibilities 在指定的区域内完成公司下达的销售指标； 执行公司的市场策略和销售政策； 为分销商提供产品支持，协助分销商达成销售指标； 在指定的区域开发/建立并维护良好的分销经营渠道； 建立和维护客户的长期关系，提高客户的满意度； 利用销售工具收集/分析所在区域的市场情况，寻找潜在的机会，提供准确的市场预测； 开展和组织所负责区域的市场推广和销售活动； 任职条件:  Qualifications/Requirements 大学本科或以上学历，医学，临床背景优先； 3年以上医疗器械/耗材分销商管理经验或直接销售经验； 高度诚信和敬业精神，遵守公司相关规定； 较强的市场开拓和沟通能力及优秀的谈判技巧； 能用英语阅读专业资料并写作，熟练操作电脑； 卓越的对内对外沟通技能； 团队工作的技能（包括寻找和利用各种资源达成目标的能力） 良好的演讲技能 能够承受相应压力，并拥有自我学习的意愿和能力。 Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

Must be focused on driving results, and work across all relevant cross-functional areas to guarantee effective communication, implementation, and execution of objectives.  Planning/Analysis  Roles & Responsibilities: Conduct deep dive analysis on issues affecting Seller business performance and provide the Voice of the Seller as an input into product development and process improvement. Define the territory, opportunities and goals (Input/Output) within the portfolio of accounts. Identify key business opportunities for the territory and manage toward a growth plan. Implement account management best practices and SOPs into the business development framework. Manage all aspects of the client relationship for highest standard of seller experience. Primary purpose of the Role To embed new and improved sales processes and tools for local sales and account management teams in order to enable those teams to accelerate revenue and margin growth and retention. Key Accountabilities •      Build a strong team culture •      Capabilities in-scope: Sales resource quantification and allocation; core sales processes; sales performance management, including commission and recognition. •      Contribute to Asia priorities and plans to create new and improved sales processes and tools. •      Develop and operationalise best in class sales processes and tools to local sales and account management teams. •      Support and coach sales managers in sales performance management. Support and coach sales people in their use of core sales processes and tools •      Monitor effectiveness of sales teams’ use of processes and tools in order to understand needs. Where necessary develop strategies to improve effectiveness •      Coordinate analysis and make recommendations relating to market segmentation for sales coverage purposes. •      Administer data changes required to support sales performance management. •      Manage the Sales governance agenda reporting to the Leadership Team. •      Manage and drive Region Commercial Leadership meeting agendas. •      Capture and consolidate content and data for input to other stakeholders and processes in conjunction with the company’s annual planning. •      Manage quota allocations across Asia. •      Engage with Cluster level Commission Team’s to ensure commissions paid quarterly. •      Align Sales Incentive Plan T&Cs across region. •      Produce regular business operations reporting and performance reporting with insights and recommendations to various Customer Operations, Business Group and other stakeholders.  •      Support requirements for ad hoc performance reports. •      Undertake other ad-hoc projects as directed by the line manager. •      Collate and maintain Platinum/Gold and Silver/Bronze customer performance targets and measures including new volume, rate trends, and profit contribution?  Qualifications •     Degree in numerate discipline； •      Certified Salesforce Administrator (ADM201) preferred； Skills (including languages) •      Chinese & English； •      Quantitative analysis； •      Clear thinking and expression； •      Influencing •      Lead business change •      Process and tool design and implementation •      Business local language(s) and English •      Interpersonal skills and team behaviours Experience •      Common B2B sales and account planning process •      Reporting and analysis specialist use of Salesforce.com •      MS Excel •      Project management •      B2B Sales or Sales Management Mobility Requirements: •      Occasional (no more than quarterly) travel within Asia

Headquartered in Hong Kong, we have over 100 hotels and resorts under four brands nested in key cities and beautiful beachfront locations globally. We are expanding rapidly with a strong development pipeline throughout Asia, the Middle East, Europe and Africa.  Regarded as one of the world's finest hotel ownership and management companies, Shangri-La is dedicated to delight guests around the world with legendary service, finely tuned from over 45 years of hospitality from the heart. We have an affinity with Asian travelers and we offer them a gateway to the rest of the world, positioning us a leading brand in luxury hospitality.  As an enviable employer with industry leading levels of colleague engagement, our people are our priority. Our success is only made possible through the efforts and abilities of over 42,000 colleagues worldwide. In accordance with this belief, the focused investment we make in the learning and development of our colleagues is unparalleled in the global hospitality industry. From welcoming new colleagues, to best in class leadership development, you can be sure that potential is identified and nurtured throughout your career.  We are looking for Manager, Global Sales (remote base in Changsha) for our Shanghai GSO team.  As a Manager, Global Sales (Changsha), we rely on you to: Represent all China hotels (including some APAC hotels) in the yearly RFP rate submission and negotiation process with the responsible global accounts to ensure that best financial growth for our SLI hotels during RFP periods as well as new hotels with potential are being enlisted. Maximize revenue through quality customer base optimization for Corp MICE segment. Responsible for sales activities related to Corporate Segment, Travel and MICE segments assigned by AVP, Global Sales (Shanghai). Develop effective selling strategies for Corporate segments, Travel and MICE segments in the assigned area ensure achievement of the sales production goals. Closely monitor accounts revenue and business production, come up with effective sales plan and actions taken without losing business opportunities. Interact and maintain relationship with Corporate and MICE agent customers in Shanghai. Conduct sales trips as required to build rapport and develop business with existing or new accounts. We Are Looking For Someone Who Has at least 3 years' experience on a similar position in NSO/GSO/RSO or a large hotel. Has a strong capability to establish and maintain major active accounts within his/her market areas. Good in depth knowledge of corporate accounts within local and domestic markets. Interact and communicates well with people. Be punctual and organized in daily work. Good command in writing & speaking English / Chinese. Performs all duties and responsibilities in a timely and efficient manner. Demonstrate strong negotiation skill to maximize hotel profit in all revenue producing areas. Proficient in Microsoft Words, Microsoft Excel and Microsoft PowerPoint. Able to maintain the highest integrity on Account Information. If you are the right person, what are you waiting for? Click the apply button now!

description: 任职资格：  1.2年及以上PCB、PCBA企业营销、市场管理工作及外贸业务团队管理经验,有客户资源者优先；  2.专科及以上学历，国际贸易、英语等相关专业，大学英语4级以上者；  3.熟悉外贸全流程，PCB相关外贸术语、英语商务条款；  4.具备优秀的组织协调能力、团队建设和管理能力，具备有很强的计划与执行力，市场判断开拓能力；  5.有丰富的市场营销策划经验、熟悉PCB线路板行业市场发展现状，具有优秀的营销技巧和市场运作能力。   岗位职责： 1.负责订单处理及客户关系维护，建立良好的客户关系，善于老客户的维护、新客户的开发、产品的推广等。    2.建立、健全营销激励机制，充分了解下属人员心理动态，激发销售人员业务潜能，打造精英团队；  3.组织开拓、维护海外市场，寻求跟踪国外客户，带队参加国外展会；  4.团队意识强、能够承担一定的工作压力，应变灵活，乐于分享，双方满意的情况下有较强的稳定性；  5.其他上司安排的销售工作，对部门人员进行培训。  6.如果与公司互相认可,可成为公司合伙人，与公司共同成长。  福利待遇：  1.工作时间5天制，弹性上班时间，迟到自己加班补上时差即可; 2.转正后购买社保，如需要可以转深户办理/购买公积金； 3.下午茶时间：30分钟，年度旅游1-2次，聚餐等活动，按照国家标准放假; 4.升职空间，绩效奖金，体检一年一次； 5.底薪，提成，业绩奖等 高于行业平均水平，丰富的各种奖励，如客户开发，业绩突破，销售达成率等（面试咨询）  联系方式 公司名称：深圳市金域欣科技有限公司 公司地址：深圳市宝安区西乡航空路索佳科技园B座408（电梯出口第一间办公室） 公司主页：www.szunicepcb.com HR 邮箱： hr@szunicepcb.com HR 电话： 0755 - 23307569

Incredibuild, the leading solution provider of software acceleration technology is looking for an Account Executive who wants to accelerate their career, based in the China office. With its unique process virtualization technology, Incredibuild has become the de-facto standard solution for code-build, test execution, and game development acceleration.  Join us to impact the daily lives of our customers, over 200,000 developers at tech giants like Microsoft, Amazon, Citi, Nintendo and many more. As an Account Executive, you will use your technical skills and high motivation to build relationships and demonstrate our value to open up opportunities!  ****Please Send Resume in English Only!****  Who you are? Embrace the challenge of working through complex sales cycles. You enjoy building relationships with prospects and clients. You like to understand your customers needs, and demonstrate a consultative approach to directly drive Incredibuild's revenue growth. What You'll Be Doing? Clearly articulate, and demonstrate Incredibuild's value proposition, while enhancing enthusiasm to prospects. Follow-up via phone and email to inbound leads and meetings, while creating and nurturing a healthy pipeline to generate sales opportunities. Close large contractual deals, and generating revenue (crushing your quota). Identify prospects’ key questions, pinpoint their needs, and translate them for the marketing team to inform content creation. Assisting in developing initiatives, focusing on long-term plans to increase opportunities and revenue. Requirements  What You'll Need: Minimum of five (5) years of Enterprise Sales experience within the Chinese market. Exceptional communication and presentation skills that build confidence and credibility. Excellent English verbal and written communication skills. Bachelor's degree or above in computer/software or related major.

该职位来源于猎聘  Autodesk is seeking a dynamic high-energy Sales Manager with sound business acumen, natural sales instincts and strong technical aptitude to lead our office-based sales team of Business Development Representative (BDR) and Sales Development Representative(SDR). Your primary focus will be on leading, coaching and developing your team to over-achieve sales targets, excel in customer satisfaction, and reach new heights of professional development.  Responsibilities  Lead the activities of SDR/BDR team, including hiring, coaching, developing talent, team culture and performance management. Collaborate with Marketing to build campaigns that ensure lead quality and quantity with proper closed-loop metric reporting. Develop and leverage relationships with channel partners to improve all territory performance to exceed customers’ expectations. Regularly report on team and individual results: pipeline, conversion rates, and billings attainment. Collaborate with internal sales operations stakeholders on reporting and analysis. Identify and make recommendations for improvement in sales productivity. Chart and deliver timely and accurate forecasting and pipeline management. Ensure CRM tools and Autodesk methodologies are leveraged to process and track opportunities. Direct team with corporate goals and use SMART goals to deliver results. Encourage innovation by exchanging new ideas to improve operation and efficiency within sales and the supporting organizations.  Qualifications  Fluency in English and Chinese is a must. Proven experience in successfully managing people to achieve performance goals within an inbound and outbound office-based sales team. Strong metrics and analytical orientation; Strong problem-solving skill. Outstanding communication, organizational and time management skills. Prior inside sales experience a plus with a strong desire to be in technology sales. Proven experience in sales, preferably in enterprise applications, with a proven track record of over-achievement of quota expectations.  At Autodesk, we're building a diverse workplace and an inclusive culture to give more people the chance to imagine, design, and make a better world. Autodesk is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and considers all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other legally protected characteristic. We also consider for employment all qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with applicable law.

description: 负责海外区域（亚非拉） 竹户外材的销售 1、制定业务发展策略 制订所负责区域市场及业务发展策略和客户开拓计划，分析区域市场竞争信息和筛选重点客户的商务机会，参与客户委员会对各区域、客户、产品的关键资源的分配和决策。 2、维护客户关系 与所负责区域的重点客户高层建立起定期互动交流，了解客户、市场、品牌、供应商策略，达成战略合作联盟。 3、拓展区域业务 全面负责区域市场的业务拓展，依据区域市场需求和竞争分析，预测各个重要客户的产品线未来四个季度的市场销售趋势，并主动与PM及RD 团队达成项目开发目标、准备好有竞争力的产品，带领销售团队达成目标大客户的年度销售目标。负责常规项目开发资源投入产出，决策为客户开发投入，同PM一起规化新年度产品线。 4、管理销售团队 建立和管理销售队伍，维护团队稳定，用心培养优秀员工，且建立合理的人才梯队。 5、管控销售流程 监控区域销售运营流程健康运行，协同后端支持团队，确保所有销售预测、项目进度、订单交付准确及时，逾期账款、库存和客诉数量处在健康合理的水平，协助并及时处理重大异常。 任职要求： 1、大专以上学历，英语作为主要工作语言，懂二外（西语、法语、阿语、韩语等）更佳； 2、建材行业工作经验优先； 3、有海外销售工作经验； 4、具备营销策略分析与规划能力，对市场有较高的敏锐度； 5、具备开拓精神； 6、具备业务开发的自驱力，抗压能力强； 7、能接受高频率的出差（海外）。  其他信息 职位性质：全职

At least 3 years sales experience at industry automation field  3年以上工业行业销售经验  Major in Electrical Engineering , Motor and Drive orientation is preferred  电气、电机、驱动相关专业本科及以上学历  Be familiar with at least one vertical branch  熟悉至少一个行业  Knowing digitization industry and Si Chuan government is highly recommended  了解数字化、政府情况优先考虑  Capable of scouting and targeting potentials  善于挖掘和锁定潜在客户  Being able to independently work out basic technical proposal based on customer's requirement.  能够根据客户的要求独立完成基本的技术方案  Being able to handle not only products business, but also system and solution business  对解决方案类业务熟悉  Fast-learning and adaptive-capacity  快速学习和适应能力  Can accept frequent biz trips  接受出差  Organization: Digital Industries  Company: Siemens Ltd., China  Experience Level: Experienced Professional  Job Type: Full-time

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Objective of Job Operate within key guidelines to ensure corporate and commercial objectives are achieved, as well as ensure professional representation of the Alfa Romeo brand. Work closely with internal teams as well as external customers to achieve sales targets. Key Responsibilities Manage the assigned dealers to deliver sales result: Target setting, review KPI with dealers to find solution to improve performance. Measure and monitor dealer sales performance Vs. Target. Ensure dealers to adhere to Alfa Romeo standard/processes/commercial policy. Correct Dealer Organization. Correct Dealer personnel responsibility. Accuracy data monitoring on Master Report. Use Master Report and identify area for improvement. Monitor dealer training compliance with Alfa Romeo China requirement. Check the result of product training and coordinate on improving dealer competence. Visit dealers and business review. Feedback competitor’s activity in the market. Quarterly review with dealer to assess the performance. Responsible to guide dealer marketing plan to support the retail achievement. Requirements Bachelor’s Degree in Business Management, International Trade or other related field. Good knowledge of MS Office Application. Proven experience within OEM environment covering sales and field management, with dealership management experience. Excellent interpersonal and communications skills and able to interact effectively with different parties, including internal and external suppliers. High level of integrity and well-organized with good problem-solving abilities. Intelligent, aggressive, devoted and proactive, with a strong team spirit. Minimum three years of working experience in an international work environment, with auto industry experience.

1、掌握客户需求，建立和维护良好的客户关系，积极开发客户，能在压力下完成销售任务及年度销售目标；  2、重点关注一般工业行业的客户，掌握行业发展动态；  3、加强y一般工业行业销售渠道的建设和维护，包括集成商和经销商；  4、了解市场动向及竞争对手产品信息，制定出应对的策略；  5、跟进已签署订单，确保设备顺利交付，并负责应收账款  Requirements  1、本科及以上学历，营销或机电类相关专业；  2、三年以上机电相关自动化关产品销售工作经验，具有机器人产品、非标设备、电控等工业产品的直接销售经验尤佳；  3、沟通表达能力强，有较丰富的商务谈判经验；  4、能够适应出差。  优先录用：  1、具有机器人本体厂家或者自动化集成商相关销售经验者优先；  2、具有销售团队管理经验者优先；  3、具有国内和国际工作背景者优先；  Benefits  非夕是一家全球技术领先的AI机器人公司，专注于研发、生产集高精度力控、计算机视觉和人工智能技术于一体的自适应式机器人产品，为不同行业的客户提供基于非夕机器人系统的整体、创新性的解决方案和服务。  Flexiv is pushing the boundaries of robotic technology by providing the world’s first Adaptive Robot that fuses the force control and AI technology to effectively work in uncertain environments. Three key characteristics about adaptivity distinguish the Adaptive Robot from its predecessors. Flexiv is dedicated to developing and applying human-centric robotic technologies to automate tedious and harmful tasks and create new opportunities people enjoy.
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Industrial Automation, and Mechanical or Industrial Engineering

jobTitle: 高级销售代表 Senior Regional Sales Representative
companyName: Shanghai Wellmax Lighting Industry Co., Ltd
description: 公司介绍： 中国照明行业贸易出口前五强企业。上海浦东新区出口第26位，照明出口第1位。专注于全球中高端照明品牌商产品规划供应以及自主品牌业务在海外的拓展。上海公司100人规模。 Shanghai Wellmax Lighting Industry is a company that focuses on the design and manufacture of LED bulbs. We offer professional OEM/ODM/SKD LED solutions and branding/marketing support to clients. The company was founded in 1987 in China, and now becomes a top exporter of LED bulbs in Shanghai, selling to over 100 countries worldwide. We are "Shanghai Famous Exporting Enterprise" and "AAA Enterprise" awarded by the Shanghai Customs. We are among the first group of strategic partners with SAMSUNG, and awarded with "Annual Most Valuable Partner".  岗位职责： 1.  带领销售小组共同深挖市场信息和梳理产品需求架构；根据公司产品线和产品服务定位完成区域开发销售计划并落实。 2.  自主开拓市场，维护现有客户，给海外照明品牌客户提供产品解决方案，及时处理及回复客户的订单需求及问题。 3.  战略整合区域内的市场信息，产品诉求，和开发方向，带领团队与公司其他部门共同配合和合作，完成产品开发立项，项目管理，和重点订单的执行和交付。 4.  参加国内外展会；与客户进行面对面沟通和洽谈，展后客户跟进开发； 5.  拆解客户需求，并将客户需求转化成可执行的目标。 6.  能够深度分析区域性销售数据并制作出中长期区域发展规划。 7.  货款的收回及报关文件、清关文件的制作，相关业务的记录、存档和分析，统计各项销售数据，提供外贸销售业绩的统计、查询、管理。  岗位要求： 1. 5年以上外贸业务经验，熟悉外贸流程，熟悉电子商务；LED照明行业工作经验者，咨询行业从业者，或有海外市场拓展经验者优先考虑。 2. 强英语听说写能力，能够用英文自如交流，独立完成与海外客户的沟通联络任务。 有小语种能力的加分（西语，法语，葡萄牙语，阿拉伯语，泰语，俄语，德语）。 3. 有团队管理经验者优先，需要能够制定出团队发展计划，能够高效管理团队，注重团队内成员的发展和成长。 4. 能同时负责管理多个订单或项目，对内能同时对接多个不同的部门， 对外能管理多个客户；有抗压能力，主动解决问题的能力，有良好的工作习惯，执行力、工作上有条理性。 5. 擅长沟通，责任心强，认真细心，具积极主动跟进、推进的工作习惯。

companyName: 深圳超亚信息咨询有限公司
description: Reports to: Sales and Business Development Director Location: ShenZhen  Responsibilities   1.    Business Development •    Pro-actively seek and establish relationships with target Key and VIP potential companies and manage end to end sales process from initial contact through client on-boarding and on-going relationship development. •    Support on-boarding of new Standard/low potential accounts and facilitate transfer to Client Support team for on- going management. •    Respond to inbound leads from website esquires, requests for quotation and client referrals. •    Work with colleagues within sales and marketing teams both internally and group partners to engage with high potential accounts which span geographical regions and company scope. •    Assist colleagues to support new prospects which cover multiple regions. •    Support for the different organizations within the corporate group   2.    Existing Account Development •    Take ownership of relationships for Key and VIP accounts to ensure maximization of potential business with those clients. •    Ensure clear handover of information for Standard (low potential accounts) which shall be self-managed by Online system and Client Support team. Additional support may be required to provide for Standard accounts on a case by case basis. •    Liaise with colleagues internally to seek information to answer to Key and VIP account questions, feedback or complaints in a timely and professional manner. •    Regularly meeting and communicating with key and VIP clients face to face and by phone ensuring adherence to client follow up policies. •    Revive dormant / unresponsive clients and work with Client Support team to reduce client churn. •    In the event of claims and complaints from Key and VIP accounts assist in the negotiation to reduce impact to client relationship and seek to establish a reasonable solution with the client while limiting cost impact to the company.   3.    Marketing •    Provide insights and input to overall and regional sales and marketing strategy. •    Assist marketing department activities to develop new content for marketing campaigns.   4.    Administration •    Maintaining CRM records for owned accounts including, but not limited to ensuring opening opportunities related to RFQ’s, logging sales activities (meetings, calls, etc) and updating contact information. •    Follow up creditors on significantly overdue invoices in line with Accounts Receivable policy.

At Jungle Scout, we are on a mission to empower entrepreneurs and brands to grow successful e-commerce businesses, and we provide the industry-leading data, powerful tools, and resources they need.  We're growing and we are looking to add a Sales Manager, Enterprise to our fast-paced and customer-oriented sales team.  Location: Shenzhen  You will be doing: Attract and build a high performing enterprise sales team from the ground up to sell Cobalt and Downstream Platforms to brand sellers and other targeted top companies; Plan and create strategy for the enterprise team based on the marketing trend and data; Get insights from the market, develop them into strategies independently and break the strategies into actionable items; Forecast business trend and set reasonable and realistic yet challenging goals for the team; Own the enterprise sales revenue goal and motivate the team to achieve and exceed the revenue goals; Lead the team to develop potential leads, build sales funnel, follow up leads and win deals; Manage performance and outcome of your individual team members; Facilitate and lead team member's development by creating an open and safe environment for them while also identifying and unlock their potential; Challenge them to think outside the box and achieve more; Cooperate with marketing to find the targeted customers; Cooperate with CSM team to ensure that customers have a seamless experience and get user behaviour data insights to help with sales activities;  Who you are: 5+ years of experience in enterprise SaaS sales and providing software solutions to top companies; 2+ years of experience in people management with proven success of leading the team to exceed targets; Experience in hiring brilliant people onto the team and care for their development and achievements in Jungle Scout; Experience in building sales processes including sales funnel building, performance management; Experience in coaching sales reps with sales skills and industry knowledge; From ecommerce industry, preferably with experience in Amazon PPC; Resourceful, flexible, accurate and with strong analytical skills; Great face to face presentation skills and telephone communication skills; Business focused with positive attitude; Active team player; Fluent in Mandarin and English  Working at Jungle Scout The BEST team. Remote-first culture. International Meetups. Access to Jungle Scout tools & experts. Performance Bonus. Flexible Vacation. Comprehensive Health Benefits & Retirement Program.  We prioritize Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion  At Jungle Scout, we hire great people from a wide variety of backgrounds, not just because it's the right thing to do, but because it makes our company stronger.  Jungle Scout is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.  All offers of employment at Jungle Scout are contingent upon clear results of a comprehensive background check. Background checks will be conducted on all final candidates prior to the start date.

description: What do you want to do?  Are you looking to an opportunity to touch the eye-tracking technology and integrate it into other high tech products?  If your answer is yes, keep on reading because you will want to hear about what we have to say!  We are looking for a Sales & Business Development Manager who will manage a number of XR OEM accounts with location primarily in Mainland China. You will be part of the Tobii China/Taiwan Region Sales organization and report to XR Segment Director of Sales and have its primary location in the Tobii Suzhou/Shanghai office.  Tobii sells eye-tracking platforms (both HW and SW) to device manufacturers in the XR (AR/VR), PC and Automotive segments for integration into their products. Current customers include Huawei, Pico, HTC, HP, Lenovo, Dell/Alienware, Acer, MSi etc .  The Sales & Business Development Manager is the point of contact for the working level customer interaction, and the goal with the work is to achieve design wins with the Tobii XR Segment products in these accounts. The role will manage and nurture customer relationship from pre-sales to product EOL. As such, the Sales & Business Development Manager will be expected to work closely with local and global customer supporting staff and have direct contact with HQ functions such as Product management, all located in Stockholm, Sweden.  (Description of the department and the team.)  Your days will be filled with  In this role you will manage the existing accounts and break in and identifying new accounts.  Working with XR Segment Director of Sales to formulate account plan and sales strategy to support the XR Segment Business plan Perform weekly and sometimes daily meetings with large and medium size OEM’s and ODM’s Facilitate meeting between Tobii and customer’s high level customer functions. Analyzing customers and their needs in order to find opportunities and pain points Facilitate and articulate the complete OEM offering for a specific customer together with Sales, IPM, product management and synchronize messaging with marketing. Identify and facility co-marketing opportunities with the customer together with Marketing and product management. Do product presentations and perform demos to excite a broad range of customer representatives to build momentum and buy-in for the design in  Are you our next Tobiian?  To be successful in this role and at Tobii you need to able to travel to customer’s sites primarily in mainland China. Travel to Taiwan but also to HQ in Stockholm for a tight cooperation with HQ functions, is also required. The AM should know Chinese and English on a profound level in both oral and writing.  We are looking for someone who has  Experience working in a XR OEM, or Experience from working with Chinese OEMs of consumer electronics Experience working in international companies or living abroad  Please submit your resume through our website as soon as possible, don't wait! At Tobii, we move quickly!
industries: Marketing and Advertising, Information Technology and Services, and Computer Software

description: Learn about Our Culture: CACTUS is a culture-driven company powered by its people, their passion, and their inspiration. All Cactizens live by the culture and values that define us. We value people for their talent, personality, competency, and the ability to learn and grow. We create a work environment that allows people to thrive and show their best performance. We believe in meritocracy. We take pride in our diversity. We strive to embrace diverse voices and create an inclusive workplace. We encourage all Cactizens to talk openly about their ideas and opinions and provide feedback to anyone who is a part of CACTUS, regardless of designation, experience, or seniority. We also encourage them to place their trust and be open to differences in opinions and feedback.  We are seeking a dynamic, results oriented and experienced candidate who possesses the capability to drive the market for key product portfolios. This position reports to the Director, Institutional Sales & Partnerships, Greater China. The person needs to drive sales and provide solutions to editing service, impact science and other products. Enhance our market in Mainland China while ensuring a smooth communication with customers. Our main customers are university and college research department, key faculties, research institutions, societies, journals and publishers.  Responsibilities: Cooperates with China team to achieve sales target. Maintains strong relationships with current accounts and obtains new customers. Explores and develops the market, finds new sales opportunities. Intensive study of Cactus’s products, acknowledges the latest front news of subject and journal publication's developments, integrate and promote with our products.      Participate in seminars and conferences to promote our products.  Requirements: 5-8 years’ experience in academic publishing. Fluent in English. Capable of working independently to sell and product training presentation. Strong analytical and problem solving skills at both strategic and operational level. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, including presentation skills. Professional, organized, motivated, energetic and work well alone or as a member of a group.  Travel will be required.

Job Description: ·       Identify sales and marketing opportunities within the assigned region 确定分配区域内的销售和营销机会 ·       Ensure sales targets in responsible region 确保区域销售目标 ·       Establish a long-term customer relationship 和客户建立长期关系 ·       Communicate regularly with customers to introduce new product, new solution 定期和客户沟通，展示新产品和新方案 ·       Develop a repeatable sales model that ensures consistent success and revenue growth 建立可重复使用的销售方案以确保销售成功和业绩增长 ·       Generate area sales reports for the management on periodic basis 定期输出并汇报区域销售报告  Job Qualifications: ·       Bachelor degree or above 本科及以上 ·       1-3 years of sales-related work experience 1-3年销售经验 ·       Good expression skills 良好的表达能力 ·       Language: Chinese, English, Spanish (only for South America) 语言：中文，英语，西班牙语（只针对南美区） ·       Sales experience in retail, communication and consumer electronics industries is preferred 有相关零售业/消费电子行业销售经验优先 ·       Knowledge of salesforce CRM is preferred 会使用Saleforce CRM优先 ·       Driving license is preferred 有驾照者优先  About Hanshow：  Founded in 2012, Hanshow is a leading provider of ESL and smart store solutions serving traditional retail, new retail, pharmacies, department stores, fashion, health care, and the entertainment industries, etc. We provide ESL and smart store solutions in 12,000+ stores in 50+ countries. Hanshow is a trusted partner among retailers worldwide. We strive to enhance the shopping experience by developing cutting edge technology and providing services to solve our clients' in-store challenges. Our innovative spirit begins with our global team, improves the way we operate, and ultimately helps us deliver compelling end-to-end solutions.   汉朔(Hanshow)是全球领先的数字化门店解决方案提供商，具备自主研发创新、软硬件方案集成及全产业链资源整合的能力。公司成立于2012年，总部位于浙江嘉兴，研发与管理中心位于北京，主要服务于传统零售、新零售、百货时尚、医药健康、文化娱乐等领域。随着零售行业多元化发展，汉朔基于对零售及互联网领域变革的深刻理解，始终坚持以创新与研发为核心驱动，通过提供数字化、高效率、重体验的门店解决方案及服务，帮助客户建立核心竞争优势。 目前，汉朔已为全球超过50个国家和地区、12000多家门店提供电子价签产品及数字化门店解决方案，国内零售百强占有率超60%。   Website: https://www.hanshow.com/ Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/hanshow

jobTitle: R3576833 Account Manager - Digital Sales Direct
description: 工作职责:  Job Description Summary  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Executes standard sales tasks and typically subject to instructions and work routines. There is latitude to rearrange the sequence to complete task/duties based on changing work situations. May be responsible for targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small/medium sales territories.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Roles and Responsibilities Team responsible for sales of GE Digital solutions to external customers and other GE businesses. Broadening knowledge of own sales territory, product lines, markets, sales processes or customer groups to execute policy/strategy. Still acquiring higher level knowledge and skills. Basic understanding of key business drivers; uses this understanding to accomplish own work. Good understanding of how work of own team integrates with other teams and contributes to the area. May have some autonomy to make decisions within a defined framework. Resolves issues in situations that require commercial knowledge and judgment within established procedures. Consults more senior team members for issues outside of defined instructions/parameters. A job at this level requires good interpersonal skills. Communication with direct colleagues and the business about design and coordination services rendered. For customer facing roles, develops strong customer relationships and serves as the interface between customer and GE. Explains technical information to others. 任职条件:  Required Qualifications For roles outside of the USA- This role requires basic experience in the Sales & Digital Sales Direct. Knowledge level is comparable to a Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college ( or a high school diploma with relevant experience). For roles in USA - Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college (or a high school diploma / GED with at least 6 years of experience in Job Family Group(s)/Function(s)). Desired Characteristics  Strong oral and written communication skills. Ability to document, plan, market, and execute programs.  Note  To comply with US immigration and other legal requirements, it is necessary to specify the minimum number of years' experience required for any role based within the USA. For roles outside of the USA, to ensure compliance with applicable legislation, the JDs should focus on the substantive level of experience required for the role and a minimum number of years should NOT be used.  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

Ormco, headquartered in Brea, CA, is a global leader and innovator of orthodontic products and solutions designed to enhance the lives of our customers and their patients. description: 关于WeWork中国 WeWork是全球领先的办公空间服务平台。截止至2020年第三季度，WeWork已建立了859个社区，覆盖38个国家共151个城市，拥有54万名会籍。自2016年WeWork进入中国以来，已经在上海、香港、北京、广州、深圳、杭州、苏州、南京、武汉、成都、西安、台北建立约100个社区，是一家兼具全球品牌优势及战略资源的中国企业，更高效、更扎实、更贴近中国市场需求，协同中国本土合作伙伴，继续致力引领中国未来的灵活办公方式。  我们提供什么 空间：将原来复杂的房地产租赁模式转变为简单的会员制模式，并以低于传统办公空间的价格所提供的空间即服务平台。 灵活性：提供能够根据需求定制各种大小的办公空间，或者以分钟、月及年计费的灵活的办公空间解决方案。 科技：办公空间内所需要的技术解决方案：从IT服务（包括专业带宽），到任何时候都能预定一间会议室。 社区：坚持“会员第一”的使命，从而为各种规模的企业提供有意义的社区和全球化的人脉。  岗位职责 管理电话咨询渠道内的客户线索  新客户开拓：开发潜在客户（通过陌拜，电话，社交媒体，网络，大型活动等） 现有大、中、小企业客户的关系培养与维护  充分了解客户需求，向目标客户指引和展示WeWork的地点、产品和业务解决方案  在客户的整个购买过程中充当客户的主要联络点，并与公司其他团队密切合作，以保证新客户顺利入驻  运用创新的销售策略，提高WeWork市场认知度  岗位要求 5年以上销售经验  具备Salesforce经验者优先  有商业房地产销售经验者优先  有B2B业务解决方案者优先  有新客户拓展经验者优先  具备开拓新市场的能力  具备优秀的展示与沟通能力
