职位概要 Overall accountability:  对全国在华南大客户集采项目及单体项目落地负责，配合经销商完成经销商签约的年度目标同时完成自己的年度销售回款目标。  工作内容 Accountability: 完成华南大客户渠道每月销售预算及回款计划； 制定完整的大客户项目落地计划并有效执行，维护客情； 在华南区开发适合的经销商，并制定推广计划监督实施，维护经销架构稳定有效； 在负责地区开展大客户项目销售，能有效执行公司制定的方案，具有独立谈判能力； 准时完成各项业务考评内容及市场资料搜集，按时提交月度工作报告； 任职条件 Requirements:  教育背景 :  ◆专业专科以上学历，毕业于管理，营销类专业更佳。  经 验 :  ◆ 3 年以上销售或市场管理工作经验，有外资企业工作背景或相关行业工作背景更佳。  技能技巧 :  ◆英语具有一定的阅读理解能力；  ◆能熟练制定销售计划并实施；  ◆沟通和社交能力强，专业能力强；  ◆具有代表公司主谈大客户项目能力，行业知识丰富，专业性强；  ◆熟练使用相关办公软件，具有一定的组织会议和演讲能力。  其他 :  ◆办事沉稳、细致，思维活跃，有创新精神，良好的团队合作意识；  ◆优秀的品行和职业素质，强烈的敬业精神与责任感，工作原则性强。  We are the ASSA ABLOY Group  Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 50,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.  As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.  As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

About Airwallex  Airwallex is a leading global fintech and enterprise services company founded in 2015, which enables cross-border business to grow globally and innovatively. Airwallex has set up 15 offices around the world, with more than 800 talented employees. At the beginning of 2021, Airwallex completed a D+ series of financing with around 2.6 billion USD valuation. Tencent, Alibaba Entrepreneurs Fund, Sequoia Capital, Hillhouse Capital and many other top financial institutions are our investors.  About The Role  The Channel Sales Manager/Associate Director is responsible for building partnership network and delivering sales results through channels and agencies. You will work as the primary resource for developing commercial partners and growing relationships and be responsible for educating our channels and their sales team on what Airwallex has to offer and how to position our products to the partners’ clients.  Your focus will be sourcing, recruiting and managing new and existing channel partners in order to generate high quality leads and subsequent revenues. It includes the full life cycle of the channel partner sales from prospecting through to commercial and contractual negotiation and signing, followed by nurturing the relationship with those partners.  Job Description The Channel Sales Manager/Director will partner across industries in order to establish networks, develope and manage channels and drive revenue generating activities Recruit new partners, creating new and profitable channels in the market. Mentor and enable relevant partners to accomplish Airwallex’s channel goals Work in close collaboration and partnership with the Sales team and other departments (e.g. Legal, Finance, Marketing, Product). Provide sales enablement to the partner across all relevant disciplines. Requirements Bachelor’s degree from an established undergraduate institution 3+ year working experiences in channel/distributor/partnership management position with top internet companies (e.g, Alibaba ICBU), cross-border SaaS companies (e.g., ) or relevant finance firms Strong indirect channel management core skills, be able to deliver sales results through others Be able to communicate and work with multiple stakeholders across different teams and areas Be optimistic and good in self-emotion control, with hunger for achievement but humble personality Fluent in both Mandarin and English, capability of excellent data analysis will be a plus Airwallex does not accept unsolicited resumes from search firms/recruiters. Airwallex will not pay any fees to search firms/recruiters if a candidate is submitted by a search firm/recruiter unless an agreement has been entered into with respect to specific open position(s). Search firms/recruiters submitting resumes to Airwallex on an unsolicited basis shall be deemed to accept this condition, regardless of any other provision to the contrary.

Overview  The position will be responsible for developing and growing sales for Rain Bird products in the assigned territory as well as building and maintaining relationships with key market influencers. The successful candidate will be technically competent, results-oriented, experienced in the Irrigation Industry and/or outdoor power tools for landscape or related industries that involve close relationships with contractors, distributors, design institutes and construction companies.  The position will evaluate and improve existing distributor capabilities to grow sales and market share of Rain Bird irrigation products. The successful candidate will also identify and develop new distributors to improve market penetration and customer support. The candidate will spend the majority of his/her time traveling in the market to develop business and support customer needs on-site.  The successful candidate will be responsible for achieving the desired sales results for landscape irrigation in China. The candidate will work closely with his/her colleagues to manage and support projects that cross defined territorial boundaries.  Responsibilities Achieve sales and market share goals of his/her territory , including Guangdong, Guang xi, Hainan, Fujian , Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan Strengthen the distribution network by improving existing distributors and adding new distributors; Develop and implement annual sales plans to grow market share; Convert business through on-site sales calls to new customer; Identify project opportunities and influence use of Rain Bird irrigation products; Conduct product sales training, education and demonstrations for Rain Bird’s products; Maintain contact and enhance relationships with major territorial accounts; Collect and report policy direction from industry associations and government entities; Prepare regular and special sales reports as assigned including Monthly Reports, Annual Sales Plans, etc. Qualifications  Minimum Qualifications: Degree in Engineering, Science or Management; 7-10 years successful sales experience in irrigation or similar industry; Project sales and management experience; Excellent verbal communications skills in English and Mandarin Ability to work in a team and deliver outstanding results; Self-motivated individual with independent decision-making capability; Good working knowledge of personal computers and commonly used business software (i.e. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook); Willing to live in assigned territory while traveling extensively; Desired Qualifications Irrigation sales experience; MBA degree will be a plus; Cantonese language will be a plus; Good presentation skills and public speaking; Analytical skills in market data and competitive activities. AutoCAD skill is a plus.

Coaching & Leadership Sales Manager is required at all times to be in observance of Hotel and Company policies and procedures, and interdepartmental cooperation. Must be able to work well under pressure in a fast paced and constantly changing environment. About Agoda  Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.  Get to Know our Team:  Partner Development is a team of creative entrepreneurs that develop solutions for Agoda’s accommodation partners and promote Agoda’s top and bottom line growth. We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we roll out new product to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.  The Opportunity  As a Partner Development Specialist your key objective is growing the coverage and quality of Agoda’s supply network. You take care of a large portfolio of emerging high growth supply partners and assist in partnership related functions at scale.  In This Role, You’ll Get To Contact high growth supply partners to highlight revenue growth opportunities and maximize value Contact new or potential supply partners to encourage completion of their online registrations Encourage program participation through focused project sprints Communicate efficiently with partners through various communication methods including phone, email, messaging, and webinars Train and inform partners on our technologies, tools, and models Prioritize daily tasks, monitor results, and track progress in internal systems What You’ll Need To Succeed Minimum 2 years’ experience working in sales/business development or execution role preferred although fresh graduates welcome to apply Basic computer and analysis skills Analytical and proven track record in using data to drive achievements and make decisions Intellectual curiosity Autonomous and result driven (history of achieving ambitious targets) Ability to work under pressure in a competitive industry/rapidly changing environment Ability to work in a highly dynamic environment and is open to change in responsibilities, workflows, as needed by the business Able to support Hong Kong, Taiwan and Mainland China markets and following the business hours & public holidays in Hong Kong, Taiwan and Mainland China #shanghai #beijing #shenzhen #taipei #SALE #MRKT #BD #2 #3 #4  Equal Opportunity Employer  At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.  We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .  To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

工作职责:  Job Description Summary  You will be responsible for the management and development of distributor relationships. The objective is to achieve targeted sales and profit objectives from a defined business territory/key customer group, in accordance with the Country/Regional Business Plan. GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Essential Responsibilities  Develop and implement a sales plan for assigned channel/distributor, aimed at achieving and exceeding sales turnover and financial return, within the most cost-effective route and time-frame.  Target new business accounts and opportunities as well as existing customers;  Actively manage the relationship with assigned distributors to ensure alignment with company objectives;  Proceed distributor/channel with the support & information needed to facilitate their effectiveness;  Maintain a high level of technical and commercial competency on relevant products, techniques and applications;  Accurately forecast sales and growth opportunities within designated territory, using sales tools and applications.  Prepare and participate in business reviews/forecasts, to ensure a constant flow of information between Channel/Distributor and the Company.  Maintain an awareness of competitor activities and developments and ensure this information is collected and made available to leadership.  任职条件:  Qualifications/Requirements  Minimum 5 years relevant healthcare industry experience  Bachelor's degree  A proven track-record of achieving and exceeding sales targets, and a desire to grow new business  Experience understanding customer needs and business drivers and using this knowledge to develop account plans and strategies (knowledge of the existing account areas/channels would be advantageous).  Excellent interpersonal skills, including teamwork and communication skills  Persistence in developing prospects and customers, and ability to close business  Strong presentation, analytical and customer service skills  Self-starter, able to manage time and organize and prioritize workload  Ability to communicate using English and local language  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: 公司描述  Lesaffre group was founded in 1853, a 166-year-old French group based in Northern France has now become a multi-national and a multicultural company that is committed to providing the best in each of its business areas: baking, nutrition and health, flavours and fermentation.  Lesaffre started its business in China over 30 years ago. Beyond yeast and bread improvers, Lesaffre offers a full range of products and services related to nutrition and health: yeast extracts for food savory and high performance nutrients for micro-organism and cell cultures, yeasts and other probiotics for human and animal nutrition, crop protection, yeasts for beer, wines, and renewable fuels, etc.  In 2010, Lesaffre Management (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. was set up to manage Lesaffre’s business in China, from human resources, sales& marketing, to finance and operation management.  China headquarter： based in Shanghai, managing all Lesaffre business in China  5 regional sales offices： Shanghai, Guangzhou, Beijing, Shenyang and Hong Kong, managing business, implementing marketing initiatives and providing sales services to our customers in China, Hong Kong & Taiwan  4 baking centers： in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Hong Kong, providing R&D and technical support, training and technical services to our customers.  5 modernized plants: Anhui Mingguang, Guangxi Laibin, Guangxi Chongzuo.  For more information about our company, please visit our website: http://www.lesaffre.com.cn  职位描述  Location could be based in Fujian, Jiangxi, Hunan, Sichuan of China. To report on competition monitoring (information, samples, prices.) To provide regular written reporting on market data, the advancement of the action plan and projects. 职位要求 Bachelor’s degree in Swine/Nutrition Familiar with production process and technology in relative feeding industry Excellent communications skills Self-motivated and self-managing abilities are expected Good team player

jobTitle: Territory Manager of Sales - Jiangsu Province
description: About Us  3Shape develops 3D scanners and software solutions that enable dental and hearing professionals to treat more people, more effectively and with superior care. We are a global market-leading provider of dental and audio technology for laboratories and clinics. Creating great innovation requires diverse teams. Our growing talent pool of over 1,500 employees spans 30+ nationalities and is energized by knowing that together, we contribute to a better world. 3Shapers are entrepreneurs, challengers and innovators… values that are at the heart of everything we do.  About The Role Responsible for delivering the territory sales target Responsible for identifying and fostering relationships with key stakeholders and decision makers across the territory, especially with our reseller sales representatives and dentist or Lab KOLs Your Key Responsibilities Will Be To Mobilize regional resources to anticipate and respond to customer needs, problems, and opportunities at the territory level Enroll the reseller’s sales representatives to implement and execute sales demand strategies Identify and foster relationships with key stakeholders and decision makers across the portfolio Assure critical enablers are utilized effectively (people, process, programs, tools, and technology to meet customer needs) Manage and coordinate appropriate resources, tailored to specific customer level needs Examine contract issues, and based upon financial analysis, arrive at the best recommendation/decision for the customer and company Utilize business acumen tools to identify facility specific growth opportunities Coach reseller sales representatives to achieve individual business plans Work with local teams to execute the selling process in a concise, compliant, professional, ethical, and persuasive manner; leading the customer to action The ability to travel, including overnight and/or weekends, up to 60% of the time Be able to use and showcase the complete product and software portfolio of 3Shape China To Succeed In This Position, You Will Need To More than 3+ years (preferably 5+ years) in clinical sales, marketing, professional education, sales learning/ development, or commercial functional experience is strongly preferred – previous dental experience a big plus. Demonstrate the ability to handle customer product questions and objections in a manner that is consistent with sales training methodology; conduct sales presentations using current sales methods. Understand appropriate use of products, and coach reseller representatives to target and segment customers accordingly. Conduct business reviews and set the tone for the reseller partner or for others in accordance with 3Shape policies and procedures. The Territory Manager will also have excellent computer skills with Microsoft Office. What Do We Offer Being part of a young and entrepreneurial team in Greater China The possibility to be part of an ambitious, successful and fast-growing company Be part of a dynamic team with an open and trust-based work and communication culture The chance to influence the next generation of 3D software and the future of an expanding company

This is where you save and sustain lives  At Baxter, we are deeply connected by our mission. No matter your role at Baxter, your work makes a positive impact on people around the world. You'll feel a sense of purpose throughout the organization, as we know our work improves outcomes for millions of patients.  Baxter's products and therapies are found in almost every hospital worldwide, in clinics and in the home. For over 85 years, we have pioneered significant medical innovations that transform healthcare.  Together, we create a place where we are happy, successful and inspire each other. This is where you can do your best work.  Join us at the intersection of saving and sustaining lives—where your purpose accelerates our mission.  关于百特 百特提供多样化的核心肾脏和医院产品线，包括家庭治疗、急重症和中心透析治疗;无菌静脉解决方案;注入系统和设备;肠外营养;手术产品和麻醉学手术;自动化药房，软件和服务。百特在全球的足迹和对产品和服务的关键作用在扩大新兴和发达国家的医疗保健方面发挥了关键作用。百特全球员工基于公司丰富的医学突破的传统上正在促进下一代的员工创新医疗让病人得到照顾。  岗位职责 负责带领团队在指定区域内开展公司产品的学术推广，并达成年度工作目标； 负责在指定区域市场活动和项目的执行，维护公司的品牌形象； 拜访客户，建立并发展良好的合作关系； 充分了解市场动态，并及时向上级汇报、反馈。  任职资质 本科及以上学历，医药相关专业； 6-8年以上医药行业工作经验，其中至少2年同等岗位的管理经验； 熟悉医药行业的工作流程，具备专业的临床推广技能和学术知识； 具备良好的沟通协调、团队管理和辅导能力，良好的市场洞察力和商业敏锐度； 热情、诚实、主动、有冲劲、有责任感。  为何选择百特？ 这是一项重要的事业 百特员工以拯救生命，延续生命为使命。我们充满激情，运用科技创新满足全球数以百万计人们的需求，他们依赖于百特医疗设备，技术和医疗必需品延续生命。我们致力于让越来越多的人接触到医疗保健，在重要的未知领域开拓创新，追求创新性的合作，以此来实现我们的使命以及对患者的承诺。  立即申请职位，体验这一充满使命的职业！  在百特每个员工享有均等的机会。员工不会因为种族，肤色，宗教，性别，性取向，国籍任何招聘决策，特有地位保护，残疾或其他受到法律保护的因素受到歧视。百特是一个机会均等的雇主，不会因为种族、肤色、宗教、性别、性取向、性别、国籍、受保护的退伍军人地位、残疾或任何其他受法律保护的情况影响招聘决定。  1. Drive area sales team to meet and exceed annual business targets;  2. Select, coach and develop sales Reps;  3. Work with Commercial/GA team to set up local tender strategy & distribution strategy and implement;  4. To create and maintain strong customers intimacy and interact with Key customers;  5. Support to organize local marketing activities and provide constructive feedback to management;  6. Control Opex and all sales behaviors.  Reasonable Accommodations  Baxter is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities. If, because of a medical condition or disability, you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the application or interview process, please send an e-mail to Americas_TTA@baxter.com and let us know the nature of your request along with your contact information.  Recruitment Fraud Notice  Baxter has discovered incidents of employment scams, where fraudulent parties pose as Baxter employees, recruiters, or other agents, and engage with online job seekers in an attempt to steal personal and/or financial information. To learn how you can protect yourself, review our Recruitment Fraud Notice. 049665
industries: Medical Devices, Pharmaceuticals, and Hospital & Health Care

jobTitle: Regional Sales Manager区域销售经理
description: 为什么在英迈工作？ 英迈是技术和供应链服务的全球领导者，使业务合作伙伴能够最大限度地提高他们制造、销售或使用的技术的价值。我们帮助超过250,000家业务合作伙伴和2000家供应商在他们所服务的市场中更高效、更成功的运营。 作为区域销售经理，您需要合理规划并推进区域销售工作，并和利益相关者包括代理商以及客户保持良好沟通，以达成达成区域业绩目标。 在此职位上，您将直接向全国区域销售总经理汇报，并与内外部的业务相关者紧密合作。   你会做什么?  您的职责包括但不限于：  1、区域销售计划制定 梳理客户完整画像，定位需求（规模，生意方向，用户群，行业）； 根据公司指标、市场需求，做销售预测，搭建销售渠道，制定区域内的销售计划，分解和落实指标到销售。 2、关键客户关系维护 现有关键客户的维护，理解客户整体业务运营情况，持续挖掘跨产品或解决方案的生意机会，达成框架合作协议； 新关键客户拜访，挖掘生意机会，跨产品线匹配，生成解决方案，促成合作。 3、渠道及新业务拓展 在区域内拓展有效渠道覆盖； 新产品线机会挖掘，并向BU引荐。 4、区域业务执行 利用有效的业务管理工具，多维度追踪区域内各项过程和结果指标，确保业务达成； 定期跟进review团队的销售行为（包含：拜访记录，商机分析，业务计划，客户满意度）； 协助团队与后台支持部门的沟通，协助政策和流程改善。 5、团队组织优化及管理 确保团队整体销售思维、行为、目标的一致； 合理规划和配置人员 人员辅导、激励与发展  你需要具备什么条件才能成功？  教育背景： 大学本科及以上学历，计算机、市场营销专业优先 经验要求： 八年以上IT行业工作经验，至少五年以上产品销售经验及三年以上团队管理经验； 熟悉IT行业现状及趋势，熟悉渠道生态体系，深度理解总代的生意模式及打法； 熟悉主流IT产品，包括技术指标、应用场景、行业趋势、同类竞品市场布局等，有相关厂商产品技术认证者优先考虑； 具备一定的财务知识及Excel数据分析能力； 有一定英文基础，能阅读英文邮件和简单技术文档。 能力要求： 商业头脑和战略思维 市场分析和业务规划能力 商务谈判能力 数据驱动和分析思维 发展和培养团队的能力
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Hardware, and Computer & Network Security

jobTitle: 销售客户经理 Sales Account Executive
description: 关于WeWork中国 WeWork是全球领先的办公空间服务平台。截止至2020年第三季度，WeWork已建立了859个社区，覆盖38个国家共151个城市，拥有54万名会籍。自2016年WeWork进入中国以来，已经在上海、香港、北京、广州、深圳、杭州、苏州、南京、武汉、成都、西安、台北建立约100个社区，是一家兼具全球品牌优势及战略资源的中国企业，更高效、更扎实、更贴近中国市场需求，协同中国本土合作伙伴，继续致力引领中国未来的灵活办公方式。我们通过独特的办公空间、体验和生态提升企业雇员的效率和福祉，赋能“人才推动型”成长企业共同成长。  我们的产品 空间：将原来复杂的房地产租赁模式转变为简单的会员制模式，并以低于传统办公空间的价格所提供的空间即服务平台； 灵活性：提供能够根据需求定制各种大小的办公空间，或者以分钟、月及年计费的灵活的办公空间解决方案； 科技：办公空间内所需要的技术解决方案：从IT服务（包括专业带宽），到任何时候都能预定一间会议室； 社区：坚持“会员第一”的使命，从而为各种规模的企业提供有意义的社区和全球化的人脉。  主要职责 管理电话咨询渠道内的客户线索 新客户开拓：开发潜在客户（通过陌拜，电话，社交媒体，网络，大型活动等） 现有大、中、小企业客户的关系培养与维护 充分了解客户需求，向目标客户指引和展示WeWork的地点、产品和业务解决方案 在客户的整个购买过程中充当客户的主要联络点，并与公司其他团队密切合作，以保证新客户顺利入驻 运用创新的销售策略，提高WeWork市场认知度  职位要求 5年以上销售经验 具备Salesforce经验者优先 有商业房地产销售经验者优先 有B2B业务解决方案者优先 有新客户拓展经验者优先 具备开拓新市场的能力 具备优秀的展示与沟通能力  Responsibilities Inbound lead management Lead generation and prospecting (i.e., cold calling, social media, networking, events, etc.) Existing sales pipeline management Cultivating and maintaining small, midsize and large business relationships Partner with New Member Development and Community teams to ensure successful placement and follow up of new members Utilizing innovative and creative sales tactics Touring and demonstrating WeWork locations and business solutions with potential members  Qualifications College/University graduate with 4-year degree preferred 5+ years of sales experience Commercial real estate sales experience a plus B2B business solutions experience a plus Business development experience a plus Ability to establish and nurture C-level relationships Ability to penetrate new markets Presentation and communication skills required Detail orientation and organization skills required

description: HENKEL IS FOR THOSE WHO STEP UP. DO YOU?  At Henkel, you can make a difference and craft your career. That’s why you own your projects and take full responsibility from an early stage. Our unique brands in markets around the world open up countless opportunities to follow your convictions and explore new paths. If you have an entrepreneurial mindset that allows you to always think out of the box - take the chance and shape the digital future together with us.  JOB PURPOSE Define & develop opportunities in building component & construction market Lead & collaborate R&D and Sales team to develop new products and solutions to win in China YOUR ROLE Develop & execute China FBC strategy, deliver strong Building component Key Strategy initiatives Leverage the global best practice and develop China business development strategy and solution Work closely with Sales team to define & develop business opportunities in Building component & Constructions industries Facilitate defined new opportunities delivery to drive business ambition Collaborate & lead R&D and Sales team to generate sustainable growth in China Manage the product roadmap and gain competitive advantage for long term success Support Sales team to develop customers roadmap and outperform the market INDIVIDUALLY TASKS (TIME IN %) Study Building Component Market Mega Trend to develop and optimize China strategy. (15%) Understand Global Business Strategy and define opportunities in China Market. (20%) Drive innovation by working closely with R&D and Sales team to develop new products/solutions to capture business opportunities (50%) Work with Sales and Supply Chain team to build safe stock for new launched products. (15%) Your Skills Bachelor or above degree on Polymer Science, Material Science or Chemistry related Over 7 years working experience in commercial (BD, Sales or Marketing), construction material relevant industry is preferred. Good collaboration, influence, and project management skills Proficient in oral and written English communication skills Passion and self-motivated to drive innovation What The Role Can Offer You Work with global business team, collaborate with cross function and regional team Diverse training for adhesive related business and technologies, good opportunities for self-learning Open career development opportunities within difference BUs and regions

Position:  Senior Account Manager  Job Description:  Principal Accountabilities  Define critical markets and new customers in the assigned sales territory, plan strategy and develop all key relationships to ensure strong foundation for solution selling. Maintain and promote relationships with customer contacts who may be determining design opportunities and deal with existing business challenges. Ensure customer satisfaction as it pertains to supply chain management and other value added services. Requires experience interacting with vendors and customers in a technical and engineering environment. Extensive understanding of pricing programs and models within the electronics industry. Must be able to prepare comprehensive internal quarterly business reviews (iQBR), presenting strategic plans and implementation steps to grow sales, demand creation and improve customer service. Ability to lead regular QBRs with major customers that unlock additional sales opportunities. Experience creating demand for Arrow products and services. Ability to work with engineers and designers to specify, select and resolve electronic board designs with Arrow franchised suppliers. Must be able to promote and sell the value add, supply chain, and full life cycle programs offered by Arrow. Requires proficiency in sales tracking systems, SalesForce.com, Oracle Establish and build relationships with key suppliers. This job profile requires the assignment and participation in a sales compensation plan. A portion of OTE will be variable and tied to specific sales-related goals as set forth by Arrow. Job Complexity  Job complexity may vary among jobs within this job level and will align with one of the job complexities listed below:  Incumbent has limited level of discretion to vary from established procedures, works under general supervision, and solves some straightforward problems. Incumbent generally has limited work experience involving basic concepts and procedures but requires formal training in theories/concepts in own function. Incumbent has high level of discretion to vary from established procedures, works under broad supervision, and solves some complex problems. Incumbent generally has substantial work experience involving complex concepts and procedures in theories/concepts in own function. Experience / Education  Typically requires a 4 year degree and 2–4 years of related experience; or an advanced degree without experience; or equivalent work experience.  Location:  CN-Shanghai, China (11/F BM Intercontinental BC)  Time Type:  Full time  Job Category:  Sales
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Semiconductors

description: Epredia, a global leader in providing solutions for cancer diagnostics, is dedicated to improving lives by enabling our customers to achieve diagnostic excellence. We’re growing quickly and constantly expanding our team. Find a rewarding career with a diverse group of individuals that share a passion to do work that matters and positively impacts patient lives.  Position Summary  Responsible for developing business opportunities, technical and application based sales strategies, presenting and promoting Epredia products and solutions, maintaining a strong understanding of customer technical requirements for existing and future group products, translating and communicating marketing collateral with emphasis into producing effective sales training, and strengthening the complete workflow selling concept.  This position promotes long term business opportunities, while supporting short term sales cycles, consistent with workflow concept objectives.  Reporting to : China Commercial Head  Duties And Responsibilities  The primary responsibility is to manage and drive key portfolio growth as well as potential domestic partnership exploration, understand and anticipate customers’ needs and strategically position services/solutions to generate leads for the field.  Enables the business and the market to capture specific customer insights and competitor strategies as inputs into services/solutions’ roadmap (features and economic benefits).  Will be working in close cooperation with regional commercial operations team and service teams  Drive business planning, in coordination with Sales operations/Finance team  Develop local value proposition creations to ensure structured offer and a complete portfolio execution in the market. Identify sub-segments of customers in local market, and codify their needs, and tailor existing value proposition (if needed)  Gather local market and customer insights, and feed information back to sales team  Support Product Managers (PMs) in setting local offers and prices based on commercial policy and local needs to maximize value capture;  Commercial Performance And Business Development  Identify cross-sell, up-sell, and service sales in existing installed base to address customer needs;  Tailor messaging to local market ensuring that Epredia value drivers are properly translated to the China;  Ensure compliance of local marketing materials with regulatory requirements (Q&R review);  Identify and synthesize local market trends, based on customer and stakeholder interactions;  Build strategies for beating competitors—profitably—with effective use of competitive intelligence, based on customer and event interactions;  Bachelor’s degree or equivalent required  Fluent English speakers both in Oral and written  8+ years of sales development experience preferred  Demonstrated key position skills to include; leadership, questioning and needs analysis, negotiation, motivation, communication, organization, and persuasion  Demonstrated ability to lead, motivate, direct, and coach  5 - 10 years demonstrated selling achievement (s) with selling capital equipment and consumable types of products  Individual with experience working with distributors and/or in the laboratory space highly preferred  Demonstrated “consultative selling skills” experience and large account management experience required  Demonstrated ability to develop and maintain positive relationships with key customers and large “Key Accounts” at all levels of an organization  Demonstrated verbal, written and presentation skills  Computer proficient particularly in the Microsoft environment (experience with SFDC preferred)  Self-starter, team player  Proactively seeking feedback, would like to share, integrity  Minimum of 50% travel is required and expected  YOUR APPLICATION  Epredia offers a wide variety of competitive compensation and benefits programs. If you meet the requirements of this unique opportunity, and are driven by innovation and the desire to improve the lives of our patients, we encourage you to apply now. Job postings will remain open for a minimum of five business days and are subject to immediate closure thereafter without additional notice.  TO ALL RECRUITMENT AGENCIES  Epredia does not accept unsolicited third party resumes.  Epredia is an Equal Opportunity Employer.  Our Journey. Epredia is on a journey to create an inclusive environment where we celebrate multiple approaches and points of view. Our goal is to attract, develop and retain the best and brightest from all walks of life and backgrounds. Your candidacy will be reviewed regardless of race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age or veteran status.

About Our Client  We are excited to continue supporting this cloud-based financial technology provider on their journey of expanding in Greater China region. After successfully launching the business in China, company is now looking to appoint a General Manager to oversee the continuous growth across the region.   Job Description  Defining the sales strategy for the local team. Being and inspiring mentor, nurturing the sales teams, crating leadership layers, identifying new talents and securing business goals. Showing sound strategic thinking to transform the business and develop new opportunities. Having Out of the Box mind-set to develop new strategies to increase company market share and be a strategic advisor to drive disruptive investments. Building long term executive customer relationships, assisting in influencing decision makers and closing strategic sales opportunities, securing customer loyalty and retention.  Requirement  Over 15 years of sales leadership experience in managing large teams in SaaS, Technology or Enterprise solution sales environment. Ability to lead and inspire individuals to unleash their potential. Proven experience of re-shaping and building the teams to optimize performance across Greater China region. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, fluency in Mandarin and English.

description: Job Functions  Job Summary  Job Functions (Essential)  Support the selling of our products and services through our Distributor Network to meet expected sales and gross margin levels as set forth by the Sr. Manager - Distribution Sales by performing the following duties: Manage the activities related to planning, forecasting, reporting, new business analysis, project tracking. Responsibilities include helping management to identify areas of needed sales channel improvement. Excellent oral, presentation and written communication skills High level of analytical ability Strong leadership skills, especially in addressing issues that cross internal departments Proficient with PC and MS Office Suite Ability to travel domestic & international (50 %)  Work Environment  Normal Office Environment  Travel Required  Equipment - Computer, Phone, Copier  Shift  First  Job Type  Regular  Work Schedule  Full Time

Requires extensive communication and influence skills across line of business and agencies; Strong strategic thinking, solid business acumen, having an advanced ability to sort and interpret key industry trends, challenges and opportunities; Have experience in develop and manage holistic marketing campaigns.

Good working environment Competitive Salary  About Our Client  The company is revolutionizing the fitness and wellness industry by bringing together the world's fantastic classes and experiences into one app. The company connects members to millions of classes in 30 countries around the globe, and is now available as a wellness benefit with some of the world's leading employers. We make it easy to prioritize your health, whether you decide to head to a local studio, play an on-demand workout or book yourself a much needed wellness appointment. Over 100 million reservations later, we truly believe that we're just getting started.  Job Description  Research, prospect and sell new studio, gym and wellness partners on to the platform in selected areas to help expand the company geographic footprint Utilise online and offline resources and tools to develop and maintain your own pipeline in SalesForce Drive the full sales cycle through making/sending introductory calls and emails, meeting prospects face to face, building the relationship and closing the deal Effectively objection handle and customise partnership proposals according to the needs and interests of the prospect Develop creative, fun, and innovative ways in which you connect and build out your relationships with potential partners and share across the team Actively hit daily KPIs and consistently achieve & exceed monthly sales targets across new partners and pre-existing partners Contribute towards team wide projects  The Successful Applicant  You are a natural salesperson, hustler, and networker, who's as passionate about hitting targets to grow a business as you are about discovering new fitness and wellness options. You're not afraid to strike up a conversation with someone you just met. You are always thinking outside the box; whether it's crafting an epic pitch deck or win-win proposal, or finding creative ways to generate more leads, pitch more prospective partners, or close more high quality deals. 3+ years of experience in sales with a track record of relentlessly high standards and top performance Highly organised individual with ability to prioritise and attention to detail A fantastic communicator; not afraid to speak to anyone A strong negotiator who is driven by results A genuine curiosity about people and local businesses and the innate ability to inspire passion in others A natural problem solver who's comfortable with an ever-changing fast, startup environment Resilience and an ability to overcome objections and obstacles with an openness to feedback, and dedication to consistent self improvement Positive and inventive attitude and a drive to win with friendly competition Technical experience in computer programmes such as CRM systems (SalesForce), Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Keynote, etc Desire to spend a sizeable share of your time in field sales and meeting prospects face to face Proficient in English and Chinese Passion in fitness or sports is highly preferred! Based in Shanghai and must be eligible to work in China  What's On Offer  Competitive Salary and fun work place.  Contact: Wendy Song  Quote job ref: 4217234

description: Job Description Summary  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Operates with some autonomy but are typically subject to standard sales practices and procedures. The role is subject to regular review of sales results. Some judgment may be required but this is typically with guidance. May be responsible for medium-sized sales territories.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  角色与职责  向指定客户销售时，新增客户通常很少，并且通常需要经过审查。包括单个业务组/P&L 中的关键客户 对销售区域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群有深入的了解。利用先前的经验和获得的商业专业知识来执行政策/策略。 深入理解关键业务驱动力；用这种理解来完成自己的工作。深入了解自己团队的工作如何与其他团队融合并为该领域做出贡献。 大多数决策都在规定的框架内，但是对于项目、产品线、市场、销售过程或客户的最终决策具有一定的自主权。利用先前的经验和在职培训来解决简单的任务。拥有解决问题所需的技术技能和分析思维。可以使用自己团队以外的多个内部资源来做出决定。 此级别的职位可能由个人贡献者担任，且其具有成熟的人际交往能力。向直接相关的同事和业务部门传达所提供的设计和协调服务。为新团队成员提供非正式指导。在简单的情况下向其他人解释复杂的信息。  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有较丰富的工作经验。学力水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够影响他人并领导小型团队。领导中等范围和影响的计划。能够同时协调多个项目。有效的问题识别和解决技能。可靠的分析和组织能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.    Additional Information  Relocation Assistance Provided: No
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

jobTitle: Senior BDM, Global Accounts, Global Accounts
description: Job Summary  DESCRIPTION  AWS is seeking a world-class sales professional to manage our global customer relationship with one of the largest companies in the world.  The sales professional will be responsible for providing strategic business leadership and management of this global account. You will build and maintain key relationships, develop and manage opportunities, monitor deployment projects and engage virtual resources. You will define a CXO relationship strategy within the account, including engaging with AWS senior leadership team for executive sponsorships, coordinating executive business reviews, and maintaining customer satisfaction.  Responsibilities  The Senior Global Account Manager is responsible for teaming with the customer’s IT Organization to build strategic relationships across the account, articulating a clear vision and generating enthusiasm, while impacting all business groups. The rep is responsible for selling at the most strategic level within the account and implementing a broad strategy for earning customer acceptance and service implementation. The rep will work with all appropriate AWS resources (Executives, Solution Architects, Business Development, Marketing, Partners, Support, Service teams and Professional Services) to support customer interests. The rep will also work closely with international team supporting the customer in other regions to ensure consistent account strategy and execution  Development of formal case studies and other forms of references highlighting activity and workloads running on AWS is core to the role. For more information on Amazon Web Services, please visit http://aws.amazon.com Key job responsibilities  The Senior Global Account Manager is responsible for teaming with the customer’s IT Organization to build strategic relationships across the account, articulating a clear vision and generating enthusiasm, while impacting all business groups. The rep is responsible for selling at the most strategic level within the account and implementing a broad strategy for earning customer acceptance and service implementation. The rep will work with all appropriate AWS resources (Executives, Solution Architects, Business Development, Marketing, Partners, Support, Service teams and Professional Services) to support customer interests. The rep will also work closely with international team supporting the customer in other regions to ensure consistent account strategy and execution; development of formal case studies and other forms of references highlighting activity and workloads running on AWS is core to the role.   Basic Qualifications A BA or BS degree in computer science, engineering, business, marketing, or related field (MBA preferred). A minimum of 10+ years of enterprise selling experience in large global accounts. Experience working with a large Global organization as lead Account and Relationship Manager. Excellent interpersonal, verbal and written communication, analytical and presentation skills in both English and Mandarin are required. Candidate must possess demonstrated decision making, problem solving, and negotiating skills. Preferred Qualifications Experience working in a global federated enterprise working with multiple business units and influencing governance and policy is a plus. Other experiences to include: experience in large complex deal negotiations with a successful track record; ability to navigate across AWS and the customer in a trusted advisor/consultative approach; and, establishing credibility quickly with senior level executives across the organizations. A strong understanding of AWS and/or technology as a service (Iaas,SaaS,PaaS) would be preferred but not required. #GCRBD  #AWSCNSALES  #AWSCHINA  Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. The candidate will need to possess excellent communications skills, with extensive experience in product management. History of teamwork and willingness to roll up one's sleeves to get the job done. Genuine and intense customer focus. Fun to work with! Preferred Qualifications Knowledge on logistic industry and carriers a plus. New partnership development or business development experience a plus. About Agoda  Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.  Get to Know our Team:  Partner Development is a team of creative entrepreneurs that develop solutions for Agoda’s accommodation partners and promote Agoda’s top and bottom line growth. We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we roll out new product to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.  The Opportunity  As a Partner Development Specialist your key objective is growing the coverage and quality of Agoda’s supply network. You take care of a large portfolio of emerging high growth supply partners and assist in partnership related functions at scale.  In This Role, You’ll Get To Contact high growth supply partners to highlight revenue growth opportunities and maximize value Contact new or potential supply partners to encourage completion of their online registrations Encourage program participation through focused project sprints Communicate efficiently with partners through various communication methods including phone, email, messaging, and webinars Train and inform partners on our technologies, tools, and models Prioritize daily tasks, monitor results, and track progress in internal systems What You’ll Need To Succeed Minimum 2 years’ experience working in sales/business development or execution role preferred although fresh graduates welcome to apply Basic computer and analysis skills Analytical and proven track record in using data to drive achievements and make decisions Intellectual curiosity Autonomous and result driven (history of achieving ambitious targets) Ability to work under pressure in a competitive industry/rapidly changing environment Ability to work in a highly dynamic environment and is open to change in responsibilities, workflows, as needed by the business Able to support Hong Kong, Taiwan and Mainland China markets and following the business hours & public holidays in Hong Kong, Taiwan and Mainland China #shanghai #beijing #shenzhen #taipei #SALE #MRKT #BD #2 #3 #4  Equal Opportunity Employer  At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.  We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .  To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

Develops and implements the sales plans for the company's software offerings and services within assigned territory. Maintains communication with new and current clients in order to facilitate future sales.  Essential Job Functions ·      Directs the organization and performance of assigned sales group and the activities of senior sales personnel. Provides staff direction with an understanding and following of established company policies and procedures. ·      Collaborates with executive management to determine the market development strategy, account-level sales priorities and areas of focus within software efficiency, BPO and Mobility solutions, and full life cycle application management. ·      Owns the sales plan and is responsible for a quota aligned with the scope of the software-specific territory, offerings or services and assigns individual quotas, and goals for each team member. Drives the achievement of sales targets by ensuring the use of good sales practices and actively monitors performance of individuals and the team. ·      Leverages significant sales knowledge, experience, and client relationships to support team members in closing new business engagements. Develops strategic business relationships with key decision makers. ·      Establishes and communicates goals and objectives, defines methodologies, tasks, and activities, and clearly describes roles and responsibilities for performing to personnel. Communicates broadly to help ensure overall coordination for cross-functional teams. Builds and enhances the team capabilities by coaching, developing, and mentoring sales force.  ·      Acts as capture executive on key software pursuits to enhance company position and gain new business. ·      Selects and hires employees. Trains and evaluates employees to enhance their performance, development, and work product. Addresses performance issues and makes recommendations for personnel actions. Motivates and rewards employees including providing salary increases, bonuses and promotions within allocated budgets and company guidelines. ·      Prepares, recommends and oversees development of operating and personnel budgets. Monitors spending for adherence to budget plans, develops and recommends variances. Performs and/or oversees budget analysis. ·      Provides pre-sales support to client relationship personnel to drive software pipeline of qualified leads across the assigned sales territory. Engages with the same to qualify leads into opportunities. Executes the standard sale process through to closure. ·      Addresses complex client business problems by applying software offerings. Develops a compelling value proposition for our solution(s) based on a solid business case and its overall impact on the client agenda as well as company goals.  Basic Qualifications ·      Bachelor's degree or equivalent combination of education and experience ·      Master's degree in information systems, business administration, or related field preferred ·      Twelve or more years of business development and sales experience ·      Eight or more years of leadership or supervisory experience ·      Experience working with the business industry, software and application services, various areas of business operations and company products and services ·      Experience with contract interpretation, negotiations and project management ·      Experience working with company products and services and ability to articulate to client ·      Experience working with company sales methodology and supporting tools and applications  Other Qualifications ·      Strong analytical and problem solving skills ·      Strong communication skills to interact with executive management, staff, vendors and clients; executive presence ·      Strong leadership skills to lead and mentor the work of subordinates; ability to create a vision and a path for the team ·      Organization and time management skills to balance and prioritize work ·      Strong sales skills

About the Opportunity The main objective of this role is to support the FCM Asian sales team to win business by demonstrating genuine expertise and knowledge around the technical capabilities of the FCM solution and communicating this to prospects and customers.  This includes all elements of the products which we introduce to our customers and that sit within the FCM Platform and covering end to end booking process, content and aggregation and bespoke customer specific capabilities.  The role will also be responsible for keeping the sales team up to speed with technological innovations within FCM and within the industry and be the go to for projects and speaking arrangements for conferences.  The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of technology, how the booking flow works and be a excellent communicator and salesperson. They will also need to understand corporate travel experience and good understanding of the Flight Centre business.  Key Responsibilities are: Work with the Asian sales team to help put together and deliver presentations to communicate a clear and exciting view of the FCM Platform. Own the demo sites within the business and ensure they are up to date. Work with Business Systems to think strategically about bespoke solutions and understand their ramifications and ensure the solutions which customers want are being delivered in our roadmap. Work with the business and sales leaders across Asia to understand market needs to grow and retain the customer base. Supporting account management with retaining existing customers and moving them onto our technology. Increasing the conversion rate of the Asian sales team wins. Increasing the movement of FCM customers onto our proprietary technology. Upskilling the sales and account management team on product and new enhancements. Working with Business Systems and team to ensure the road map for tech in Asia matches customer expectation.  Requirements: Experience in corporate travel industry is a plus 5 years working in a front line sales environment Experience working with 3rd party technology vendors and technology Strong influencing skills Attention to details Good relationship building skills with stakeholders, leaders and customers

Hitachi ABB Power Grids is a pioneering technology leader that is helping to increase access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all. We help to power your home, keep the factories running, and our hospitals and schools open. Come as you are and prepare to get better as you learn from others. Bring your passion, bring your energy, and plug into a team that appreciates a simple truth: Diversity + Collaboration = Great Innovation  For our Marketing, Sales and Product Management team, understanding the full potential of our technology and the trends in our markets is highly rewarding. In addition, helping customers all over the world improve efficiency, save resources and reduce emissions gives our work a powerful sense of purpose. You will manage the Segment sales team in marketing and sales activities for the Business Unit PGHV China. Develop profitable and sustainable sales for the complete PGHV portfolio in China. Implement the Hub strategies.  Your Responsibilities Lead the implementation of BU PGHV strategies and initiatives in these segments to ensure appropriate sales and marketing efforts. Ensure PGHV portfolio is appropriately represented in these segments. Develop business strategies and sales and marketing plans in partnership with OU Sales teams. Coordinate product lifecycle marketing and ensures effective execution in these segments. Summarize the portfolio gap from these segments and propose appropriate portfolio development strategies. Oversee the market intelligence process ensuring detailed market analysis of market drivers and trends, key competition, and emerging technologies. Produces monthly and ad-hoc reports to monitor market and progress. Ensure segment sales teams are provided with necessary trainings. Work together with OU sales team, and LSM team and Marketing Communication for planning and implementation of marketing activities. In line with the sales team strategy manages and develop appropriate relationships with customers and key accounts. Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues, and the business.  Your background Min. 10 years of sales and marketing experience in related area. Sound knowledge and understanding of Power products. Good at Microsoft Software: Excel, Power Point etc. Fluency in both written and spoken English. Strong cross function coordination skills, good teamwork spirit, problem-solving skill. Good communication skill.  More About Us  Hitachi ABB Power Grids is a global technology leader with a combined heritage of almost 250 years, employing around 36,000 people in 90 countries. Headquartered in Switzerland, the business serves utility, industry and infrastructure customers across the value chain, and emerging areas like sustainable mobility, smart cities, energy storage and data centres. With a proven track record, global footprint and unparalleled installed base, Hitachi ABB Power Grids balances social, environmental and economic values, and is committed to powering good for a sustainable energy future, with pioneering and digital technologies, as the partner of choice for enabling a stronger, smarter and greener grid. www.hitachiabb-powergrids.com  High Voltage Products

General Summary  The Area Sales Manager position represents a leadership role leading a team of three sellers. Expectations include the ability to effectively coach a sales team to sell at all levels of management and build relationships that ensure PolyOne will continue to get the first and last look. Being skilled at customer centric selling approaches and effectively selling the value of our products and services are also keys to success and must have the ability to assist customers in problem solving to deliver solutions, bring energy, enthusiasm and professionalism to their daily routines. Individual will perform the function independently and interact and influence effectively at the managerial peer level. This individual is a thought leader who performs independently and has demonstrated the ability to effectively interact and influence peers and the next level up in organizations (PolyOne and Customer). Up to 75% travel is required.  Essential Duties & Responsibilities  The purpose of the Sales Function is to deliver: Profitable revenue growth, including robust new business development. Achieve stated material margin targets as a percentage of sales. Approach the sales process with a high degree of professionalism and effectiveness by successful utilization of customer centric selling skills and tools, such as use of scorecards, business reviews, EVE tools, high/wide/deep, 5 warning signs, prospecting & new account calls, development of a robust sales funnel, collecting ARs, avoidance of bad debts, cross selling, and effective CRM system management. Delivering year-over-year growth in Operating Income and Sales for territory. Must have a proven track record of growing a business. Creating an environment where a highly motivated, engaged team of Sales professionals thrive. Ability to coach, mentor and develop direct reports is a key aspect of this position. Development of highly productive relationships with key customers, suppliers and internal contacts is essential. Demonstrating strong business acumen to manage a P&L, working capital, profitability, etc. Must be experienced in developing a budget, operating plan and goals for sellers and technical representatives that align & ensure delivery of the annual operating plan commitments. Development of short- and long-term sales forecasts for product lines and markets and preparation the business plan, strategy, and implementation of a successful business plan annually. Performing market share analysis and preparation of recommendations for increasing market share. Maintaining first-hand knowledge of technology changes, material development and market place conditions; makes presentations at sales meetings. Serving as a member of the Commercial Leadership team in meetings and working on projects across the territory. Create and maintain CRM data and sales statistics are required. Working experience as distribution or channel management will be preferred.

description: Company Description  “We’re not in the shipping business; we’re in the information business” - Peter Rose, Expeditors Founder  As a Fortune 500 company, Expeditors employs more than 15,000 trained professionals in a worldwide network of over 300 locations across six continents. Expeditors satisfies the increasingly sophisticated needs of international trade through customized solutions and seamless, integrated information systems. Our services include the consolidation and forwarding of air or ocean freight, customs brokerage, vendor consolidation, cargo insurance, time-definite transportation, order management, warehousing, distribution and customized logistics solutions. Expeditors is headquartered in Seattle, Washington.  Job Description  Scope of Position  The District Sales Manager (DSM) leads our District Sales Program. Through the development of our District Sales team, the DSM ensures a consistent and effective District Sales Program inside every one of our global offices. The DSM is responsible for supporting the growth of each product and service within the district as well as driving collaboration with the global network.  The DSM is responsible for recruiting and developing sales executives both at entry and senior level positions in addition to maintaining an on-going pipeline of candidates. Through leading a vibrant District Sales Program and Sales team, the DSM maintains the momentum and Sales consistency which results in steady and ever-increasing revenue and market share growth for the district and the company. This position reports to the District Manager and Regional Sales Leader.  Key Deliverables  These are the three primary areas of focus for a District Sales Manager. The minimum results expected from a successful DSM are presented below by area. In addition to these, the DSM will be required to take on additional assignments as required to support company needs.  Lead the Sales Program Create and maintain the vision and strategy for the District Sales Program; Assess market trends and communicate them to the District and Regional leadership teams; Maintain an effective Marketing approach aligned with our branding guidelines, to include consistent customer proposals and communication, as well as hosting regular customer events; Work with district and regional Product and Geo leaders to facilitate development of any product initiatives. Manage & Develop the Sales Department Actively engage in closing large opportunities with the Sales executive team; Secure sufficient Sales personnel to effectively engage the district’s customer base. Continually recruit and interview to find new potential candidates; Create and manage the Sales Department budget Facilitate weekly Sales meetings for Sales, Product, and Geo communication and collaboration; Review and coach Sales team towards expectations; Ensure that the team is prepared to successfully transition all new business; Create and manage career development plans for Sales Operations and Sales Executives; Conduct weekly one-on-one discussions, monthly pipeline review and quarterly performance reviews. Qualifications  To be the most effective in this position we are looking for the following skills and experience: Strong oral communication, written communication and analytical skills Strong presentation skills; Proficient in Microsoft Suite (e.g. Outlook, Word, Excel , PowerPoint) Align with Expeditors’ 10 Culture Attributes; 5 years of management experience working a team of 3 or more Ability to perform and meet KPI requirements; Contract negotiations experience; Structured and organized; Effective at delegating; Charismatic with an ability to connect; Ability to understand local market and key industries present in the local market. Additional Information  Expeditors offers excellent benefits Paid Vacation, Holiday, Sick Time Full Social benefit; plus Commercial Insurance plan, Unlimited promotion opportunity Employee Stock Purchase Plan Training and Personnel Development Program competitive market overall package Videos To Watch https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r2zo7wWkRpQ By submitting your interest in this job, you agree to receive text notifications with additional steps to complete your job application. You will receive up to 6 messages from the number "63879". Message & data rates may apply. Please refer to our privacy policy for more information.

区域销售经理 如果您是一个熟悉产品和渠道，有着优秀的成长业绩的销售专业人士，那么现在您将有机会为一个全球领先的，提供全球化产品，并有着国际品牌认知度的公司工作。我们正在招聘驻贵州贵阳的区域销售经理，这个岗位将提供您机会去践行您的创业精神，满足客户的需求并为他们解决问题，并管理销售渠道。 If you’re a sales professional with a proven record of growth, working with successful manufacturers and their distributor partners, now is the perfect time to work for a globally recognized industrial brand with excellent sales growth potential. Imagine working in a sales position that allows you to exercise your entrepreneurial spirit, solving problems and creating demand at targeted customers, and managing distribution relationships on your own flexible schedule.  Flexco, a leading global manufacturer, is seeking a self-starter with excellent time management skills for the position of Territory Sales Manager based in Guiyang, China, supporting our vision “To become the leader in maximizing belt conveyor productivity worldwide though superior service and innovation.” The chosen candidate will contribute to sales growth, marketing development, and distribution channel development for the industrial markets in the China territory.  孚乐率-- 一个全球化的行业引领者，通过持续的努力和出色的产品，创新和服务，成为客户在全球范围内带式输送系统生产效率最大化的合作伙伴。目前正在寻找一个优秀的，有着时间管理技能的驻贵州贵阳的区域销售经理。  Flexco-China was established in May 2008, providing belt cleaners, PTMax, impact bed, skirt box, lagging, fasteners of Heavy duty and light duty, Novitool, rollers and accessories. Flexco has over 1800 distributor partners throughout the world, supporting customers in more than 150 countries, Subsidiary locations in Australia, Chile, China, Germany, India, Mexico, Singapore, South Africa, and the United Kingdom, and holds 185 patents.  简介：孚乐率中国成立于2008年五月，主要经营生产、加工机械传送带，传送带清扫器，滑轮套，传送带滚动设备，轻重工业皮带带扣，皮带接头机等产品。孚乐率全球有1800多个分销合作伙伴，产品支持和服务遍布在全球150多个国家。分公司主要分布在澳洲，智利，中国，德国，印度，墨西哥，新加坡，南非，以及英国。拥有185项全球领先的专利技术。  This is your opportunity to work in an environment where the culture is focused on great people, customer commitment, integrity, innovation, collaboration, and achievement.  公司的文化和核心价值观是优秀员工，客户满意，诚信，创新，合作和成就，我们将一起营造以这些价值观为导向的工作环境。  The Flexco team is interested in you if you meet the following criteria: ·        Have a minimum of a University Entrance or equivalent. ·        Have a strong mechanical aptitude. ·        Have a minimum of 3 years of sales experience, notably in channel and distribution sales. ·        Have a minimum of 3 years of experience in Heavy Duty or Light Duty industry. ·        Familiar with conveyor belt machinery, mining, cement, power, steel, port, logistic, filter and raw material industries. ·        Willing to travel often - 60%. ·        A team player who is highly self-motivated, self-directing, and commercially astute.  应征者需要具备以下条件： ·          大专或大专以上学历 ·          具有机械基础及意识特质 ·          至少有3 年以上的从事渠道和分销的销售工作经验 ·          3年相关重工业或是轻工业行业经验，具备输送设备行业、工业皮带或者相关工作经验将有很大的优势，熟悉采矿，水泥，电力，钢铁，港口，物流，污水处理，原材料加工等行业尤佳。 ·          愿意出差 ·          具团队合作，自我管理 和敏锐的商业嗅觉。  Flexco offers 13 months’ salary per year, social insurance and housing funding, life insurance, legal paid vacation, meal allowance, transportation allowance, training in headquarter. 薪资及福利： 13薪、五险一金、商业医疗保险、带薪假期、餐补、交通补助, 总部培训。

Job Description  准备好在 Mondelēz International 行动致成了吗？  与我们共同完成引领零食未来的使命。充满自豪。  您将领导现场销售代表组，确保销售战略的执行和年度关键绩效指标及特定区域目标的达成。您将与跨职能通知密切合作，从而依据关键绩效指标进行激活和汇报。  岗位职责  您将： 管理、培训并激励团队，并与销售能力组密切合作，以确保进行团队培训。 创建并管理年度业务部门计划，以实现商定的渠道收入关键绩效指标及目标，并在必要时进行汇报。 管理客户业务致胜关系，以成就所在品类的“行业最佳”操作。 与重要利益相关者紧密合作，包括客户团队、品类、激活团队、销售能力及客户财务，以实现所在领域的最佳收益。 充分理解品类及洞察知识，指导团队使用品类工具与客户交流并对其产生影响，由此制定出实现品类发展和年度计划的知情决策。  任职要求  不断前进、加速职业生涯的愿望，以及以下经验及知识技能： 了解 Mondelēz International 客户市场及市场渠道 销售经历 强大的组织及分析技能 卓越的沟通和交流技能 扎实的销售及谈判流程知识 有韧性且注重细节  其它职位信息  关于此职位，您需要了解：  您还将带来什么额外价值：  教育背景/资历证书：  工作制定要求：  差旅要求：  工作安排：。  Business Unit Summary We’ve been bringing our products to Greater China for over 35 years, making, marketing and selling our mouth-watering, well-loved local and global brands such as Oreo, LU and Chips Ahoy! biscuits, Pacific wafers, Stride gumand Milka chocolate. Headquartered in Shanghai, our 4,000 employees proudly work in sales offices and in our Research & Development Technical Centre in Suzhou. We are also proud to be awarded China’s 2020 Top Employer certification.  Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. description: Company Description Executive recruitment company Monroe Consulting Group represents a company focusing on digital marketing solutions. The unique direct integration with one million mobile apps provides access to unprecedented levels of global first-party data, which can be leveraged to understand and predict behaviors, identify new opportunities and fuel strategic business decisions.  Job Description： ●   Gain an understanding of digital technology & revenue ecosystem and be able to explain product benefits within this context ●   Sell multiple products to clients by finding the right stakeholders for each product, without digressing from a coherent product message and overall strategy ●   Manage a robust pipeline and accurately forecast new business closure rate and revenue booked ●   Work closely with GM to consistently achieve and exceed revenue goals. ●   Interact with the Account Management team to effectively manage client expectations and ensure successful campaign management ●   Convey field intelligence to product management teams in regard to development features ●   Independently build a large pipeline of leads, pursue them and close deals. ●   Manage presentations, build relationships and negotiate contracts within the Greater Chinese Market ●   Participate in a number of key sales and marketing events to energetically support and maximize the revenue potential from events.  Qualifications:  ●   Significant sales experience 3+ years) in branding selling with ability to leverage a pre-existing network of advertisers and marketers to bring a high volume of new advertising clients and brands to APAC market ●   A true passion for branding selling, and a strong sales drive with an ability to build strategic partnerships ●   Strong analytical skills to collect business intelligence by conversing with clients and monitoring/identifying trends in data and in generated reports ●   Excellent technological skills and ability to quickly learn what is needed to support the campaigns successful implementation and optimization ●   Native level Chinese with Excellent written and conversational English ●   Ability to multitask with various deadlines ●   Vast knowledge and prior relationships with stakeholders within 1st/2nd tier agencies are a must.

description: At STERIS, we help our Customers create a healthier and safer world by providing innovative healthcare and life science product and service solutions around the globe.  Position Summary  Manage assigned sales territory and dealers to facilitate achievement of company sales and profit objectives.  Manage dealers and distributors to sell STERIS products to Healthcare customers within assigned sales territory.  Ensure high customer satisfaction and maintain sound relationship with dealers through correspondence and/or personal contact.  Provide timely reporting of weekly and monthly events.  Identify and specify business opportunities for future STERIS products, markets, and new applications for current products and technology.  Duties Achieve assigned quarterly, and yearly sales budget for assigned sales territory through the management of dealers / distributors in the assigned territories. Manage time, travel, and sales activities to maximize effectiveness on a monthly basis. Identify top prospect projects and opportunities to focus activities effectively each month. Maintain sound dealer relations through timely response to dealer inquire via accurate and timely communication. Evaluate non-routine complaints from customers and dealers, follow through to determine source of complaint, and take appropriate action to ensure that problems are corrected and do not recur. Assist in recruitment of distributors within the territory and develop distributor sales force through the use of programs/information communications, as well as group training sessions. Ensure maximum customer support is provided by distributors within the Territory through overview management of the sales, customer service and field service functions within each market. Work with Field Service to coordinate site installations. Collect the competitor information and market demand trend, working with Key Opinion Leaders in the industry, participating in the local congress or medical show along with dealers to promote STERIS products and branding. Duties - cont'd Responsible for timely, accurate reporting of weekly and monthly sales and marketing measurements, to include forecasts. Handle other duties and responsibilities as are periodically assigned or requested. Comply with the spirit and letter of laws, government regulations and company policies. His/her attitude and behavior reinforce company policies and programs by exhibiting and expecting the highest standards of performance and professional conduct. Undertakes and defines a program of self-development. Position also requires extensive travel throughout the Territories. Position is based in Xi’an. Sales territories include Shaanxi, Gansu, Ningxia, Qinghai and Xinjiang. Education Degree Bachelor's Degree in Healthcare or Biological Science Required Experience  Minimum two years sales experience in the medical equipment’s /pharmaceutical industry; prior regional related sales experience preferred.  Skills  Be able to read, write and speak English and Mandarin Chinese.  High energy level.  High degree of interpersonal skills and have good sales track record.  Demonstrate ability to work independently and manage own time effectively.  Good working attitude. Positive, proactive and customer service manner with externally and internally.  Excellent communication, presentation and negotiation skills.  A good team-player.  Result oriented.  STERIS is a leading provider of products and services that meet the needs of growth areas within Healthcare: procedures, devices, vaccines and biologics. We exist to fulfill our MISSION TO HELP OUR CUSTOMERS CREATE A HEALTHIER AND SAFER WORLD. STERIS is a $3B, publicly traded (NYSE: STE) company with approximately 16,000 associates and Customers in more than 100 countries.  STERIS strives to be an Equal Opportunity Employer.
industries: Medical Devices and Hospital & Health Care

Deep understanding of market trend, sale strategy and sales process management. CAN-DO attitude, able to work on details, self-disciplined, aggressive and result-oriented.
