jobTitle: NPSG Cloud Sales Account Manager- South China
description: Company Description  Background  Join a new multibillion-dollar global company that brings together amazing technology, people, and operational scale to become a powerhouse in the memory industry.  In a transaction valued at $9B, Intel Corporation is spinning-off its NAND Memory Business—a global leader in the design and manufacture of integrated circuits and solid-state drives (SSDs) for use in data centers, personal computers, and other devices—to form an independent company that will be owned by SK hynix, subject to and after receiving all regulatory approvals.  The new company will be headquartered in San Jose, California, with aspirations to conduct an IPO and become a publicly traded U.S. company. As the current head of Intel’s Memory Business, Rob Crooke will lead the new company as CEO, with a number of Intel executives and senior leaders joining him to stand-up and grow the new company. The new venture combines elements of an established, successful Silicon Valley technology company with the spirit, agility, and entrepreneurial mindset of a start-up.  In addition to the U.S. headquarters and other facilities in the U.S., the company has a significant international presence in Asia, Europe, and the Americas. The newly formed company will continue to lead the world in innovating new Memory technologies and will soon be the second largest NAND memory company in the world by revenue.  You can be part of the takeoff at the start of a fast-growing business that develops products and solutions that deliver strong business value for customers, an engaging workplace for employees, and a greater impact on the world. Our goal is simple: Grow at an unprecedented rate and become the best memory solutions company in the world.  We are seeking applicants who will grow and thrive in our culture: team-oriented, diverse, innovative, customer inspired, results driven, disciplined, passionate, and adaptable.  Job Description  This is a commissioned sales position. Responsible for managing the relationship between Intel and customers by establishing and cultivating relationships with key individuals at accounts. Develop relationships with distributors and engage distributor resources in support of assigned accounts. Identify and develop new opportunities within assigned accounts.  Ensure that goals are consistent with Intel's strategic direction of: (1) maximizing the business with assigned accounts over the short and long term and (2) increasing the preference for Intel architectures among assigned customers. Responsible for meeting or exceeding assigned annual billings and design win quotas in conjunction with the Field Applications Engineer.  Communicate strategies to appropriate field and factory personnel to obtain required support and coordination. Develop a clear understanding of Intel's business practices including pricing, forecasting, terms and conditions, distribution and code of ethics.  Qualifications Minimum 5-year working experience as Field Sales or business development on Storage component or Storage system Familiar with NPSG storage products and solutions includes, but not limited to, HDD/SSD/SATA/PCIe/NVMe/3D-NAND related conception, products and their ecosystem Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills Develop trusted relationships with key internal and external stakeholders to help drive the NAND products and solutions with PRC CSPs and strategic segment accounts Communicate strategies and requirements to NPSG SMG and BU partners and gain needed support and alignment Partner with FAEs to win next generation storage designs and solutions Partner with BMG Operations to help with pricing, forecasting and supply chain management Exhibit an inclusive working style across the immediate account team as well as partner and supporting organizations Strong customer facing experience and good technical influence skills Growth mindset and willing to keep learning at storage domain Good project/program management skills Must be a team player, with a demonstrated expertise to technically influence others Experience with platform level and performance workload evaluation a strong plus Strong organization skills, attention to detail, and attentiveness required Strong verbal and written communication skills. Ability to work independently, multitask effectively, exhibit strong influencing skills and customer orientation. Additional Information  Flash Memory NewCo is an equal opportunity employer and will not discriminate against any applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, age, genetic information, or any other status protected by state or local law for an individual who falls within the jurisdiction of such law.  Flash Memory NewCo has retained Cielo to hire for this position.

jobTitle: OTS, Sales Execution & SAS - CGD Lead
description: Purpose of the role: Maersk is in midst of significant Transformation at scale. This includes transformation of its Customer Experience, IT and Process Landscape with emphasis on building a world class customer centric organisation. This has implications on the customer experience and change management efforts towards getting our customers to see the benefits of this transformation for their own business. We are currently seeking for a leader for our OTS, Sales Execution & SAS - CGD organisation within the Global Shared Service Centre, Chengdu. This role will directly report to the Sales, Disputes & Tender Vertical Leader. The candidate will deliver leadership for managing OTS (GCA&NEA), Sealand (Asian) and Dispute (GCA&NEA) teams, drive the digitalization and transformation efforts of the organization with throughout leadership, execution focus and drawing insights from cluster/customer feedback, as well as build up a team with high engagement.  Key responsibilities: Continuously improving quality of execution & processes to gain efficiency and better business outcomes, standardise the transactional activities and continuously gain efficiencies through automation, optimisation etc. Identify opportunities that will improve the experience of customers or internal stakeholders. · Lead the GCA&NEA OTS team, well understand, identify and develop - sustain - grow strong relationship with targeted customers to drive growth from OTS owned accounts in O&L. Manage and optimize the performance of the Sealand Asian team to meet all agreed SLA through KPI’s. Manage and optimize the performance of the GCA&NEA Dispute team to meet all agreed SLA through KPI’s. Drive the root cause elimination and agile way of working to reduce disputes and support overall IQ improvement. Responsible for the business outcome through reducing payment outstanding for the disputed invoice, ensure get money in bank to improve the cashflow of the company. · Continuous reduction of revenue leakages. Manage the overall implementation of BCP Framework within all the processes. Continually inspiring leaders, peers and all colleagues, motivating the team to perform at a “stretch” level, keep upskilling the teams & preparing them with a commercial mindset. Organization Design and ensuring sufficient depth and succession planning. Establish and develop effective people and process leadership, employee engagement and talent pipeline, develop the right capabilities to prepare the organization for the future.  Primary internal stakeholders: Front Office Customer Service Managers / Directors. Global Account Directors and Global Program Directors. Cluster Tops. Region Tops Global Process Lead. Service Control and Quality. Process execution, migration and BPM. Core Business Process Owners and their teams. Centre Functional Managers and their teams. Areas Finance teams. Areas Sales teams. Areas Customer service teams.  Primary external stakeholders: End- customers. Vendors & Suppliers. Consultants & Industry experts  Education & Experience: Graduate degree from university with a degree in logistics and/or business administration. Minimum 15 years relevant experience of logistics/shipping/customer service/BPO/sales with minimum 5 years in a senior leadership position. Experience working in a global business environment, including cultural aspects. Proven stakeholder management experience and exposure to senior leadership.  Key Skills: Passionate about driving a customer experience and client centricity. A strong desire for continuous improvement and discipline of self-learning. Outstanding stakeholder management skills and experience, including virtual relationship management. Proven strong eye for detail on reports and ensures data integrity. Strong leadership skills, be able to lead, motivate and engage the diverse teams. Capacity to handle change, stay open and support positive changes. Drive for results, conveys a sense of urgency and drives issues to closure; persists despite obstacles and opposition. Lives the cultural amplifiers of Focus, Simplicity and Teamwork. Excellent command of spoken and written English. Good communication & interpersonal skill, able to build good working relationship. Cross-functional collaboration and working experience. Coaching & mentoring skills. Workable Microsoft office skill.  Key Measures: Meeting the SLA/KPI set up and achieving business outcome, including but not limited to: o CSLS overall satisfaction and related questions. o Deliver the NPS for the Cluster/Regions supported. o Dispute resolution quality, turnaround time between invoice dispute initiation and disputed invoice payment. o Payment outstanding reduction/MIB ratio. o Improvement in Cash Flow/DSO. o Ocean and L&S performance for entire OTS portfolio. o Transformational KPIs towards Digital transformation. o Delivery on customer outcomes in terms of quality & timelines. o Savings in time or cost via process improvements. o BCP for Customer Service processes is established within 12 months and constantly tested.  Employee engagement. Culture transformation.

jobTitle: BD and Admission/ Direct Channel Marketing - You Plus - OFS - Shanghai
companyName: PwC Mainland China and Hong Kong
description: Line of Service Advisory  Industry/Sector Not Applicable  Specialism Operations  Management Level Manager  Job Description & Summary A career in our Education practice, within Priority Services, will provide you with the opportunity to help organisations prepare for tomorrow by taking advantage of infrastructure sustainability trends, bridging the gap between academic education and practical work experience by developing market ready professionals, and working to address challenges related to food safety and quality management where population and demand continues to increase.  Our team helps incoming graduate students develop into market ready professionals who are self aware, knowledgeable, and adaptable through practical work experience. As part of the team, you’ll assist in providing on the job training and experience as well as provide graduates with the opportunity to develop leadership skills through exposure with Fortune 500 companies across all industries. To really stand out and make us fit for the future in a constantly changing world, each and every one of us at PwC needs to be a purpose-led and values-driven leader at every level. To help us achieve this we have the PwC Professional; our global leadership development framework. It gives us a single set of expectations across our lines, geographies and career paths, and provides transparency on the skills we need as individuals to be successful and progress in our careers, now and in the future.   The Role:  The job holder will build & lead the direct channel marketing and sales function for You Plus. The candidate will be responsible in establishing direct channels of You Plus various B2C programmes, defining messaging & building up national/regional go-to-market strategy & plans to increase the overall new student enrolment.   Key Responsibility: Set direct channel strategy & annual marketing calendar to increase brand awareness for You Plus program. Product marketing – work closely with product & service functions to develop & differentiate our product offerings & key message to our customers & partners. Channel development– develop & deploy direct national / regional level partnerships with targeted brands / channels / universities / schools to increase brand awareness and drive stable & high quality leads and sales targets; Regional direct channel – develop & execute all regional marketing activities & local partnerships to deliver regional annual sales/lead target. Customer Experience & CRM – Planning and delivering online and offline customer engagement strategies to increase loyalty. Sales management – drive sales target of direct channel and collaborate with relevant team members to achieve sales management efficiency. Digital marketing – collaborate with Digital Marketing Head and develop integrated social content strategies and own the holistic social content plan which should be in line with marketing calendar.  ESSENTIAL KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE   Bachelor degree and above, at least 10 years’ relevant working experience; Result driven, ability to engage and convert customer relationship to achieve lead/sales target; Successful experience in direct channel sales and marketing areas in education sector, trade marketing experience with renowned institution / companies preferred; Demonstrable consulting skills, including excellent verbal and written communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to develop effective working relationships both internal and external stakeholders; Ability to work successfully as part of a multi-disciplinary team as well as to independently drive different customer / client engagement; Proficient with Microsoft PowerPoint, Visio, Word, Excel and other data analytics tools; Can do attitude with hands on approach is a must; Passion and innovative mindset, agile and open mind to challenges and fast changing market, entrepreneurship is a plus. Position:  Account Manager  Job Description:  We are looking for an Account Manager to join our component business. This role will develop all key relationships to ensure strong foundation for solution selling. Maintain and promote relationships with customer contacts who may be determining shortage and cost saving opportunities and deal with existing business challenges. Ensure customer satisfaction as it pertains to supply chain management and other value-added services. Extensive understanding of pricing programs and models within the electronics industry.  What You’ll Be Doing  Provides the highest level of service to meet customer satisfaction while maintaining efficiencies in corporate operational processes and procedures Serves as a liaison between Arrow’s internal resources, vendor resources and customers. Demonstrates a proactive approach and sense of urgency on our customers’ behalf, anticipates our customers’ requirements and communicates efforts in a timely and effective processes routine/ smaller customer orders accurately and timely. Resolves discrepancies with the customer prior to order entry. Enters sales orders into the Arrow system. Review backlog report to fulfill orders most effectively. jobTitle: Senior Sales Manager - for a leading publishing company
description: Senior Sales Manager - For a Leading Publishing Company Joining in a top-ranked publisher and working with the brightest talents. Developing a market with a great potential. Known for the quality of their products, the business is transforming and is growing fast. This is indeed an exciting moment to get on board! Negotiate and close the contract for new sales or renewal deals. Know the competitive landscape and differentiate us from other competitors. A competitive salary in the industry.  Contact: Jim Tung  Quote job ref: JN-092021-3581727

description: 职位来源于智联招聘。  Job Description Set clear target for each client, driving sales and target monitoring each month to reach good performance; To work due-diligently in developing new potential on trade accounts in Shenzhen; Follow up directly for product introduction, business contract, holiday promotion, winery activities with all clients; Maintain good relationship and deliver professional customer service to current clients, including order arrangement, new item proposal, product training, onsite support, etc; Conduct regular sales visit for all the active accounts to develop further business partnership; Be responsible for payment collection for the assigned accounts and reach collection target each month; Promotion To design, plan and implement effective promotion and activity to facilitate sales of EMW products in targeted account under the guidance of company. To follow up the plan in implementation of nationwide promotion and campaign. Other takes related to sales or assigned by the supervisor. Requirement  1、Bachelor degree or above;  2、At least five years working experience in wine, F&B or other relevant fields;  3、Have good customer service, familiar with local hotels, restaurants and wine shops;  4、Outgoing and pleasing personality, good team player;  5、Dynamic, self-motivated and able to work under pressure;  6、Fluent English in both writing and speaking, wine knowledge is a plus.  以担保或任何理由索要财物，扣押证照，均涉嫌违法。

该职位来源于猎聘  Objectives Observance of and compliance with Trillium’s safety policies Determined focus on achieving ambitious organic growth targets by developing close long-term relationships with both existing and potential customers. Be the first point of contact and “the face of Trillium” for customers within Singapore for all Trillium products Develop & provide a solid communications package for customers publicizing business news and product updates Negotiate with customers and work closely with Trillium support teams to close deals Develop an objective based customer visit matrix with expectations, planned outcomes and timings Work within the Trillium framework and under the direction of the Regional Director of Sales & Marketing to achieve or exceed annual input bookings targets Attend and accept Trillium product training programmes and then manage the delivery of these programmes to customers Travel extensively within country allocated to consolidate Trillium’s position with existing and potential customers Recognize and coordinate new projects from initial announcement through the RFQ & Quotation process to PO placement and beyond. Work with Product Management team to ensure that Trillium are incorporated into project AVL’s and ensure that AVL inclusion data is recorded and up-to-date. Prepare annual order bookings budgets and monthly bookings forecasts Record and report input bookings received vs plan Contribute to and provide input for long-term growth plans Presence at selected conferences, exhibitions & seminars Delineate between products manufactured regionally & non-regionally – develop outlook, inclusion and marketing strategy for non-regional products. 任职要求：Education And/or Experience Preferably degree level knowledge of business administration, sales and marketing, or mechanical engineering At least 10 years selling working experience in related Pump industry Good understanding of Pump application knowledge Willing to work independently for any given tasks and take responsibility for solving problems, meeting clients’ requirements are essential for the best interests of Trillium company. Ability to organize, self-motivated and excellent customer relationship skills. Own strategic views of market trend Strong initiatives and self-motivation. The local Singapore candidates will be preferred. Communication Skills Good spoken and written English language. Second language a + Good presentation skills Reasoning Ability : Whilst the candidate would be expected to work off his/her own initiative, the ability to function as part of a team is essential.  Target driven & results focused.  Understanding and good management of change within the business environment.  Empathy with both colleagues and customers.  Strategic Thinking - Develops strategies to achieve organizational goals; understands organization's strengths & weaknesses; analyzes market and competition; identifies external threats and opportunities; adapts strategy to changing conditions.  Business Acumen - Understands business implications of decisions; displays orientation to profitability; demonstrates knowledge of market and competition; aligns work with strategic goals; knows the competition; is aware of how strategies and tactics work in the marketplace.  Process Driven – The ability to implement a variety of sales processes and procedures to drive standard daily work for the sales team. The ability to implement mapped processes in the CRM system and drive a culture of CRM usage.  Diversity - Shows respect and sensitivity for cultural differences; educates others on the value of diversity; promotes a harassment-free environment; builds a diverse workforce.  Ethics - Treats people with respect; keeps commitments; inspires the trust of others; Works with integrity and ethically; upholds organizational values.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Today Lonza is a global leader in life sciences. We are more than 15,000 employees in more than 100 locations around the world. While we work in science, there’s no magic formula to how we do it. Our greatest scientific solution is talented people working together, devising ideas that help businesses to help people. In exchange, we let our people own their careers. Their ideas, big and small, genuinely improve the world. And that’s the kind of work we want to be part of.  Capsugel - now a Lonza company - designs, develops and manufactures a wide range of innovative dosage forms for the biopharmaceutical and consumer health & nutrition industries. We partner with more than 4,000 customers in over 100 countries to create novel, high-quality and customized solutions that align with our customers’ evolving needs and benefit patients and consumers.  Key Responsibilities  Develops new sales opportunities  Introduces new products  Ensures payments by customers  Ensures total customer satisfaction  Ensures adequate branding for the territory  Develops long term relationship with customers  Negotiates contracts  Applies Capsugel policies  Uses Capsugel sales tools  Monitors competition  Coordinates customer visits/ audits  Involves internal departments when required  Participates to the organization of customer events/ seminars  Responsible for maintaining sound EHS working conditions, practices in your assigned job or area and ensure continuous compliance to Capsugel EHS Standards and local law requirements.  Key Requirements  Experience in sales or business development in health care industry preferably, sales function is a must, B2B environment is a plus  Junior College above, a major in Pharmacology/ Medical & Health Care is a plus  Ability to communicate and build relationships  Strong negotiation skills  Willingness to learn, curiosity  Ability to work independently  Flexibility to travel, location: remote, home base to work  People come to Lonza for the challenge and creativity of solving complex problems and developing new ideas in life sciences. In return, we offer the satisfaction that comes with improving lives all around the world. The satisfaction that comes with making a meaningful difference.

工作职责:  R00146342  See why Selling Power magazine has consistently ranked Ecolab as a top company to sell for! Ecolab is seeking driven B2B sales professionals to join the commercial Pest Elimination Solutions Sales team in the United States. As a Sales Development Manager you will build & grow profitable client relationships with commercial businesses to protect their brand, their facilities, and the health and safety of their employees and customers. You will drive sales and attain budget goals by leveraging prospecting, cold calling, and networking skills to target restaurants, hospitals, hotels, retailers, food and beverage plants, schools, and nursing homes to offer the most effective B2B pest elimination programs in the United States. The new accounts you acquire will be aligned to our service team which is responsible for delivering the solutions you sell.  What’s in it For You? 开拓全新业务、全面覆盖各领域包括餐饮、酒店、超市、工厂等客户； 在既定年度销售目标下， 做好目标客户计划、制定、实施新客户销售战略，以实现销售目标和业务增长； 具备良好的沟通能力，能够向客户精准传递艺康的价值以获取业务 ； 向客户的管理团队推介服务概述、推介艺康产品及服务地整体价值 随时了解客户信息、政策调整，理解此类调整对艺康产生的影响，并能就此类影响及其对艺康产生的影响具备一定的判断能力，及时与公司相关人员进行分享。 能够与部门和公司内外各层机构进行有效沟通 能够制定价格，了解价格指导标准下价格协议产生的结果，并与客户协商达成利润协议 遵守公司和部门规章流程，并完成经理指定的各项工作任务； Competitive salary and benefits with guaranteed commissions for 2 years while you learn from successful professionals Company vehicle for business and personal use Fantastic opportunity for long term, advanced career growth in sales or sales management Flexible, independent work environment where you will plan and manage your own schedule Access to world-class resources, tools, and technology Grow your income as you drive sales through commission and bonus programs 【What You Will Do:】 专科或以上学历 熟悉PCO服务流程，具有良好销售经验或致力于销售领域发展者优先 具有较熟练的谈判技巧 能熟练使用Excel、Word、PowerPoint等办公软件 严格遵守国家法规，公司和部门规章制度和法规； 良好职业道德和素养 Prospect and obtain customers to achieve annual new business sales goals Discover sales opportunities and implement sales strategies Partner with our service team, corporate account team, and inter-company partners to implement best practices to solve customer’s pest problems Build rapport and cultivate relationships with customers and co-workers through professional demeanor and strong interpersonal skills Provide outstanding customer service by leading and educating customers throughout the sales process Keep informed of Ecolab product / service offerings and industry conditions to enhance successful customer outcomes To start, you will have the advantage of Ecolab’s world class paid training program designed to provide you the tools and resources to be one of the best in your field. Our 7 week training program will include paid travel to Ecolab Corporate Headquarters in Saint Paul, Minnesota for portions of the training. About Ecolab Pest Elimination  Learn how scientifically proven protocols help eliminate pests through 3.6 million customer visits annually. Ecolab Pest Elimination provides solutions to prevent and eliminate all types of pests in commercial buildings, food processing plants, food retail, foodservice, and many other markets. By partnering with our customers in these markets, you will have the opportunity to help protect their facilities, employees, and brands at a time when it’s more important than ever.  任职条件:  见职位描述

description: Based in Beijing reporting to Trading Proposition Sales Manager  Are you a passionate about working with potential customers to add value to their businesses? Do you love hunting for business in order to grow revenue and sales?  If so, we'd love to hear from you!  Position Summary  As a subject matter expert for pursuit activities, this role will focus on Beijing based stat owned enterprises (SOE). You will act in support of Account Managers and Market Development focusing on all sales (new, cross-sells, up-sells) for the FX Trading & Hedging proposition in China with existing and new customers. You will lead on deals aligned to the Trading proposition and serve accounts within China. The role works in close partnership with internal partners to proactively drive gross sales.  Role Responsibilities Structure, negotiate and close deals Proactively identify pipeline opportunities, governed by the Account Managers Develop the sales strategy for their proposition within their territory Provide insights and share Refinitiv thought leadership on their proposition with customers Deliver customer demonstrations on their specific propositions Qualifications And Experience Required English Fluency Deep market understanding including a) expert understanding of the trading workflow and real-time market data b) knowledge of relevant markets and liquidity venues c) strong understanding of customers' business model workflow World class selling skills (identify, develop, & articulate proposition/ consultative selling) as a “hunter” Strong sales ‘closer’ Become a Product and Workflow Expert in Proposition Products, including but not limited to: a) Electronic Trading, b) FX Trading and Markets (RFQ, ESP, ODM), c) Post-Trade Workflow Familiar/experienced in Energy Markets/Power Markets/Metals Markets/Agriculture Markets/Shipping/Supply Chain Creative thinker and good sales ideation skills Presentation skills (verbal & written) Ability to organize and execute a sales plan Over 5 years of industry, sales or market experience Proven track record in a quota bearing sales environment Experience selling to C- level executive People are at the heart of what we do and drive the success of our business. Our culture of connecting, creating opportunity and delivering excellence shape how we think, how we do things and how we help our people fulfil their potential.  At LSEG we embrace diversity and actively seek to attract individuals with unique backgrounds and perspectives. We break down barriers and encourage collaboration, enabling innovation and rapid development of solutions that make a difference. Our workplace generates an enriching and rewarding experience for our people and customers alike. Our vision is to build an inclusive culture in which everyone feels driven to reach their potential.  We know that real personal growth cannot be achieved by simply climbing a career ladder – which is why we encourage and enable a wealth of avenues and interesting opportunities for everyone to broaden and deepen their skills and expertise.  LSEG are committed to supporting emotional, physical, financial and societal wellbeing. Our tailored benefits are a key part of this commitment and we offer colleagues a range of support from healthcare and retirement planning to paid volunteering days and consumer discounts.  We also make reasonable accommodations for applicants and employees with disabilities. If an accommodation is needed to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and/or to receive other benefits and privileges of employment, please make your recruiter aware, we want to ensure you perform at your best.  As a global organisation spanning 70 countries and one rooted in a culture of growth, opportunity, diversity and innovation, LSEG is a place where everyone can grow, develop and fulfil your potential with purposeful careers.  Please take a moment to read this privacy notice carefully, as it describes what personal information the London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) (“We”) may hold about you, what it’s used for, and how it’s obtained, your rights and how to contact us as a data subject .  If you are submitting as a Recruitment Agency Partner, it is essential and your responsibility to ensure that candidates applying to LSEG are aware of this privacy notice.

description: Job Description Responsible for Sales reports and sales review on business performance: prepare reporting, analyses; Leads sales forecasting and demand planning process. Analyze historical trend, understand future opportunities, and develop forecasting model. Work closely with sales team on the weekly sales planning and business monitoring. Understand the plant MET capacity, lead to prioritize customer orders in case capacity issues; Proactively coordinates cross-functionally (external customer, sales, purchasing, PM and engineering team) to ensure high levels of quality, accuracy, and process consistency are maintained in the sales organization’s planning efforts. Work with finance and global sales ops team to develop and execute Annual Operating Plan (AOP); Support marketing team on price and volume analysis, R&D team on 1st year sales. Support local team on financial question; Manage sales pipeline through CRM platform. Work with Development team and customers to track project development status, develop and monitor dashboard, and continuously improve key business metrics as needed; Continuously refine and adjust business model and sales operation process. Communicate and align latest market practices to Global Sales Operation process; Required Skills 5 or 6 years’ experience in sales analyst, accounting, budgeting and/or related areas; Bachelor’s degree or above; Strong analytical and knowledge of business processes and strategy. Ability to analyze data, identifies market trend and opportunities, and build forecasting model to quantify sales demand. Forecast or demand planning experience preferred; Strong communication skill. Ability to manage external customer relationship and drive internal resources to support revenue target and sales activities; Fluent Chinese Mandarin and English required (both Verbal and writing); Strong organization skill and program management skills. Ability to understand organization’s needs, reach out to corporate resources and support, facilitate communications, identify issues, track and follow up AR; Take strong initiative and ownership for the responsibilities; Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint); Experience with sales force or other CRM; An understanding of Auto industry and products would be a distinct advantage; Good team management skill; Good to have customer sales experience. What we offer  We want to make you feel welcomed, challenged and inspired and so we’ve made sure to carefully put together a blend of benefits meant to share our drive for better technologies and cleaner air, to ensure your personal and professional growth and also your integration in a pleasant day to day working environment.  Who we are  Tenneco is one of the world's leading designers, manufacturers and marketers of automotive products for original equipment and aftermarket customers, with 2019 revenues of $17.5 billion and approximately 78,000 team members working at more than 300 sites worldwide. Tenneco’s commitment to operating in a socially responsible and sustainable manner is absolute, no matter the challenge. One of our values is Make Tomorrow Better, and one way that we do that is through our commitment to our customers, employees, and communities to build a more sustainable future. This focus includes a formal policy that outlines Tenneco’s commitment to enabling a healthier and more productive world. Our four business groups, Motorparts, Ride Performance, Clean Air and Powertrain, deliver technology solutions for diversified global markets, including light vehicle, commercial truck, off-highway, industrial, motorsport and the aftermarket.  Tenneco's Clean Air business group is a global leader of complete emission systems. We engineer, design and manufacture Light Vehicle and Commercial Truck / Off-highway (CTOH) full-system solutions and enabling technologies that address customer needs for fuel economy, emission control and acoustic performance.  "Over 20 years’ development after entering into China in 1995, Tenneco Clean Air China has become a strong performer of the automotive parts industry in the emerging auto market. With its headquarters in Shanghai, Tenneco Clean Air China has set up manufacturing plants in over 20 large and medium-sized cities such as Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Changchun, Shenyang, Qingdao, Tianjin, Wuhan, Chengdu, Chongqing, Nanjing, etc. And it owns one of three Tenneco global tech centers – Tenneco China Tech Center.  Employee learning and development is held in high regard in Tenneco Clean Air. In addition to setting up multi-channels on self-development, resources and manpower have been invested in building up and strengthening the culture of learning and development. Diversified learning and development opportunities are offered to employees with different experience, ability backgrounds and development needs, such as Trainee Program, New Hire GPS and 6-month Development Plan, Individual contributor capability enhancement, overseas working study program, Individual Development Plan, DDI, etc."  What you can expect next  Our team is ready to act immediately on those candidates who are the best fit for the role. You’ll first hear from someone in Talent Acquisition to schedule a phone screen, and then the next step will be a personal interview with our Hiring Manager and local HR Manager/HRBP. We pride ourselves on moving through processes quickly, and you can be sure of transparency and prompt communication throughout.

Deputy General Manager: ASIA  Division: Corporate | Location: Shanghai  About Us:  Kurt J. Lesker (KJLC®) is the leading global provider of exceptional customer service and high-quality scientific vacuum equipment, with a goal of enabling the innovation, creation, and advancement of a vast array of products. An international business with offices based across Asia, Americas, and Europe.  Overview of Responsibilities:  We are looking for a driven Deputy General Manager to work directly with the General Manager in running all aspects of Kurt Lesker (Shanghai) Trading Company.  This includes responsibility for strategic planning, Asia budget, sales goals, and all activities to grow the business. In addition, the Deputy General Manager will be directly required to support all departments in driving business growth and meeting goals, including Human Resources, Quality, Service, Technical Support, Purchasing, IT and Accounting.  The ideal candidate will have strong leadership skills and proven management experience, a strong commercial understanding and international management exposure. They will be an excellent communicator who can motivate and inspire our team, supporting all departments across the Shanghai business and working with America and EMEIA to meet the international business needs and goals.  Key Job Responsibilites: Deputize for the General Manager (GM) in managing the organization ensuring high quality business activities with maximum quality, service, and profitability for the organization Work with GM to establish, drive and achieve strategic goals and objectives Work with GM to maintain overall organization responsibility performing any required duties in relation to compliance, legal/statutory regulations, responsibilities, and obligations Support GM to manage, motivate and train employees to create a positive, skilled, and professional team Support Sales Manager to analyze and drive sales and gross profit in accordance with the strategic plan Support the Technical Support Manager and Service Manager to drive and improve Tech support and service processes with the goal of developing existing customer business, improving customer services and relations, and driving new sales orders Working alongside HR and Quality drive the advancement and development of the quality management system and company polices to ensure both quality and HR standards are met or exceeded Work with Supply Chain Manager and SCM team to maintain and develop supplier relationship to maximize benefits for company and minimize products and shipping costs Support Human Resource activities including but not limited to: hiring, terminating, training, performance reviews, job descriptions, compensation reviews and legal issues. Provide timely reports to GM on daily/monthly operations, including but not limited to analysis of finance, sales, SCM and Quality.  Qualifications:  Required Excellent communication and presentation skills Bachelor’s degree or equivalent Extensive management experience Direct experience working within a management role China Experience in electronics, automation, scientific engineering or similar Ability to work effectively in an entrepreneurial culture, working independently and as part of a team. Demonstrated leadership abilities Flexibility to travel internationally Fluent in both Chinese and English (Written and Spoken)  Preferred MBA or equivalent education background Vacuum Technology background Kurt J. Lesker Company is an Equal Opportunity Employer/Vets/Disability  "Passionate individuals that embody our SPIRIT values and want to make a difference in the world are the people I want on our team."  – Kurt J. description: 该职位来源于猎聘  岗位职责： 深入理解公司产品及技术，帮助客户和合作伙伴认识 SmartX 产品价值； 持续高水平的销售活动，包括：电话，客户拜访，解决方案论证，POC 等，在SFDC中跟踪和输入所有销售活动，完成销售目标以及 Pipeline 相关的过程指标； 开拓并维护核心客户，采用顾问式销售方法来获取客户信任并赢得项目； 获得客户和合作伙伴的认可，实现多赢。 任职要求： 坚守商业道德准则，为人正直； 统招本科以上学历，理工科背景优先； 3年 以上工作经验，良好的商业明锐度，具备存储、虚拟化、超融合、服务器等相关企业级 IT 产品相关经验优先； 熟悉 B2B 产品的销售流程，具备开拓和维护客户与渠道关系的能力； 能够自我驱动的独立工作，主动协调资源、克服困难，以目标为导向； 优秀的沟通表达能力，逻辑清晰，学习能力强，勤奋上进，过往工作表现优秀，业绩良好； 积极的心态，对工作充满热情，优秀的团队协作能力。 作为 SmartX 销售经理，你将结束从大多数媒体获得肤浅信息的隔靴搔痒，切身了解到 IT 数据中心领域的变革，了解这场盛大变革背后的推动力，了解产生这股推动力背后的核心技术和门槛，进而了解为在这些核心技术上取得突破而为持之以恒的公司。和你一起工作的是这个领域优秀的工程师，你的销售活动伴随着产品的快速迭代和公司的高速成长，你会不知不觉升级对产品、对技术、对行业的认知品味，进而反哺你的销售工作。你的目标绝不是局限于完成销售业绩，更多的是让 SmartX 的品牌、产品及解决方案被认可，为合作伙伴实现收益，为客户创造价值。为此： 你需要人品正直且靠谱，这是一切可持续健康关系的基础，无论是与客户、合作伙伴还是同事； 你需要足够的专业，成为一名产品的专家，理解产品的细节和价值，因为不懂产品只会做”关系“，不可能做到真正价值传递； 你需要真诚且开放，不功利，懂的如何成就他人，与合作伙伴做长期朋友，实现长期持续的共同发展； 你需要勤奋且富有野心，保持 “Day-1” 的工作状态。 过去五年，SmartX 已经被证实是以下销售的“滑铁卢”： 没有底线、无视规则和商业底线的销售； 不懂产品，只会依托品牌，迷信只需“做通”关系而轻视解决方案价值的销售； 主动学习的意愿或能力不足，执着于过往的经验，实则是思维上的懒惰； 被大公司或者外企把原本应有的热情磨灭殆尽，抗压能力差，习惯慵懒的工作节奏； 习惯在“盒子内”做事，遇到困难只会抱怨而不是主动寻找解决办法。 请把以上条目作为你选择加入这家公司的重要参考。

Position:  Account Manager  Job Description:  We are looking for an Account Manager to join our component business. This role will develop all key relationships to ensure strong foundation for solution selling. Maintain and promote relationships with customer contacts who may be determining shortage and cost saving opportunities and deal with existing business challenges. Ensure customer satisfaction as it pertains to supply chain management and other value-added services. Extensive understanding of pricing programs and models within the electronics industry.  What You’ll Be Doing  Provides the highest level of service to meet customer satisfaction while maintaining efficiencies in corporate operational processes and procedures Serves as a liaison between Arrow’s internal resources, vendor resources and customers. Demonstrates a proactive approach and sense of urgency on our customers’ behalf, anticipates our customers’ requirements and communicates efforts in a timely and effective processes routine/ smaller customer orders accurately and timely. Resolves discrepancies with the customer prior to order entry. Enters sales orders into the Arrow system. Review backlog report to fulfill orders most effectively. Meets customer service agreements established in SOW Backlog Management, Billing and Resolution of vendor Invoice Discrepancies and Claims  What We Are Looking For  Typically requires a 4-year degree with a minimum of 5 years sales experience in semiconductor companies or electronics distributors. Could Work within established procedures with a moderate degree of supervision Problem-solving, service oriented and "Can do" attitudes Solid understanding of product cycle and manufacturing procedures of customer Solid knowledge on products and technology development in the electronic components industry  What’s In It For You  At Arrow, we recognize that financial rewards and great benefits are important aspects of an ideal job. That’s why we offer competitive financial compensation, including various compensation plans, and a solid benefits package.  Medical, Dental, Vision Insurance Life Insurance Performance Bonus Paid Time Off Special/Extra Leave 5-Day Work Week Growth Opportunities And more!  About Arrow  Arrow Electronics, Inc. (NYSE: ARW), an award-winning Fortune 102 and one of Fortune Magazine’s Most Admired Companies. Arrow guides innovation forward for over 180,000 leading technology manufacturers and service providers. With 2020 sales of USD $28.67 billion, Arrow develops technology solutions that improve business and daily life. Our broad portfolio that spans the entire technology landscape helps customers create, make and manage forward-thinking products that make the benefits of technology accessible to as many people as possible. Learn more at www.arrow.com.  Our strategic direction of guiding innovation forward is expressed as Five Years Out, a way of thinking about the tangible future to bridge the gap between what's possible and the practical technologies to make it happen. Learn more at https://www.fiveyearsout.com/.  For more job opportunities, please visit https://careers.arrow.com/us/en. About Agoda  Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.  Get to Know our Team:  Partner Development is a team of creative entrepreneurs that develop solutions for Agoda’s accommodation partners and promote Agoda’s top and bottom line growth. We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we roll out new product to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.  The Opportunity  As a Partner Development Specialist your key objective is growing the coverage and quality of Agoda’s supply network. You take care of a large portfolio of emerging high growth supply partners and assist in partnership related functions at scale.  In This Role, You’ll Get To Contact high growth supply partners to highlight revenue growth opportunities and maximize value Contact new or potential supply partners to encourage completion of their online registrations Encourage program participation through focused project sprints Communicate efficiently with partners through various communication methods including phone, email, messaging, and webinars Train and inform partners on our technologies, tools, and models Prioritize daily tasks, monitor results, and track progress in internal systems What You’ll Need To Succeed Minimum 2 years’ experience working in sales/business development or execution role preferred although fresh graduates welcome to apply Basic computer and analysis skills Analytical and proven track record in using data to drive achievements and make decisions Intellectual curiosity Autonomous and result driven (history of achieving ambitious targets) Ability to work under pressure in a competitive industry/rapidly changing environment Ability to work in a highly dynamic environment and is open to change in responsibilities, workflows, as needed by the business Able to support Hong Kong, Taiwan and Mainland China markets and following the business hours & public holidays in Hong Kong, Taiwan and Mainland China #shanghai #beijing #shenzhen #taipei #SALE #MRKT #BD #2 #3 #4  Equal Opportunity Employer  At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.  We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .  To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

description: 职位来源于智联招聘。  Qualities  🔹挑战目标：看到一个有数字的目标就超级兴奋，愿意为完成这个目标而不懈努力且非常享受这个过程；  🔹对区域内市场和产业结构不断观察和思考，有效地把单元化物流装载设备（托盘，周转箱等）与客户需求相结合，形成为客户供应链的提升有价值的方案并予以实施；  🔹在与新老客户的不断沟通中，帮助客户持续优化供应链并为其创造价值；  🔹调动内部资源，不断提升工作效率、客户体验及业务持续发展；  🔹定期参与公司安排的内外部学习与培训，不断提升自身的专业能力与行业认知。  Abilities  🔹大专及以上学历；  🔹3年及以上B端客户开拓或供应链方案实施经验；有快消品、零售、物流供应链或物流设备包装等行业内经验者尤佳；  🔹性格开朗、热爱挑战、热爱学习、百折不挠 ；  🔹优秀的沟通能力、数据分析能力、方案制定和实施能力；  🔹乐于助人，享受为客户创造价值的过程；  🔹能够承受工作压力，适应短期出差；  🔹熟练使用各种办公软件；  🔹工作地点：广州（懂粤语者更佳）。  以担保或任何理由索要财物，扣押证照，均涉嫌违法。

jobTitle: Travel Retail Sales Supervisor 销售主管（免税渠道）
description: 该职位来源于猎聘  ROLE & RESPONSIBILITY Assist China Travel Retail Manager to implement business development in designated key accounts and expand Travel Retail business share in China. Responsible for day-to-day operations of counters, ensure the achievement of sales targets, KPIs, display merchandising and operation efficiency. Initiate promotion action plans to build and maintain Foreo’s sales performance. Maintain accurate stock management and timely implementation of seasonal updates and events, in line with the Brand, Space, Store Presentation and Marketing principles. Work closely with internal other function team (marketing, project and training etc) to meet the business needs from retailers. Manage and develop good relationship with existing and new partners. Develop and execute a full year of regular training schedule for retailers and front-line staffs. Be responsible to submit delegated account’s monthly sales report including inventory report, sales analysis report, promotion report, sales action plan, competitor’s sales & activities information, etc. to meet the needs of sales plan for brand. Collect information according to company’s needs such as beauty industry marketing survey, consumer profiles, competitor’s marketing activities, etc. To follow up on orders and deliveries and coordinate with sales operations team. Report on each visit’s activities with key action and follow-up review on a monthly basis. Other issues assigned by direct report Qualifications & Requirements Good in English and Mandarin. Graduated from a bachelor degree. Good computer skills (excel, power point, word). Ability to understand customer needs and handle different types of personalities. Experienced in the similar role for daily sales operations and BA management Proactive and highly self-motivated. Passion about sales/training with great communication and interpersonal skills. Proactive and highly self-motivated. A minimum of 3 years of working experience in the Cosmetics industry. Experienced in TR or beauty industry would be a strong plus.

PingCAP is the fastest-growing enterprise subscription company our investors have ever seen. And how are we growing so fast? By building TiDB, a globally scalable hybrid transactional and analytical database and one of the most popular open source database in the world (don’t take our word for it, check it out: https://github.com/pingcap/tidb), which enables companies to painlessly scale their business while keeping the underlying infrastructure simple. Our product has been trusted and verified by web-scale application leaders and adopted by over 1500 users across industries. We’re being led by the best in the space—our founders were the original creators of TiDB. We’re looking for talented and amazing team players who want to accelerate our growth, while doing some of the best work of their careers. Join us as we build the database for the future!About The Role: Design and keep-it-to-date PingCAP’s Go-Global deal management policies, process and contract templates for both direct and indirect deals. Organize training for the Sales/Pre-sales team with new sales policies, process changes and tool changes. Formulate, set and manage deal strategy with Sales/Pre-sales team to accelerate a specific deal’s sales cycle. Develop and work out the pricing-strategy, the discount structure and/or the contract framework with Sales/Pre-Sales teams to maximize customer-life-cycle value. Draft, review and execute customer-facing agreements/contracts and any other legally-binding documents. Coordinate with various internal teams (e.g. Finance, Legal, PingCAP Business Committee) for deal validation or approvals on non-standard items.  What We Are Looking For 5+years global enterprise experiences with roles in Deal Management, Contract Management, Business Operations, etc. Bachelor degree or above in Economics, Finance, Statistics, Law, Computer Science, Management Information System. Legal background is a plus. Experience with Salesforce is a plus. High attention to detail and accuracy. Have the ability to work effectively across internal and external teams. Advanced proficiency in written and spoken English and Japanese (for the Japanese-speaking role). PingCAP is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer building a diverse and inclusive workforce.
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Internet

What You Do At AMD Changes Everything  At AMD, we push the boundaries of what is possible. We believe in changing the world for the better by driving innovation in high-performance computing, graphics, and visualization technologies – building blocks for gaming, immersive platforms, and the data center.  Developing great technology takes more than talent: it takes amazing people who understand collaboration, respect, and who will go the “extra mile” to achieve unthinkable results. It takes people who have the passion and desire to disrupt the status quo, push boundaries, deliver innovation, and change the world. If you have this type of passion, we invite you to take a look at the opportunities available to come join our team. Hunter mentality creating own leads and pipeline Strong business and executive presence Analytical minded with the ability to look at data for forecasting, trending, and market strategies Able to work independently with a proven track record of performance working remotely Track record of success and knowledge with prospects and customers in the defined territory Education  Bachelor's Degree preferred in related field but not mandatory  Requisition Number: 82197  Country: China State: Beijing City: Beijing  Job Function: Sales

jobTitle: Brand Marketing Manager, Holiday Inn Express
description: Job Summary  Responsible for the overall brand equity management and brand strategy development of Holiday Inn Express brand in Great China. Identifies business opportunity, creates, evaluates and analyzes proposals for brand campaign/activation, brand partnership and branded experience & products, based on consumer insights, market opportunities and competitor landscape. Work closely with Development team, Design team and Operations team to drive business. Lead the development and execution of marketing programs, promotions and communications for assigned portfolio of brands. Ensure that marketing programs are operationally feasible at all levels, and provide a direct feedback loop from the respective stakeholders to the Greater China Sales & Marketing team. Ensure that all programs are coordinated with and support the overall Company vision as well as the objectives and goals of the Greater China Sales & Marketing organization.  This will also involve the planning, conceptualizing, development and implementation of synergistic, creative and brand-focused marketing and tactical programs and activities with the various sub-regions to drive measurable revenue opportunities. The role will be underpinned by a unique and extensive consumer-based understanding of the Greater China hotel market.  Essential Duties and Responsibilities  Brand Management/Development – Leads the brand strategy with the Marketing Director, based on the Global framework, adapted where appropriate for the Greater China Region. Become the Brand Owner by developing products to strengthen brand health/attribute perception and raise brand awareness within the Greater China. Brand Marketing & Communications - Lead advertising and communications activities in line with the agreed strategy & priorities for Greater China. Develop needs-based, non-traditional campaigns and communications which are fresh, creative and brand supportive to the specific brand audiences. Marketing Planning - Develop, communicate and/or implement marketing plans which detail the objectives, goals, strategies, measures and tactics for the assigned marketing segment, and which builds into the overall Greater China Sales & Marketing annual brand plans. Develop processes and delivery systems for all programs and initiatives that result in a continuous improvement of actual performance versus strategy. Strategic Alliance Management: Develops and manages relationships with strategic partners in support of the brand agenda; explores opportunities for co-branding, revenue-driving opportunities and other activities which support the strength and relevance of assigned brands. Measurement/Evaluation - Follows proper tracking and measurement systems to quantify the returns of all brand, marketing & promotions investments and ensure maximum returns on dollars spent against business priorities. Monitor and control all budgeted expenditures to constantly achieve financial targets, and control and approve the work of assigned agencies on the sales & marketing initiatives. Cross-Functional Working - Develop and maintain excellent working relationships across all functions at all levels to ensure maximum benefit from cross-functional synergies, especially Operations, Design, Commercial, Digital Marketing, PR, Guest Experience team. Ensure effective engagement of key internal stake-holders and ensure flawless execution of programs through all relevant channels to maximize revenue opportunities. Monitor all relevant competitive activity across all elements of the marketing mix and make appropriate recommendations to management.  Education Bachelor’s degree or equivalent International degree in Marketing, Business or Commerce.  MBA is desirable  Experience Experience in Marketing and Brand management within China, in a multinational company Min 6-year experience in Marketing or Brand role Brand Marketing project management with budget responsibilities experience Experience in managing multi-partner relationships Hotel, Tourism and Hospitality experience not essential but preferred  Technical Skills and Knowledge Ability to analyze, interpret and extract trends from data Demonstrated an understanding of the market research process Proficiency in marketing fundamentals, and in advertising development and media planning Strong business mindset and strategic thinking

jobTitle: Technical Sales Manager (Specialty Chemical/Performance Material) - Shanghai
description: Cutting-Edge Advanced Technology Specialty Chemical Player Technical Sales/ Key Account (must-have technical application background) Based in Shanghai  Our Client Our client, a global leader within the specialty chemical and performance material industry, catering their chemical product application to various industrial sectors (Electronics, FMCG, Power Energy, Aerospace, general manufacturing) with the aim to improve performance and drive efficiency through cutting edge advanced material technology.   They are currently looking to accelerate their growth in Shanghai and in need of an experienced Technical Sales professional to lead and drive the growth for one particular segment of their business.   Roles & Responsibilities Reporting to the Head of Sales, the roles and responsibilities include the following but not limited to: Plan, develop and drive sales and key account management strategies, across China for the assigned segment.  Manage several existing key account while striving to expand further the portfolio through account expansion or new clientele/market penetration.  Value add to clients through strong technical know-how or expertise in material application matters, providing relevant market insights of advanced performance materials adoption, best in class quality standards, etc.  Drive and manage the entire project lifecycle from sales to delivery of products ensuring project is delivered on time and in good condition.  Work closely with R&D and technical team on a regular basis on product modification, application, new product introduction etc.   Candidate Profile Minimum Bachelor's Degree in Chemistry/ Chemical Engineering, or related field Has been in similar role for at least 5-8 years within industrial specialty chemical manufacturing companies. Strong interpersonal, negotiation, communication and presentation skills is a MUST.  Driven and dynamic personality , striving for achieving or exceeding targets, while maintaining quality and professionalism.  The role is based in Shanghai.   What to Expect The successful candidate should be looking at the following: Attractive remuneration package Multinational exposure Great benefits and long term career progression   If you believe this opportunity is right for you, please send your CV to Vivien Lee by using the "Apply Now" button below.    To view similar opportunities or express interest in related positions, please visit our website www.aurexgroup.com and follow us on LinkedIn https://lnkd.in/fgAWEBa

jobTitle: 大客户销售经理/主管（预混料业务）Key account sales manager (Premix business)
description: 大客户销售经理/主管（预混料业务）Key account sales manager (Premix business) 汇报对象: 预混料大客户业务线总经理  Responsibilities/岗位职责 拓展维生素和矿物质预混料的业务范围，为饲料生产商和大型农场合作社提供产品定制服务(一条龙的客户)。 潜在客户拜访、产品推广、商业谈判和客户关系管理。 协调当地和全球技术部门，为客户提供技术支持。 The position willbe in charge to develop our business of vitamin and mineral premix range, designed for compound feed manufacturers and large farming operations. The position will handle prospect door opening, product promotion, business negotiation and customer relation management. In coordination with the local and global technical department, you will facilitate technical assistance to your customers.  Job Requirements候选人资格 拥有动物科学工程、兽医学或应用生物学相关领域本科及以上学位的中国公民。 良好的英语和普通话交流。熟悉中西方的工作环境。 具备丰富的国内动物营养行业相关经验，尤其是预混料或饲料添加剂市场 候选人应该具有一定程度的大客户资源， 此岗位主要面向猪和鸡板块。 工作地点不限，负责区域（广东、江苏、江西、贵州、云南，至少一个省区）， 同时欢迎优秀的在校生，应届生，往届生投递简历 Chinese citizen with a Master degree in Agriculture / Animal Sciences Engineering, Veterinary sciences or Applied Biology. Excellent communication in English and Mandarin. You are familiar to both Chinese and western working environments. Have rich experience of animal nutrition industry ,especially in Premix or feed additive market You should have a first relevant experience in animal nutrition business in China, preferably in Pig and chicken markets. Location is not limited ,mainly area is southeast including Guangdong, Jiangsu and Jiangxi, Guizhou and Yunnan  请您将简历直接发送给 xingyu.liu@adm.com

Position:  Account Manager  Job Description:  We are looking for an Account Manager to join our component business. This role will develop all key relationships to ensure strong foundation for solution selling. Maintain and promote relationships with customer contacts who may be determining shortage and cost saving opportunities and deal with existing business challenges. Ensure customer satisfaction as it pertains to supply chain management and other value-added services. Extensive understanding of pricing programs and models within the electronics industry.  What You’ll Be Doing  Provides the highest level of service to meet customer satisfaction while maintaining efficiencies in corporate operational processes and procedures Serves as a liaison between Arrow’s internal resources, vendor resources and customers. Demonstrates a proactive approach and sense of urgency on our customers’ behalf, anticipates our customers’ requirements and communicates efforts in a timely and effective processes routine/ smaller customer orders accurately and timely. Resolves discrepancies with the customer prior to order entry. Enters sales orders into the Arrow system. Review backlog report to fulfill orders most effectively. Meets customer service agreements established in SOW Backlog Management, Billing and Resolution of vendor Invoice Discrepancies and Claims  What We Are Looking For  Typically requires a 4-year degree with a minimum of 5 years sales experience in semiconductor companies or electronics distributors. Could Work within established procedures with a moderate degree of supervision Problem-solving, service oriented and "Can do" attitudes Solid understanding of product cycle and manufacturing procedures of customer Solid knowledge on products and technology development in the electronic components industry  What’s In It For You  At Arrow, we recognize that financial rewards and great benefits are important aspects of an ideal job. That’s why we offer competitive financial compensation, including various compensation plans, and a solid benefits package.  Medical, Dental, Vision Insurance Life Insurance Performance Bonus Paid Time Off Special/Extra Leave 5-Day Work Week Growth Opportunities And more!  About Arrow  Arrow Electronics, Inc. (NYSE: ARW), an award-winning Fortune 102 and one of Fortune Magazine’s Most Admired Companies. Arrow guides innovation forward for over 180,000 leading technology manufacturers and service providers. With 2020 sales of USD $28.67 billion, Arrow develops technology solutions that improve business and daily life. Our broad portfolio that spans the entire technology landscape helps customers create, make and manage forward-thinking products that make the benefits of technology accessible to as many people as possible. Learn more at www.arrow.com.  Our strategic direction of guiding innovation forward is expressed as Five Years Out, a way of thinking about the tangible future to bridge the gap between what's possible and the practical technologies to make it happen. Learn more at https://www.fiveyearsout.com/.  For more job opportunities, please visit https://careers.arrow.com/us/en.  Location:  CN-Suzhou, China (Suzhou Intl Finance Ctr)  Time Type:  Full time  Job Category:  Sales

jobTitle: senior sales manager 客户总监/高级销售经理
description: About Us 业务拓展销售岗位职责：1.根据本组市场开发计划，制定个人销售活动计划。2.通过开发新客户，稳定老客户，以力争达到所确定的销售收入目标。3.向销售部经理汇报市场信息，包括本市场状况、竞争对手情况、客户反馈意见等。4.以外出销售、电话联络和信函等方式与所辖区客户保持高度联系。5.处理客户的来电、来函。6.协调安排自己所辖客户在酒店的大型活动及VIP的接待工作。7.熟悉自己客户分类情况及各客户的需求特点和主要的竞争对手。  Your day to day 岗位要求：1.大专以上学历。有从事酒店前台、销售、公关等部门的工作经历。2.具备酒店销售学、酒店管理学、旅游经济学、旅游心理学、公共关系学等知识的储备。3.了解合同法、企业法、旅游法以及有关涉外法规。4.具有市场调查和预测能力，能及是掌握市场动态，并能综合分析，及时地提出相应的措施和合理的建议。5.有较强的语言表达能力，能撰写市场调研报告，具有起草工作计划、总结及业务汇报的能力。作为回报，我们将为您提供：* 完整的配套培训体系以及个人发展规划；* 五险一金，月休8天和带薪年假；* 丰富多彩的员工活动；* 享受遍布全球的集团员工优惠价格政策。  Apply

Location: 福建宁德  Responsibilities: 1、 依据公司经营情况，制定应收、库存管控目标，监控落地；； 2、销售流程及系统的搭建、优化，提升销售工作效率； 3、销售培训体系与素质模型的构建； 4、依据业务发展，制定或优化销售体系管理制度。 Qualifications: 1、具备营销能力或销售管理经验，对销售岗位的人性以及规则有了解； 2、洞察市场宏观环境，了解销售业务流程，有体系流程再造及业务系统搭建的经验优先； 3、具备较强的数据处理与分析能力。无论在规则的制定以及目标的设定中，都需要很强的数据处理和分析的能力； 4、具备很强的归纳汇总、沟通表达能力，跨部门的推动及合作能力。

Careers that Change Lives  A Day in the Life  Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned. Promotes and sells Medtronic's products and services within an assigned geographic area and /or specific customer accounts to meet or exceed sales targets. Responsible for developing, building, and strengthening long-term relationships with stakeholders including distributors and healthcare professionals. Responsible for pursuing leads, assessing needs and providing product services to maximize the benefits derived from Medtronic's products and/or services. Promotes and establishes education of the company's products and/or services. Conducts market research including customers and competitors activities. Implements market development plans/strategies and changes as needed. Communicates customer feedback on new products and/or modifications to existing products or applications to internal stakeholders including R&D, Operations and Marketing. Must Have: Minimum Requirements Bachelors degree required Minimum of 5 years of relevant experience and complete knowledge of company products and services Nice to Have  About Medtronic  Together, we can change healthcare worldwide. At Medtronic, we push the limits of what technology, therapies and services can do to help alleviate pain, restore health and extend life. We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday. It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to be.  We want to accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations - but we will only succeed with the right people on our team. Let’s work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients’ lives. Help us shape the future.  Physical Job Requirements  The physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. For Office Roles: While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile. The employee is also required to interact with a computer, and communicate with peers and co-workers. Contact your manager or local HR to understand the Work Conditions and Physical requirements that may be specific to each role. (ADA-United States of America)  Additional Information Posting Date: Aug 30, 2021 Travel: No

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  岗位职责：  1、日常销售团队管理工作，达成销售目标  2、分析上下游市场信息和主要竞争对手动态并提供周度定价建议。  3、领导销售端S&OP,和运营供应链协作做好产销平衡计划，并完成产销平衡目标  4、指导和培训销售团队提升价值销售技巧。  5、调研客户需求，配合BD部门开发和推广新产品。  6．参与制定年度销售预算并负责跟进实施。  7． 重点客户关系的维护并开发新客户。  8．参与市场部B2B项目并交付结果。公司交办的其它相关工作。  教育程度/经验  Education/Experience  1、本科及以上学历，化工，纺织或市场营销等相关专业毕业  2、十年以上跨国公司大宗商品销售经验，其中五年以上销售团队管理经验，15人以上团队。熟悉纺织产业链，熟悉纱线行业优先。年龄：35-45.  3、较强的沟通协调和文化适应能力。能够较快建立内外部工作关系。  4．结果导向，有强大的内在驱动力。  5．善于分析复杂信息并敢于做出理性决定。  6．具备优良的团队合作精神。  7．具备行业高度和全球视野。  8、能熟练使用Excel,Word, PPT等常用办公软件  9、熟练的英语运用能力

jobTitle: Sales Consultant / Sales Manager (f/m/x) B2B Logistics China
description: About us Seven Senders is the leading delivery platform to ship parcels. The company connects shippers with its carrier network of over 100 carriers in Europe, enabling them to use excellent local shipping as a competitive advantage. With additional delivery services such as Claims Center, Insurance, Return Portal and Labels, Seven Senders makes international shipping a simple matter. Automated shipping notifications, tracking and monitoring solutions ensure a transparent shipping process. Monthly reports and analyses enable data-based optimization of international shipping performance. Shippers receive everything from a single source and reduce complexity.   You have an impact on the following topics: As Sales Manager B2B, we will provide you with a comprehensive portfolio of innovative services and products to acquire new customers and establish Seven Senders as the leading parcel delivery platform for imports from China to Europe.  You will be responsible for the following topics: Acquiring new customers (hunting) Securing sustainable customer satisfaction and increasing revenue for our most important corporate customers (farming) Identifying customer needs and suitable solutions Participation in the development of new solutions to optimise the supply chain of our customers in cooperation with our logistics departments Presenting offers and conducting all negotiations Realization of KPI-based measures  With these skills, you complete our team You have 5-7 years of experience in consultative B2B sales You should have gained this experience in these industries: (Parcel) logistics, Freight forwarding,SaaS in the logistics sector or Consultant with focus on logistics or supply chain You live in Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Shanghai or Hong Kong You feel comfortable in a dynamic working environment You speak Chinese at a native level Your English and Cantonese is business fluent Your network in the eCommerce sector is a plus  This is what you can expect from Seven Senders We are a fast-growing and well-established company and now, after six years on the market, we’ve expanded from being a Start-up to a global (player) and grown-up company. Remaining a true start-up at heart - we are creative, dynamic, innovative, and agile. What sets us apart is that we are at the forefront of the latest trends, promoting continuous improvement and learning while our processes are optimized and occur automatically. We believe in international logistics. With employees from over 30 different nations, this is part of our DNA. Accordingly, our corporate language is English.   A stable workplace in an established and fast-growing market  An unlimited/permanent employment contract in Spain Flexible working hours Full access to the 7S Academy portfolio with a wide range of training for all our employees Language courses (German & English) A modern, digital workplace Access to "Corporate Benefits" Referral bonus program “Employees refer employees”  Time out for (remote) team events (e.g.kicker, team lunch, hack days)  We are looking forward to you and your application - Your Seven Senders People Team!  Seven Senders and COVID-19 The logistics industry is experiencing strong growth due to the global pandemic. From this, Seven Senders also benefit. Our success is due to our increasing customer base and the expansion of our target markets. We are pleased to inform you that we are able to offer you long-term secure and stable employment. In order to be able to guarantee you the greatest possible protection during your application process, we digitally map out our entire recruiting and onboarding process. Accordingly, we also support mobile working in times of the ongoing corona pandemic.
industries: Logistics and Supply Chain, Transportation/Trucking/Railroad, and Package/Freight Delivery

description: 正在寻求挑战吗？您可以考虑加入西门子智能基础设施集团电气产品团队！  我们运营总监（EP在线平台）的工作包括但不限于：  1 . 负责西门子配电电气业务部门开发的自有平台EP Online 的运营，包括平台功能的开发、线上业务模式的拓展及其业绩;  2 . 优化平台性能，提升平台友好性，增强平台的市场竞争力;  提升自有业务平台的流量、新客户获取、销售转化等关键驱动力。  我们希望您：  1 . 本科及以上学历；  2 . 英语良好；  有工业品B端电商的工作背景者佳，要求对工业品平台的业务上线、客户运营、平台功能开发有战略眼光及实际落地管理执行经验者； 工业品品牌方自有平台背景也可，要求从平台策划到平台落成，经历业务上线全流程。  如果您希望加入我们，就赶快申请我们的岗位吧！我们期待认识您！  At Siemens, we value diversity as the inclusion of and collaboration of different thinking, background, experience, expertise and individual qualities across all organization levels and dimensions. We encourage and support our employees to develop their personal skills and strengths, regardless of gender identity, nationality, age, religious beliefs etc.. We believe diversity strengthens our innovative capacity, unleashes the potential of Siemens’ employees and thereby directly contributes to our business success. jobTitle: Sales Ops, Platform Strategy (Manager, Senior Analyst)
description: About the Job: Airwallex aims at delivering the best financial products in the digital age, and the Platform Strategy team plays a pivotal role in building up the product-market fit. The team is responsible for driving market insights, optimizing commercial processes, contributing to key commercial deals, and collaborating with the product team to enable sustainable high growth of Platform Business performance in China. You will work closely with various functions and commercial leaders to drive commercial success.  Responsibilities: We are hiring for a wide range of Sales Ops roles within the Platform Strategy team.
